NEW YORK (AP) — New York Yankees infielder DJ LeMahieu was hit in the face by a ball while taking grounders at first base during batting practice Friday and later was scratched from the starting lineup ahead of New York’s game against the Colorado Rockies. LeMahieu was visited by a trainer before he headed into the clubhouse. The Yankees said LeMahieu, who was slated to play first base and bat ninth, was scratched for precautionary reasons. Rookie Ben Rice replaced LeMahieu at first base and in the No. 9 spot in the batting order. Monday mornings The latest local business news and a lookahead to the coming week. LeMahieu, in the fourth year of a six-year, $90 million deal, is batting just .189 with two homers and 24 RBIs in 62 games this season. The 36-year-old, who played for the Rockies from 2012 to 2018, missed...

title: Apoya Gobierno de Morelia a familias afectadas por lluvias al poniente
creator: María Yedid Zapién

title: Paralympic champion told wheelchair 'wouldn't fit' by bouncer on night out
content: Born two months premature with cerebral palsy, Paralympic dressage champion Sophie Christiansen has overcome vast obstacles in her 36 years. But she was left reeling when she experienced ableist abuse twice in one night while celebrating a friend's standup gig. The eight-time Team GB Paralympic gold medallist, who started riding horses at the age of six, uses an electric wheelchair to get around, as the brain condition affects her mobility and muscle tone. She had gone to watch her Beijing teammate Ricky Balshaw's standup gig at London's Comedy Store last Thursday (August 15) when she and fiance Peter came face-to-face with the bouncer on the door standing next to a set of stairs. When they asked if there was an accessible entrance to use, the bouncer reacted dismissively and let other able-bodied guests into the venue. When asked again, he told Sophie there was a lift, but that her 30kg wheelchair wouldn't fit in it. Image: DAILY MIRROR) DAILY MIRROR) With minutes to go before the show started and anxious not to miss the beginning, Sophie agreed to make her own way down the stairs while Peter struggled to manoeuvre her chair into the venue. "If we were slightly earlier I'd have insisted on being shown where the lift was, but I had to put up with the bouncer being completely unhelpful," says Sophie, who is also a software developer for investment bank Goldman Sachs. "He had the audacity to be rude about my fiance, saying, 'He's arrogant' while nodding towards Peter, who was...

title: Rory McIlroy furiously launches driver into water and is forced to fetch soaking club
content: In a rare showing of frustration, Rory McIlroy launched his driver into the nearby water after hitting his tee shot wide right on the 17th at the BMW Championship. The Ulsterman doesn't often get frustrated but had clearly seen enough when the cries of 'fore-right' were yelled behind him. Seeing the ball drift off the right to the rough, McIlroy took his club down and swung it at waist height. Taking one bounce, the driver skipped off the immaculately cut tee box and plonked into the water - causing a splash. Taking a second to see where the ball finished, McIlroy picked up his tee and trudged over to the water's edge. The 35-year-old fished out the club and passed it to his caddie who promptly towled it down. Some of McIlroy's frustration will have stemmed from the 16th, where he bogeyed the... (Image: Sky Sports)

title: George Russell and Lewis Hamilton's comments after Dutch GP practice speak volumes
content: George Russell and Lewis Hamilton were left grinning after a day of practice which proved they are both in contention for victory at the Dutch Grand Prix. Rain affected Friday's first session making it not representative of the true balance of power at the first race since F1's summer break. But even though high winds remained, the sun shone on the Dutch seaside town and Mercedes flexed their muscles. Russell was fastest overall, edging out the McLaren of Oscar Piastri. And team-mate Hamilton was third on the timesheets as both of them made it clear they will be in pole contention. Both Britons were delighted with their machines, which have been temperamental on Fridays for a long time but which were purring in the Zandvoort sunshine. Russell said: "Getting back into the swing of things, it was really difficult out there because it was so windy - probably the windiest I've... (Image: Getty Images)

title: Man Utd star Amad Diallo clarifies his biological mum hasn't passed away
content: Manchester United star Amad has revealed the sad news that his "brother's mum" has died - and was forced to clarify that his biological mother hasn't passed away. Amad is set to play a key role for United this season having signed from Atalanta in 2021. But he has now been hit by the tragic news of the passing. The 22-year-old announced the news on his Snapchat social media account, sharing a picture of the woman holding two young children. He captioned the post: "Rest in peace Mum, may Allah forgive you." When the post went viral, Amad had yet to announce the news on his other social media accounts. He later clarified that the woman in question is not his biological mother but still someone very close to his heart. He said on Twitter : "Guys I wanted to clarify. She is not my biological mother, she is my brother's mother and my sister. May she rest in peace." Tributes poured in from Red Devils fans following Amad's post. One wrote: "My thoughts and prayers are with Amad Diallo." A second commented: "May her soul rest in peace." A third added: "We are...

title: Jarell Quansah's demand to Arne Slot after Liverpool star's brutal half-time snub
content: Liverpool defender Jarell Quansah asked to train on Sunday to atone for the errors against Ipswich Town that led to him being hooked at half-time by new head coach Arne Slot. The 21-year-old was spotted cutting a dejected figure on the substitutes' bench after Ibrahima Konate was called in to replace him after the interval. The Reds struggled to find their rhythm in the first-half against the newly-promoted Tractor Boys, and Slot later called out the number of duels lost against Ipswich forward Liam Delap in the opening 45 minutes. The English centre-back made his senior Liverpool debut on August 27 last season and proceeded to have an impressive season, eventually earning him a call-up to England's senior squad. Even so, Quansah is still one of Liverpool's less experienced defenders and his development is ongoing. And while Slot called out the defensive duels lost in the first half, he made clear to Quansah and the team the following day that the young defender was not being singled out for criticism. On Quansah's development, Slot said: "In a way you would expect a player to react. I spoke to him immediately after the game and... (Image: Marc Atkins)

title: Sosogu Ramen and Japanese BBQ Opening New Location in Long Beach
creator: Joey Reams
content: , a delicious restaurant found in Redlands, is getting ready to open a new location in at The company’s second location is set to move into the former home of Plancha Latin Kitchen near the shopping mall, according to a recent liquor license application. Co-owners and opened the ramen and Japanese grill restaurant a few years ago and are already to expand with a new location, offering the same delicious food and customer service as its flagship site at 360 Orange St. There’s no timeline for this new location. When the new Sosogu Ramen & Japanese BBQ location, likely later this year, customers can expect a menu highlighting its signature craft ramen, which is made with scratch noodles, rich broth, tender braised pork belly, or savory chicken chashu, a variety of fresh vegetable toppings, and a perfectly cooked egg. The restaurant also offers vegan ramen options, rice bowls, small plates, and bao buns, a great accompaniment to the Japanese BBQ experience. In addition, Sosogu Ramen & Japanese BBQ also has a full bar with draft beer, sake, and cocktails made using Japanese spirits. “At Sosogu, our menu is constantly evolving, as we are always experimenting with new flavors and ingredients to bring you the most exciting and satisfying ramen experience,” according to the company’s website. “Our chefs take pride in using only the freshest, highest-quality ingredients in all of our dishes. Sosogu is a Japanese word meaning pour it up, which we do daily in our kitchen & bar! Our cozy...

title: Mason Greenwood makes decision on international future after Steve McClaren talks
content: Mason Greenwood is pursuing a change of international allegiance to Jamaica after holding talks with their new manager Steve McClaren. Greenwood has one cap at senior level for England, having made a smattering of appearances at youth level for the Three Lions. But the striker is highly unlikely to ever feature again for the country of his birth. While playing for Manchester United, Greenwood was arrested in October 2022 and was subsequently charged with attempted rape, engaging in controlling and coercive behaviour, and assault occasioning actual bodily harm. Those charges were dropped in February 2023 by the Crown Prosecution Service. After an internal review, United decided he would not play another game for the club. They sold him to Marseille earlier this summer, where he scored two goals and notched one assist on his debut. Now he is eyeing a return to international football, though not for England. Instead, he is set to commit to Jamaica, with The Sun reporting the Caribbean island's football association has approached the FA to transfer... (Image: Johnny Fidelin/Icon Sport via Getty Images)

title: Boxing fans demand Jake Paul shows proof of huge Mike Tyson boast
content: Fans have demanded Jake Paul to show "receipts" after the Youtuber-turned-boxer revealed his eye-watering fight purse when he steps into the ring against Mike Tyson. The highly-anticipated bout between 27-year-old Paul and 58-year-old Tyson is set for November in Texas, eight months after the initial date due to an ulcer flare-up which stopped Tyson from training properly in the lead up to the fight. The postponement only exacerbated concerns about the fight's impact on the former heavyweight champion of the world. Paul, known as 'The Problem Child', has a record of 10-1, with 6 KOs, while Iron Mike is at 50-6, with 44 KOs. However, he has not fought since 2020 in an exhibition match against another legendary boxer, Roy Jones Jr., who was 51 at the time. His last competitive boxing match came in June 2005 when he was on the end of a stoppage defeat to Kevin McBride. "Jake Paul, this may... (Image: Shareif Ziyadat/Getty Images)

title: Newsboy's 1-2-3 for York on ITV plus tips for Saturday's other meetings
content: Newsboy's 1-2-3 for York on ITV plus tips for Saturday's other meetings 1.50 Sky Bet Strensall Stakes SEE THE FIRE has taken on Group 1 opposition on all four starts this season - so this assignment will prove less taxing. The debut winner of a fillies' maiden at Newmarket in August 2023, the Andrew Balding trainee ran second to Darnation in the Group 2 May Hill Stakes at Doncaster the following month before a third behind Ylang Ylang in the Group 1 Fillies' Mile at Newmarket in October. Sea The Stars' daughter - dam Arabian Queen shocked Derby hero Golden Horn in the 2015 Juddmonte International - came up short in the 1,000 Guineas, Coronation Stakes and Coral-Eclipse but took a leap forward with a neck defeat to Opera Singer in the Nassau Stakes at Glorious Goodwood at the beginning of the month. Oisín Murphy's mount steps two rungs down the class ladder, and is poised to take advantage. Despite going up back in grade, Enfjaar rates the chief danger, ahead of Task Force and Phantom Flight . NEWSBOY'S 1-2-3: 1 SEE THE FIRE, 2 ENFJAAR, 3 TASK FORCE Image: Racing Photos via Getty Images) Racing Photos via Getty Images) 2.25 Sky Bet Melrose Handicap CHAMPAGNE PRINCE has both a pedigree and a style of running that suggest a first try at this trip will trigger a personal best. Jane Chapple-Hyam gave the son of Lope De Vega his introduction over seven furlongs at Chelmsford City last November, and Champagne Prince followed a four-and-a-half-length debut romp with a...

title: Mikel Arteta gives green light to Arsenal transfer in U-turn on 'senior' star
content: Fabio Vieira is set to return to Porto on loan despite Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta expressing his satisfaction with the player's maturation and confidence last season. Vieira joined the Gunners from the 30-time Portuguese champions in July 2022 on a five-year deal for a fee of around €40million (£34.26m). The 24-year-old midfielder endured a difficult debut campaign. Despite flashes of brilliance – including a long-range screamer away at Brentford – he ultimately struggled to string together a consistent run of games given the competitive pecking order. In the opening exchanges of last term, it seemed that Vieira was ready to kick on and prove why Arteta was so keen on landing his signature. Following an impressive cameo appearance off the bench during the 3-1 win over Manchester United in September, the Arsenal boss made... (Image: Arsenal FC via Getty Images)

title: Jermaine Jenas at risk of losing another high-profile job after presenter sacked by BBC
content: Jermaine Jenas is at risk of losing his presenting role with Formula E following his sacking by the BBC over alleged inappropriate messages he sent to female colleague. Jenas' sacking by the BBC was confirmed on Thursday afternoon, while he was presenting a show on radio station talkSPORT. His departure came after the corporation received allegations about Jenas' workplace behaviour and launched an investigation. He had been working for the BBC as a pundit on Match of the Day and as a host of The One Show. It was also believed he was being lined up as a potential successor to Gary Lineker as the broadcaster's top football presenter. Alongside those jobs, he has also worked as the main presenter of Formula E's British-language television coverage. But his position looks set to now come under threat in the wake of his BBC sacking. The motorsport series has made it clear they have not yet confirmed their presenting line-up for the new season. And they also warned that anyone working for them must me the 'high standards' they expect. A Formula E... (Image: Joe Prior/Visionhaus via Getty Images)

title: Enzo Maresca's Chelsea firesale handed boost as Kepa lined up for unlikely transfer
content: Kepa Arrizabalaga has reportedly held talks with Bournemouth head coach Andoni Iraola and could be the latest senior player to depart Chelsea this summer. Kepa is entering the final year of his contract and is reportedly keen to leave the Blues this summer. The Blues are desperate to sell some of their big earners, with Raheem Sterling and Ben Chilwell among those expected to leave before the window slams shut next week. But in a bizarre twist to his Chelsea saga, Kepa – who joined the club in 2018 as the world's most expensive goalkeeper but was not given a squad number for this season – could also put pen to paper on a new deal despite having no future at Stamford Bridge. And, according to the BBC, Bournemouth are also looking to seal a loan move for the shot stopper. Should he not sign a new deal, a season-long loan would mean the 29-year-old could then walk... (Image: Tom Jenkins)

title: Arne Slot shares his plan to get even more out of Liverpool superstar Mohamed Salah
content: Arne Slot shares his plan to get even more out of Liverpool superstar Mohamed Salah The impossible job may be making Mo Salah even better. The Liverpool forward has scored more than 20 goals in every one of his previous seven seasons with the Reds. Salah, 32, is already off the mark with a goal last weekend against Ipswich and will be fired up for more at home to Brentford on Sunday. But new boss Arne Slot reckons he can get even more out of the Egyptian by ensuring the team around him step up a level. "It's my firm belief that you don't improve individuals, you improve the team and because of that individuals improve," said Slot. "So if Mo and Trent [Alexander-Arnold] or Mo and Conor [Bradley] play better together, or Mo has a better understanding and timing with Dom [Szoboszlai], then the end result is you will say Mo has become better. "But I think it's about team structure, working on a daily basis to improve them, and of course we as a staff show individuals what timing they can do better or where they can run or when they have to defend. "But improving an individual... (Image: Liverpool FC via Getty Images)

title: Liverpool complete first summer transfer as young Premier League star finally makes switch
content: Liverpool have completed their first signing of the summer, with 16-year-old Alvin Ayman joining from Wolves for £2million. Arne Slot's Reds were the only English top-flight side yet to make a signing in the summer window. While they are yet to sign a first-team player with the window closing at the end of next week, the Reds have at least bolstered in their youth ranks with the addition of Ayman. The versatile youngster was expected to make the swap to Merseyside for a number of months, with the Reds reportedly beginning their pursuit of the player as far back as last June. Ayman was a regular for Wolves U18s last season at the tender age of 15. He also made his debut for the U21s. However, despite an agreement in place between... (Image: Liverpool FC via Getty Images)

title: Erik ten Hag outlines how Kobbie Mainoo can become 'the perfect midfielder' for Man Utd
content: Erik ten Hag outlines how Kobbie Mainoo can become 'the perfect midfielder' for Man Utd Erik ten Hag claims Kobbie Mainoo can become "the perfect midfielder" for Manchester United and England. Mainoo grabbed his chance to light up Euro 2024 with England and the 19-year-old has quickly become a regular for the Three Lions and United. Ten Hag loves Mainoo's ability and says he is equally good in an attacking position or in a holding role. "He collected such good experiences [at the Euros] and those experiences will help him to become a better player, 100 per cent," said the United boss. "Where do I see him? "The perfect midfielder is one who is very good in attacking,...

title: Paul Gascoigne says Sir Alex Ferguson was the real winner after brutal Man Utd snub
content: Paul Gascoigne believes Manchester United were the real winners after he snubbed the chance to sign for Sir Alex Ferguson - given the success the team later enjoyed. Gascoigne's almost-move to the Red Devils has become its own infamous version of folklore. Sir Alex Ferguson was in Malta when he read the bad news - the midfielder had agreed to join Tottenham after Newcastle United's £2.2million valuation had been met. Only, they weren't the first to do so. United had already put their cash on the table. Before jetting off on holiday, Ferguson asked Gascoigne if he was safe to do so in the knowledge that an agreement had been reached. The response was an outright yes, only for the deal to never materialise courtesy of a drink with then-Tottenham man Chris Waddle and a call from then-Tottenham chairman Irving Scholar. With Spurs offering Gascoigne's family a house, as well as a sun bed for his sister and a white BMW for his dad, the offer was one Gascoigne could hardly snub. Ferguson wrote a letter to Gascoigne in fury, lamenting his jilt of the biggest club in the world and branding him a 'silly boy'. Gascoigne has been clear he does not regret his... (Image: YouTube/Seaman Says)

title: Mikel Arteta opens up on future plans as Arsenal fans told they don't need to panic
content: Mikel Arteta opens up on future plans as Arsenal fans told they don't need to panic Mikel Arteta is ready to commit his long-term future to Arsenal with contract talks set to begin next month. The Gunners boss says there's no panic over the delay of striking an agreement with his current deal expiring next summer. Arteta, who has transformed Arsenal into Premier League title challengers during his five-year reign, had been expected to extend his current £9m-per-year deal at the end of last season. Negotiations are due to start once the summer transfer window closes and Arteta said: "I don't think anybody has to panic. We have done it in the past and it has never been an issue - and I don't expect that to happen. "We... (Image: Arsenal FC via Getty Images)

title: Arne Slot explains why he'll never copy Jurgen Klopp ahead of Anfield Premier League debut
content: Arne Slot insists Liverpool fans will love him because of the way his team plays and not because he fist pumps the crowd after games. The Dutchman's predecessor Jurgen Klopp struck up an instant bond with the Anfield crowd by showing his emotion on the touchline and at the end of games. Klopp later made it a post-match ritual after a big win to go to the Kop and lead the cheers with a round of fist pumps. Of course, Reds fans also adored the German's teams as they won seven major trophies under him. But Slot cuts a different figure on the touchline as he's much calmer and not one to be lapping up the applause. The new Kop boss insists the bond between him and the supporters will grow as they learn to love his way... (Image: Action Plus via Getty Images)

title: Emi Martinez responds to Aston Villa title hopes as he doubles down on wind-up antics
content: Emi Martinez is a world-class goalkeeper. After Aston Villa secured him to a new five-year deal this week, boss Unai Emery 's arch talent-spotter Monchi claimed he was among the all-time greats between the sticks. That may be so. What cannot be denied to the watching world is that the 31-year-old is also a world-class penalty shoot-out expert. And a world-class wind-up merchant. His antics included getting into the head of every Frenchman during the World Cup final penalty shoot-out, and taunting the crowd during Villa's Europa Conference League quarter-final in Lille. He also famously once distracted Manchester United 's Bruno Fernandes - asking the Portuguese why he was taking penalties instead of Cristiano Ronaldo. The subsequent spot-kick was crashed against the crossbar. He's making no apologies for any of it. He just wants to win. Martinez said: "I think it's natural. I don't think about it, I just do it. It's in the moment. It's something that can happen, the adrenaline kicks in and sometimes you can't control it. "I don't look for it, it just comes. Sometimes when you see me from the outside, you think: 'He looks like a show-off'. But no, I'm just a normal guy, a family man. But I try everything I can to win the game when it is about winning. "I'm not apologising. I don't swear, I don't insult anyone. I try to help my team – that's all. I never insult any religion or any player. I always respect the players. I want to win the game. HAVE YOUR SAY! Where will Aston...

title: Kevin Sinfield returns as Leeds Rhinos raise hopes of late charge
content: Kevin Sinfield watched on as Leeds left fans dreaming of another charge to Old Trafford. The Rhinos icon was back on the Headingley pitch to help celebrate the anniversaries of the club's historic 2004 Grand Final success and 2014 Challenge Cup final glory. He famously led Leeds to eight Super League titles, including twice steering them home from fifth. And Leeds fans might now think something else special is stirring after this crucial victory over last season's beaten Grand Finalists Catalans. Fresh from signing a new deal this week, Rhinos boss Brad Arthur knew his side realistically had to win to keep their top-six hopes alive. And they did just that after recovering from a 6-0 interval deficit with unanswered second-half tries from David Fusitu'a, Matt Frawley and Lachie Miller. In a nod to the past, Rhinos rolled back their matchday prices to 2004, charging as little as £6 per ticket. Fans certainly got their money's worth. Leeds moved up to seventh, only two points behind fifth-placed Catalans - who were depleted of troops here - and St Helens in fourth, with just four games to go. The... (Image: Olly Hassell/SWpix.com)

title: Pep Guardiola reveals he broke unwritten Man City transfer rule to re-sign Ilkay Gundogan
content: Pep Guardiola claims he broke his transfer rules to sign Ilkay Gundogan because he was so keen to have him back at Manchester City. Gundogan is 34 in October and Guardiola says he has made it a policy not to sign anyone too old. But he happily binned that rule when he became aware Gundogan wanted to return to City, 14 months after leaving on a free, because Barcelona wanted to get him off their wage bill. "As a manager, I'm not a big, big fan of re-signing players with this age," said the City boss. "But I know him quite well and his mentality is right. He's a huge competitor and with the financial situation at Barcelona, he came back on a free. "We talked about that and said 'OK, we can do it'. The negotiations between the clubs were none of my business and the salary as well. It happened and we had to try." Guardiola immediately said yes when the pair spoke on the phone and having looked for a midfielder, he says Gundogan has the intelligence and ability to perform a number of roles. Guardiola, who is still without the injured Rodri against Ipswich on Saturday, said: "He... (Image: Getty Images)

title: Ghaziabad News: ननिहाल आए आठ वर्षीय बच्चे के साथ किशोर ने किया कुकर्म
content: मोदीनगर। निवाड़ी स्थित एक गांव में ननिहाल में आए आठ वर्षीय बालक को किशोर ने सुनसान स्थान पर ले जाकर उसके साथ कुकर्म किया। विरोध करने पर आरोपी ने बालक की पिटाई की। बालक परिजनों के साथ कार्रवाई के लिए 12 घंटे तक थाने में भटकता रहा। पुलिस ने बालक को बृहस्पतिवार रात मेडिकल जांच कराने के लिए भेजा। निवाड़ी स्थित एक गांव में विवाहिता बच्चों के साथ अपने मायके आई थी। बच्चों के पिता ने आरोप लगाया कि बृहस्पतिवार सुबह गांव निवासी किशोर उनके आठ वर्षीय पुत्र को सुनसान स्थान पर ले गया और उसके साथ कुकर्म किया। बालक के विरोध करने पर किशोर ने गला दबाकर जान से मारने का प्रयास किया। घर लौटने पर बालक ने आपबीती बताई। बालक के परिजन घटना का विरोध करने आरोपी के यहां पहुंचे तो आरोपी पक्ष ने उनके साथ अभद्रता करते हुए मारपीट कर दी। बालक को लेकर परिजन निवाड़ी थाने पहुंचे। बालक के पिता का आरोप है कि थाना पुलिस उन्हें सुबह 10 बजे से रात दस बजे तक टरकाती रही। परिजनों के बार-बार मिन्नतें करने पर भी पुलिस का दिल नहीं पसीजा। पुलिस ने रात करीब 10.30 बजे बालक को मेडिकल जांच के लिए भेजा। एसीपी ज्ञानप्रकाश राय ने बताया कि थाना पुलिस का देरी से कार्रवाई करने का प्रकरण उनके संज्ञान में नहीं है। बालक के मामा की तहरीर के आधार पर रिपोर्ट दर्ज कर आरोपी किशोर को पकड़ लिया गया है।

title: RFK Jr., Suspends His Campaign and Endorses Trump. What Will Be the Impact?
content: In a surprising twist to the 2024 presidential race, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. has suspended his independent campaign and endorsed Donald Trump. This move has sent ripples through the political landscape, prompting analysts and voters alike to speculate on the potential consequences of this endorsement. Will it give Trump an advantage? If so, will it be enough to beat Harris in November? Kennedy cited free speech, the war in Ukraine and what he called “a war on our children” as among the reasons he wishes to suspend his candidacy and try to remove his name from the ballot in battleground states. “These are the principal causes that persuaded me to leave the Democratic Party and run as an independent, and now to throw my support to President Trump,” Kennedy said. He has however, urged his supporters to continue to back him in states where the impact would not be great on the outcome of the election. He has further stated that his internal polls have shown that his presence in the race would hurt Trump and help Democratic nominee Kamala Harris, something that given his endorsement of Trump, he now clearly does not wish to do. Recent public polls however, suggest that his impact on either major-party candidate would in any case be negligible, especially as his support had waned greatly in the past few weeks. However, numerous political pundits generally believe that Kennedy, a figure who has lately become more and more the subject of mockery and derision, has a following that...

title: “Sin miedo, Presidente”: Alcalde Codina increpa al Gobierno tras fatal balacera en Puente Alto
creator: Polet Herrera
content: El jefe municipal de Puente Alto se refirió al enfrentamiento entre bandas rivales en el sector de Bajos de Mena, que dejó dos muertos. En ese contexto, instó a "combatir esta delincuencia con dureza, con fuerza y sin miedo, Presidente”. Durante la tarde de este viernes, se registró una balacera en Puente Alto, en la Región Metropolitana. El incidente habría sido producto de un enfrentamiento entre bandas rivales en la calle Alcalde Valenzuela Llanos, en el sector Bajos de Mena. En ese contexto, el alcalde de Puente Alto, Germán Codina , señaló que ha denunciado esta situación desde marzo ante la Delegación Presidencial, el Ministerio Público, Carabineros y diversas autoridades. Efectivos policiales resguardan el ingreso al centro de salud familiar Karol Wojtyla. Crédito: Lukas Solis / Agencia Uno. “Incluso he solicitado la realización de allanamientos masivos en Valenzuela Llanos. En esta zona tenemos un conflicto entre bandas que, aunque hoy parece ser simplemente un enfrentamiento entre ellas, tiene a miles de personas encerradas y sometidas a la delincuencia en sus propios departamentos”, subrayó el jefe comunal. title: AP Sports SummaryBrief at 7:51 p.m. EDT
AP Sports SummaryBrief at 7:51 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Big 12 leaders to discuss potentially inviting UConn after school makes pitch, AP sources say Big 12 presidents are scheduled next week to discuss potentially inviting UConn to the conference after school officials recently made an in-person pitch to the league, two people familiar with the discussions tell The Associated Press. The people say a plan to add UConn, which has won the last two men’s college basketball national championships, would include the school’s football team staying independent before being added to the Big 12 in 2031. It would also not require current members to take a cut in their current expected conference revenue. US Open 2024: Jannik Sinner fired two of his team members over his positive steroid tests in March NEW YORK (AP) — Jannik Sinner has fired his fitness trainer and physiotherapist because of his two positive steroid tests in March. He said at his pre-U.S. Open news conference on Friday that he knew he was innocent but still was worried about what the case’s outcome would be until finding out he wouldn’t be suspended. The 23-year-old Italian is the top-seeded man at the year's last Grand Slam tennis tournament, which begins Monday in New York. Sinner is scheduled to meet first-round opponent Mackie McDonald on Tuesday. Sinner said it wasn't ideal to have this case happening right before the U.S. Open but he also said the resolution was a relief. title: Monclovenses son víctimas de fraude por agencia de viajes de Puebla
creator: redaccion@eltiempomonclova.mx (El Tiempo Monclova)
content: Defraudan a 22 pensionados de Monclova y Saltillo Alrededor de 22 personas pensionadas y jubiladas de Monclova y Saltillo fueron defraudadas por la agencia de viajes Go Travel de Puebla , la cual contrataron para un viaje de placer a Perú programado partir el día 8 de agosto, pero 24 horas antes les cancelaron sin explicación ni devolución de dinero, por lo que se trasladaron esta semana a esa ciudad a protestar en las oficinas del negocio. El fraude asciende a más de un millón de pesos, porque los afectados pagaron 50 mil pesos cada uno , pero luego de su protesta, resultan cada vez más víctimas de la agencia de viajes, pues llegaron otras personas procedentes de Veracruz que también habían sido engañados por viajes a otros destinos. Dentro de la gravedad del asunto, es que el propietario de Go Travel es Leonardo Ortiz, quien es presidente de la Asociación Mexicana de Agencias de Viajes, en Puebla, y se anunciaba como colaborador de la Secretaría de Turismo de Puebla. Griselda Linares y otros afectados, quienes se encuentran en el estado de Puebla, comentaron que el dueño no ha dado la cara, solo envió unos abogados para pagar, pero faltan muchos de cumplirles, así que permanecerán allá hasta el lunes para seguir protestando y se les sumarán más afectados de Monclova y Saltillo. Dijeron que interpusieron una demanda ante la Fiscalía de Justicia del Estado de Coahuila, por fraude y van a poner queja ante la Procuraduría Federal del consumidor, la...

title: Ambala News: ट्रांसफार्मर शिफ्टिंग पर विवाद, फिर फूटा गुस्सा
content: अंबाला। सड़कों पर लगे ट्रांसफार्मर अब स्थानीय लोगों के लिए परेशानी का सबब बनते जा रहे हैं। ऐसे में उन्हें अब हादसे का डर सता रहा है। ऐसे ही एक मामले में विवाद हो गया। छावनी के क्राॅस राेड नंबर पांच दीना की मंडी में रहने वाले लोगों ने रोष जताया और कहा कि जो ट्रांसफार्मर पहले सड़क पर था, उसे अब उनके घर के आगे लगाया जा रहा है जोकि आने मुसीबत बन जाएगा। इससे घर से निकलना मुश्किल हो जाएगा। स्थानीय निवासी राजीव गोयल ने बताया कि सड़क को चौड़ा किया जा रहा है और इस कारण जो ट्रांसफार्मर सड़क पर लगा था, उसे अब उनके घर के आगे लगाने की तैयारी की जा रही है। ऐसे में घर में आने जाने के लिए नाममात्र ही जगह रहेगी। घर में बुजुर्ग और छोटे बच्चे हैं। ऐसे में अगर ट्रांसफार्मर से चिंगारी निकली या आग लग जाए तो फिर हादसा भयावह होगा और इसकी जिम्मेदारी बिजली निगम की होगी। मौके पर मौजूद अन्य लोगों ने भी बिजली निगम की इस कार्रवाई पर एतराज जताया और इस ट्रांसफार्मर को खाली जगह पर लगाने की मांग की। सुभाष पार्क से 12 क्रास रोड तक लगे ट्रांसफार्मर सुभाष पार्क से आलू गोदाम तक और यहां से 12 क्राॅस रोड बिजली निगम के कार्यालय तक सड़क किनारे लगभग 10 से अधिक ट्रांसफार्मर लगे हैं जो काफी पुराने हैं। इन ट्रांसफार्मरों को रिहायशी क्षेत्रों से हटाने के लिए पूर्व में भी कई रोष प्रदर्शन हो चुके हैं और इनसे आगजनी की घटनाएं भी हो चुकी हैं, बावजूद इसके इन्हें यहां से हटाने का काम नहीं किया लेकिन अब सड़क चौड़ीकरण का काम हो रहा है, ऐसे में इन ट्रांसफार्मरों को सड़क से हटाने के लिए बिजली निगम ने कार्रवाई शुरू की है। इसलिए अब इन ट्रांसफार्मरों को लोगों के घरों के नजदीक लगाना बिजली निगम के लिए सिरदर्दी बन गया है और रोजाना इसका...

title: Inaugura Rector de la UATx laboratorio de usos múltiples y Biblioteca en Odontología
creator: Redacción Sintesis
content: Para fortalecer la infraestructura universitaria alineada con el Plan Institucional de Mejoramiento Acelerado (PIMA), el Doctor Serafín Ortiz, Rector de la Universidad Autónoma de Tlaxcala (UATx), también inauguró nuevos espacios en la Facultad de Odontología: la biblioteca y el laboratorio de usos múltiples, con una inversión aproximada a un millón y medio de pesos. En su intervención, el Rector afirmó que la Autorrealización es el sello que marca a nuestra Universidad porque es la única en el país que tiene cuatro funciones sustantivas como son docencia, investigación, extensión de la cultura y autorrealización, la cual incide para que el educando se transforme durante su estancia en las aulas. Expuso que el alma mater de Tlaxcala tiene una ruta para poner en marcha espacios físicos como estos que hoy se ponen al servicio de estudiantes y docentes, como es también la reciente inauguración de la Plaza de la Grandeza y la Autorrealización, aspecto que refleja el interés por incentivar el orgullo de pertenencia entre la comunidad universitaria, hecho que permite que la UATx sea un claustro donde no hay huelgas ni suspensiones de clases. Más adelante, subrayó que la UATx seguirá buscando opciones para que los estudiantes tengan mayor inclusión en universidades extranjeras; recordó la reciente visita del Excelentísimo embajador de Estados Unidos, Kent Salazar, en la cual se abrió la posibilidad de establecer un mayor acuerdo para reforzar la...

title: Cek dan Download Formasi CPNS Kemendikbud 2024 untuk Lulusan SMP, SMA, D3, D4, hingga S1
content: - Ya, membuka seleksi untuk lulusan SMP, SMA, diploma 3 (D3) hingga diploma 4 (D4) dan sarjana (S1). Tahun 2024 ini, ristek akan membuka total sebanyak 40.541 formasi CPNS dan PPPK. Masing-masing formasi CPNS Kemendikbud 2024 sebanyak 15.462 formasi. Kemudian untuk formasi PPPK sebanyak 25.079 formasi. Pada seleksi ini, Kemdikbud akan banyak memerlukan SDM di lingkungan perguruan tinggi, termasuk para dosen. Tak hanya untuk formasi guru, formasi CPNS Kemdikbud 2024 berdasarkan Keputusan Menpan RB Nomor 11 Tahun 2024, juga akan dibuka guna mengisi jabatan pelaksana yang dapat didaftar oleh lulusan SMP, SMA, D3, dan D4 atau S1 pda pendaftaran nanti. Berdasarkan laman Instagram @kemdikbud.ri, Anda bisa memantau laman https://casn.kemdikbud.go.id/ dan https://sscasn.bkn.go.id/. Formasi juga bisa didownload di link https://sscasn.bkn.go.id/ jika sudah tersedia. 1. Pengumuman Seleksi 19 Agustus s.d 2 September 2024 2. Pendaftaran Seleksi 20 Agustus - 6 September 2024

title: Sergi Roberto llega al Como 1907 de Cesc Fábregas
creator: Redacción
content: Sergi Roberto fichó por el Como 1907, club dirigido por el también español Cesc Fábregas. Roberto, que llega como agente libre tras el fin de su larga asociación con el Barcelona, se comprometió en un contrato de dos años con el recién ascendido equipo de la Serie A este viernes. El Como 1907 expresó su entusiasmo por la adquisición en un comunicado oficial: "Como 1907 se complace en anunciar el fichaje del centrocampista Sergi Roberto por dos años . El ex capitán del Barcelona, ​​que se incorporó al club con 14 años y ganó siete campeonatos de La Liga y dos Champions League, se incorpora al club como agente libre", declaró el club. Carrera del jugador español El currículum de Roberto incluye 479 partidos de competición, entre los que se incluyen encuentros de la Copa del Rey, partidos del Mundial de Clubes y partidos con la selección española. Estos logros resaltan la amplia experiencia que aporta al Como, elevando potencialmente el rendimiento de la plantilla. Esta transición se produce en un momento crítico para el Como, que recientemente regresó a la Serie A y afrontó un difícil comienzo con una derrota por 3-0 contra la Juventus, dirigida por Thiago Motta . Tras el partido, Fábregas mencionó que la falta de calidad en la plantilla contribuyó a la derrota. La plantilla del Como de esta temporada ya cuenta con nombres notables como los españoles Pepe Reina y Alberto Moreno, el francés Raphaël Varane y los italianos Andrea Belotti y Patrick...

title: Soal Video Syur yang Beredar, Kuasa Hukum Azizah Salsha: Fitnah dan Hoaks
content: Selebgram membantah yang beredar adalah video dirinya. Istri pesepak bola ini menyebut video yang di awalnya beredar di X itu adalah fakta yang tidak betul. Pernyataan ini disampaikan melalui kuasa hukumnya, . "Artinya bersifat fitnah dan hoaks," ucap di Bareskrim Mabes Polri, Jakarta Selatan, Jumat (23/8/2024). Ega kembali menegaskan bahwa subjek dalam video itu bukan Azizah. "Secara tegas iya. Secara tegas kita sampaikan bahwa seluruh isi yang disampaikan oleh tweet atau keributan atau lainnya yang beberapa hari ini itu sudah disampaikan juga secara langsung oleh Aziza, itu fitnah dan bohong, berita bohong," tutur Ega lagi. Diberitakan sebelumnya, Azizah melaporkan 12 akun penyebar fitnah dan pencemaran nama baik ke Direktorat Tindak Pidana Siber Bareskrim Polri dengan nomor laporan STTL/292/VIII/2024/BARESKRIM pada 21 Agustus 2024. Hukum yang disangkakan adalah Pasal 45 Ayat (4) Jo Pasal 27A UU RI No. 1 Tahun 2024 Tentang Perubahan Kedua Atas UU RI No.11 Tahun 2008 tentang perubahan kedua atas UU RI No.11 Tahun 2008 tentang Informasi dan Transaksi Elektronik (ITE) dan atau Pasal 310 KUHP dan atau Pasal 311 KUHP. Pada 20 Agustus 2024 netizen menduga Azizah berselingkuh dengan Salim Nauderer penyebab putusnya hubungan kekasih Rachel Vennya. Alhasil netizen berbondong-bondong mengungkap berbagai hal tentang Azizah termasuk disebut memiliki .

title: Thói quen mua bán xe không sang tên đổi chủ dễ 'tiền mất tật mang'
content: Từ vụ việc ông B.X.H. tranh chấp sau khi mua xe máy nhãn hiệu Honda SH gắn biển số "ngũ quý 9" cho thấy thói quen mua bán xe cũ bằng giấy tờ viết tay và không làm thủ tục sang tên đổi chủ gây ra không ít phiền hà. Hiện nay, nhiều người vẫn có thói quen này. Anh N.X.Kh (trú tại Thanh Trì, Hà Nội) cho biết, anh mua lại xe máy nhãn hiệu Honda Lead mang biển số Hà Nội của một người quen vào tháng 10/2023 nhưng đến nay chưa đi làm thủ tục sang tên đổi chủ. "Tôi nghĩ mua xe máy của người quen nên không cần đi làm thủ tục sang tên, chưa lường tới tình huống tranh chấp tài sản hoặc gặp rắc rối khi bị phạt nguội", anh N.X.Kh chia sẻ. Chị N.T.H. (trú tại Thanh Xuân, Hà Nội) chia sẻ, dù đã bán 2 xe máy đứng tên của mình nhưng chưa bao giờ chị đi làm thủ tục sang tên đổi chủ. "Khi bán xe, tôi được họ viết cho 1 tờ giấy biên nhận rồi ký vào chứ không phải làm thủ tục sang tên đổi chủ. Người mua nói rằng ai cũng làm vậy nên tôi không thắc mắc gì thêm", chị N.T.H. nói. Nghị định 100/2019 sửa đổi, bổ sung tại nghị định 123/2021 quy định, trường hợp mua bán xe máy cũ nhưng không làm thủ tục sang tên đổi chủ sẽ phạt tiền từ 400 nghìn - 600 nghìn đồng với cá nhân và 800 nghìn - 1,2 triệu đồng đối với tổ chức. Với ô...

title: 'Hypocritical' governments
creator: Contributed
content: A recent article stated 35% of Canadians feel financially worse off than they were three months ago. It also mentioned food banks are bracing for an increase in the number of people using them. Other articles have talked about how tourism is down in B.C. and across Canada. Could it be many Canadians are stressed to the limit financially because they have to pay more for the necessities of life? How many can no longer afford the horrendous amounts it costs to go on a vacation? Maybe, if the provincial and federal governments relaxed or cut taxes instead of continually increasing them, people would have more disposable income to afford some finer things in life. Maybe, if the federal government spent the money on Canadians instead of any country that's looking for a handout, many Canadians would be better off. This is my opinion but as long as the powers that be remain as (in power), I doubt any relief will be forthcoming. I also wonder why our governments, which say we need to "go green,” ship our oil and coal and other polluting resources to other countries, not to mention how Canada ships garbage to third world countries for disposal. These same governments then impose a carbon tax on Canadians to pay for a greener future. It's OK for Canada to point the finger at other countries and condemn their “dirty” environmental practices as long as squeaky clean Canada can toot its horn about how we're combating climate change. How hypocritical. People continue to become worse off...

title: Big 12 leaders to discuss potentially inviting UConn after school makes pitch, AP sources say
creator: By RALPH D. RUSSO - AP College Football Writer
content: Big 12 presidents are scheduled next week to discuss potentially inviting UConn to the conference after school officials made an in-person pitch to the league that included a hefty investment in the Huskies' struggling football program, two people familiar with the discussions told The Associated Press on Friday. The people said a plan to add UConn, which has won the last two men's college basketball national championships, would include the school's football team staying independent before being added to the Big 12 in 2031 and not require current members to take a cut in their current expected conference revenue share. The people spoke to the AP on condition of anonymity because the conference and school were not making their discussions public. The Athletic first reported the Big 12’s renewed interest in UConn. UConn officials were in Dallas last week to present to the Big 12 a plan for major investments to the athletic programs, the vast majority of which would be focused on football, one of the people said. Big 12 Commissioner Brett Yormark, a former executive with the Brooklyn Nets, has long been intrigued with getting a foothold in the New York area market, where the Big East school has a huge following. Spokespeople for UConn, the Big 12 and the Big East all declined a request for comment. Big 12 membership has been cool on the idea of adding the Huskies to their already powerful basketball conference because UConn's football program has been flailing for years and...

title: Big 12 leaders to discuss potentially inviting UConn after school makes pitch, AP sources say
content: Big 12 presidents are scheduled next week to discuss potentially inviting UConn to the conference after school officials made an in-person pitch to the league that included a hefty investment in the Huskies' struggling football program, two people familiar with the discussions told The Associated Press on Friday. The people said a plan to add UConn, which has won the last two men's college basketball national championships, would include the school's football team staying independent before being added to the Big 12 in 2031 and not require current members to take a cut in their current expected conference revenue. The people spoke to the AP on condition of anonymity because the conference and school were not making their discussions public. The Athletic first reported the Big 12’s renewed interest in UConn. Big 12 Commissioner Brett Yormark, a former executive with the Brooklyn Nets, has long been intrigued with getting a foothold in the New York area market, where UConn has a tremendous presence. Big 12 membership has been cool on the idea of adding the Huskies to their already powerful basketball conference because UConn's football program has been flailing for years and they feared the school would not add value to the league. But adding the school in a cost neutral move could be appealing. The Big 12’s new six-year agreements with ESPN and Fox kick in next year and will pay members about $31.7 million per school annually. title: Suspect charged with murder and animal cruelty in fatal carjacking of 80-year-old dog walker
creator: By MARTHA BELLISLE - Associated Press
content: SEATTLE (AP) — King County prosecutors filed charges Friday against a man they say forced his way into a vehicle occupied by a beloved 80-year-old Seattle dog walker and then running over her, killing her, and later stabbing her dog to death. Jahmed Kamal Haynes, 48, was charged with first-degree murder, second-degree assault and first-degree animal cruelty, according to a document filed with the court. Prosecutors asked that he be held in the jail without bail and the judge agreed. Haynes is scheduled to be arraigned on Sept. 5. It was not immediately known if Haynes had a lawyer or would be assigned one by the King County Public Defense office. Officials say they don't believe Haynes knew Dalton. Ruth Dalton was parked on the side of the road in Seattle's Madison Valley neighborhood at about 10 a.m. Tuesday when Haynes got into the passenger side, prosecutors said. Dalton started to drive away while Haynes tried to take control of the vehicle, they said. He pushed her out and onto the road, backed into several parked cars before driving over her as he fled the scene, prosecutors said. Several bystanders tried to intervene, one carrying a bat or stick, but Haynes threatened them with a knife, prosecutors said. After he left, the witnesses attempted life-saving measures but Dalton died at the scene. After leaving the neighborhood, Haynes stabbed Dalton's dog to death in a park, prosecutors said. “The sheer brutality of the defendant’s actions that morning was only further...

Tapi ya itu boleh-boleh saja, nanti tinggal apakah mereka bisa meyakinkan hakim bahwa mereka adalah saksi yang mereka terima," kata Ito. Ito juga menanggapi pernyataan saksi baru yang tidak pernah dimintai keterangan oleh penyidik kasus Vina. Menurut Ito, pihak penyidik pasti akan melihat dari kasus ini siapa saja yang akan ditanya dan terkait masalahnya. "Ini kan tentunya bukan berarti polisi akan mencari sedemikian banyak saksi, tanpa ada relevansinya," kata Ito. Ito justru heran kenapa saksi-saksi baru ini justru lari ke media sosial untuk menyampaikan keterangannya, bukan malah ke penyidik kepolisian. Ito juga menyoroti adanya saksi yang dihadirkan di sidang Peninjauan Kembali (PK) Saka Tatal. "Persidangan Saka Tatal, ada yang mengaku saksi. Saksi kapasitasnya itu dia harus melihat, medengar dan mengerahui langsung," tegas Ito. Setelah itu, Ito menyinggung saksi ahli yang harusnya menyampaikan analisis dari terjadinya kasus. Menurut Ito, jika ahli ini menyoroti tentang kecelakaan lalu lintas, maka minimal dia sudah pernah berdinas di Korlantas Mabes Polri serta memiliki sertifikat terkait itu. title: AMDC habilita puntos móviles y extiende horarios para recibir pago de Bienes Inmuebles
creator: Hondudiario Redacción
content: *** Los puntos móviles habilitados están en Mall Multiplaza, Cascadas Mall, City Mall, Mall Premier y en Villa San Miguel en el Centro de Tegucigalpa. En una semana vence el pago del Impuesto de Bienes Inmuebles para que las personas que poseen un terreno, una vivienda o un edificio se pongan al día con la Alcaldía Municipal del Distrito Central (AMDC). Es por esa razón, que la comuna capitalina acercó los servicios a la población al habilitar puntos móviles en el área financiera de diferentes centros comerciales, donde se puede consultar el estado de cuenta y la cantidad que le adeudan a la alcaldía. Los puntos móviles habilitados están en Mall Multiplaza, Cascadas Mall, City Mall, Mall Premier y en Villa San Miguel, ubicado en el centro histórico de la ciudad, lo que les permite allí mismo hacer el pago en el banco de su preferencia. De igual forma, las oficinas de la Gerencia de Atención al Ciudadano y de la Gerencia de Recaudación de la comuna estarán abiertas este sábado 24 agosto para atender a los contribuyentes que aún estén pendientes con el pago del impuesto municipal. Se atenderá en un horario de 8:00 de la mañana a 12:00 del mediodía. Este horario extendido aplica para las ventanillas del edificio AER y el edificio ejecutivo, ambos ubicaos en el centro de Tegucigalpa. Asimismo, las ventanillas de las oficinas de atención en el centro comercial Los Castaños, en el bulevar Morazán. La gerente de Recaudación y Control Financiero de la...

title: Legisladores aprueban extinción de órganos autónomos
creator: Sonia Ariadna Pérez Barrón
content: Nacional comentarios Legisladores aprueban extinción de órganos autónomos Con 22 legisladores a favor, 17 en contra y cero abstenciones, el proyecto fue aprobado en lo general Legisladores aprueban extinción de órganos autónomos como el INAI Consejeros del Inai. FOTO: DANIEL AUGUSTO /CUARTOSCURO.COM (Daniel Augusto) Por Sonia Barrón Opens in new window 23 de agosto 2024 a las 17:50 hrs. La Comisión de Puntos Constitucionales de la Cámara de Diputados avanzó en la discusión de una de las propuestas del ‘Plan C’, proyecto impulsado por el gobierno federal que busca la extinción de siete organismos autónomos. Esta iniciativa que forma parte de un paquete de reformas para reorganizar el aparato gubernamental , tiene el objetivo de mejorar la eficiencia y reducir el gasto público al centralizar diversas funciones en el Poder Ejecutivo. Ante una votación que dio como resultados 22 legisladores a favor , 17 en contra y cero abstenciones , el proyecto fue aprobado en lo general . “La Comisión de Puntos Constituciones de @Mx_Diputados aprobó en lo general el dictamen para eliminar 7 organismos autónomos . Falta toda una ruta legislativa para que se logre, daremos seguimiento puntual y seguir defendiendo los derechos de los mexicanos. Esto se acaba hasta que se acaba. Lamentable”, declaró la comisionada Julieta del Río Venegas, a través de la plataforma ‘X’ (Twitter). ¿Qué institutos perderían su autonomía? Los órganos autónomos que la propuesta del ‘Plan C’...

title: Exploring Sony’s Foray into Ethereum Layer 2 Networks
creator: Paul Ugbede Godwin
content: In a groundbreaking move that marks a significant milestone in the convergence of traditional electronics and blockchain technology, Sony has announced the imminent launch of its own Ethereum Layer 2 network, dubbed “Soneium.” This initiative represents a bold step by the Japanese tech conglomerate, known for its innovative consumer electronics, to carve out a space in the rapidly evolving blockchain ecosystem. The development of Soneium is a testament to Sony’s commitment to fostering an open internet environment. By leveraging the Ethereum blockchain, Sony aims to create a platform that transcends the current limitations of Web2, offering a decentralized and scalable solution that could revolutionize various industries, including entertainment, gaming, and finance. The Soneium Network is poised to operate as a Layer 2 solution, which means it will function atop the existing Ethereum blockchain, benefiting from its security and decentralization while offering faster transaction speeds and reduced costs. This is made possible through the use of rollup technology, specifically Optimism’s OP Stack, which bundles multiple transactions into a single one, thus enhancing efficiency and scalability. title: Ismael “El Mayo” Zambada se opone a ser trasladado ante una Corte de Nueva York
creator: Alejandra Bedoya
content: Estados Unidos.- Ismael “El Mayo” Zambada , detenido a finales de julio en un aeropuerto de Nuevo México, estaría oponiéndose a ser trasladado a Nueva York , pues este viernes 23 de agosto se reveló que su abogado, Frank Pérez, ha presentado una impugnación a la solicitud de la Fiscalía de Estados Unidos que fue aprobada la semana pasada. Según el documento, los defensores de “El Mayo” han argumentado ante la Corte Federal del Distrito Oeste de Texas que no hay justificación para que el traslado sea aplicado como se solicita, además, sostienen que la petición de las autoridades estadounidenses para que su caso sea turnado al Distrito Este de Nueva York carece de fundamentos: (...) la interpretación que hace el gobierno de la Regla 5 es incompatible con su propósito. Dado que el gobierno lee de forma aislada, no reconoce la importancia como piedra angular de la Regla 5 basada en principios de larga data del derecho consuetudinario. Te puede interesar: Jueza de Texas aprueba traslado de Ismael “El Mayo” Zambada a Nueva York El argumento central de la defensa es que la “interpretación del gobierno sobre la Regla 5 de procedimiento penal no es consistente con su propósito original”, pues esta establece que cualquier persona arrestada en los Estados Unidos debe ser presentada ante un juez “sin demoras innecesarias” y en la jurisdicción donde fue detenida. Adicionalmente, señalan que la regla contempla solo una comparecencia inicial por acusado y por distrito a la...

title: Cambio climático batió varios récords de sequía en 2023
creator: Carlos Salazar
content: Washington, 23 ago (Prensa Latina) El cambio climático batió varios récords de sequía en 2023, con casi el ocho por ciento de la superficie terrestre gravemente afectada, según un nuevo informe de la Administración Nacional Oceánica y Atmosférica (NOAA). El calor, el nivel del mar y los gases de efecto invernadero alcanzaron niveles récord mientras se reduce el hielo marino, describe el reporte de la estadounidense NOAA. A nivel mundial, el 29,7 por ciento de la tierra experimentó categorías moderadas o peores de sequía durante el año pasado, otra cifra récord. Las concentraciones de los gases de efecto invernadero, la temperatura global en la tierra y el océano, el nivel global del mar y el contenido de calor del océano establecieron más registros máximos en la temporada. Dicho informe muestra un panorama de un mundo que se calienta con impactos que se ven en todo el planeta, en otra señal para generaciones actuales y futuras, dijo en un comunicado Derek Arndt, director de los Centros Nacionales de Información Ambiental de la NOAA. La temperatura superficial global anual fue de 0,55 a 0,60 grados Celsius superior a la media de 1991-2020, siendo 2023 el año más cálido desde que comenzaron los registros en el siglo XIX. Los principales gases de efecto invernadero, dióxido de carbono, metano y óxido nitroso, alcanzaron niveles récord durante el pasado calendario. El contenido de calor oceánico global hasta una profundidad de dos mil metros alcanzó...

title: Apuñalan a múltiples personas en festival de música en Alemania y confirman saldo mortal
creator: Andrea Ruiz
content: Reportan ataque en festival de música de Solingen Tres personas perdieron la vida Las autoridades investigan los hechos El Festival de la Diversidad, que conmemoraba el 650 aniversario de la ciudad de Solingen en Alemania, se vio empañado por un trágico incidente el pasado viernes. Un hombre armado con un cuchillo atacó a los asistentes al evento, dejando un saldo de tres personas muertas y al menos cuatro heridos de gravedad, según informaron las autoridades locales. El ataque tuvo lugar en la plaza central de Fronhof, donde cientos de personas se habían reunido para celebrar. El ataque ocurrió poco después de las 21:30 horas, cuando testigos alertaron a la policía sobre un hombre desconocido que había herido a varias personas con un cuchillo. FATAL ATAQUE PONE DE LUTO AL FESTIVAL DE MÚSICA EN SOLINGEN La policía local desplegó un operativo de emergencia para capturar al agresor, quien logró huir del lugar antes de ser detenido. Hasta el momento, las autoridades no han proporcionado información sobre la identidad o el motivo del atacante. TAMBIÉN PUEDE INTERESARTE: Familia de hispano pide ayude para repatriarlo tras su muerte Philipp Müller, uno de los organizadores del festival, subió al escenario principal para calmar a la multitud y pidió a los asistentes que mantuvieran la calma y se mantuvieran alerta. «Lamentablemente, el autor del ataque no ha sido capturado», dijo Müller. «Muchas personas han sido heridas por un hombre con cuchillo». ¿Qué...

title: Pengamanan Pilkada PPU Diperketat, Polres Kerahkan 433 Personel
content: - Pengamanan pada jalannya tahapan di Kabupaten (PPU) mulai dilakukan. Situasi mulai diperketat, jelang hari pendaftaran bakal calon kepala daerah di Kantor Komisi Pemilihan Umum (KPU) PPU. Kapolres PPU AKBP Supriyanto mengatakan, personel mulai bersiaga pada 26 Agustus 2024 untuk mengawal jalannya tahapan pendaftaran. Setelah proses pendaftaran selesai, dilanjutkan pada tahapan verifikasi berkas oleh KPU. "Kita mulai laksanakan pada 26 Agustus, itu mulai operasi mantap praja Pilkada 2024 27-29 pendaftaran, lalu verifikasi," ungkapnya pada Jumat (23/8/2024). Tidak berhenti di situ, pengamanan berlapis juga akan dilakukan terutama saat kampanye hingga pencoblosan. Terdapat perbedaan pola yang dilakukan selama masa , lantaran bakal calon kepala daerah ini akan bersentuhan langsung dengan masyarakat. "Tentu ada perbedaan. Selain itu pada pilkada ini, satu TPS itu akan diisi oleh lebih banyak pemilih dibandingkan pemilu lalu, jadi pengamanannya juga berubah," jelasnya. Sebelumnya, sebanyak dua pertiga atau sekitar 433 personel akan disiagakan untuk mengamankan jalannya tahapan . Dalam beberapa kesempatan, personil kepolisian juga akan ada yang ditempatkan, di rumah-rumah calon kepala daerah yang telah ditetapkan oleh KPU PPU. "Untuk saat ini situasi kondusif, dan kita berharap itu terus berlanjut, mari kita jaga kondusifitas di daerah kita selama tahapan ini berlangsung," pungkasnya.

title: Tem 1.93m e é campeão olímpico: Samu Omorodion é o novo número 9 do FC Porto
content: Depois das saídas de Evanilson e Mehdi Taremi, e a da provável saída de Toni Martínez, aí está o avançado de Vítor Bruno. Samu Omorodion é o primeiro reforço dos portistas para a temporada 2024/25. O futebolista tem 20 anos, 1.93m, pertencia ao Atlético Madrid (jogou no Alavés por empréstimo, marcando oito golos) e acabou de ser campeão olímpico pela seleção espanhola, em Paris. O FC Porto pagou 15 milhões de euros por 50% dos direitos economícos. O contrato de Samuel Omorodion Aghehowa é válido até 2029 e a clásula de rescisão de Omorodion foi fixada nos 100 milhões de euros. Segundo a página oficial do FC Porto, o novo reforço tem pais nigerianos e é natural de Melilla, o enclave espanhol no norte de África. “No espaço de dez meses, entre setembro de 2023 e julho deste ano, o possante avançado estreou-se nas seleções de sub-19, sub-21 e sub-23 espanholas”, pode ler-se no website do clube. “Acabado de conquistar a medalha de ouro nos Jogos Olímpicos de Paris, Samu Omorodion junta-se ao plantel às ordens de Vítor Bruno e passa a vestir a camisola azul e branca com o número 9.” Termos e Condições Todos os comentários são mediados, pelo que a sua publicação pode demorar algum tempo. title: Ông, bà nhận cháu làm con nuôi được không?
content: Luật gia Phạm Văn Chung trả lời về việc nhận con nuôi như sau: Tại điều 13 Luật Nuôi con nuôi năm 2010 quy định về hành vi bị nghiêm cấm gồm: - Lợi dụng việc nuôi con nuôi để trục lợi, bóc lột sức lao động, ; bắt cóc, mua bán trẻ em. - Giả mạo giấy tờ để giải quyết việc nuôi con nuôi. - giữa con đẻ và con nuôi. - Lợi dụng việc cho con nuôi để về dân số. - Lợi dụng việc làm con nuôi của thương binh, người có công với cách mạng, người thuộc để hưởng chế độ, chính sách ưu đãi của Nhà nước. - Ông, bà nhận cháu làm con nuôi hoặc anh, chị, em nhận nhau làm con nuôi. - Lợi dụng việc nuôi con nuôi để vi phạm pháp luật, , đạo đức, truyền thống văn hóa tốt đẹp của dân tộc. Như vậy, theo quy định trên pháp luật cấm việc ông, bà nhận cháu làm con nuôi, nên vợ chồng ông không thể nhận cháu nội làm con nuôi. Tuy nhiên nếu ông, bà muốn giúp cháu thì ông, bà có thể tặng, cho tài sản cho cháu khi ông, bà đang còn sống hoặc di chúc để lại tài sản cho cháu sau khi ông, bà mất. Trường hợp ông, bà không để lại di chúc về tài sản của mình thì cháu ông vẫn được hưởng thừa kế thế vị theo điều 652 Bộ luật Dân sự năm 2015.

title: Papa recebe homem absolvido após 33 anos de prisão
content: O Papa recebeu esta sexta-feira em audiência privada, na Biblioteca do Palácio Apostólico, Beniamino Zuncheddu, pastor da Sardenha que passou 33 anos na prisão, acusado de um triplo homicídio em 1991, e que foi absolvido em janeiro passado. Preso aos 26 anos de idade, Zuncheddu e o seu advogado escreveram um livro, intitulado “Estou inocente”, oferecido a Francisco, no qual se relata a “experiência trágica” em três prisões diferentes. “Uma experiência desumana, mas durante a qual pôde ajudar aqueles que estavam em pior situação do que ele. A sua força para resistir era a confiança em Deus e o facto de pensar na sua família”, indica uma nota divulgada pelo portal de notícias do Vaticano. O Vatican News refere que Zuncheddu “perdoou aqueles que o tinham apontado como o assassino múltiplo, retratando-se mais tarde das suas acusações”. Termos e Condições Todos os comentários são mediados, pelo que a sua publicação pode demorar algum tempo. Os comentários enviados devem cumprir os critérios de publicação estabelecidos pela direcção de Informação da Renascença: não violar os princípios fundamentais dos Direitos do Homem; não ofender o bom nome de terceiros; não conter acusações sobre a vida privada de terceiros; não conter linguagem imprópria. Os comentários que desrespeitarem estes pontos não serão publicados.

title: Tin tức thế giới 24-8: Đức lo Nga tấn công Ukraine hôm nay; Mỹ trừng phạt Nga và công ty Trung Quốc
content: Ngày 23-8, Mỹ đã áp lên hơn 400 thực thể và cá nhân vì đã hỗ trợ chiến dịch quân sự của Nga tại Ukraine. Trong số này có các công ty Trung Quốc bị giới chức Mỹ cáo buộc đang giúp Nga lách lệnh trừng phạt của phương Tây và xây dựng quân đội, theo Hãng tin Reuters. Theo thông tin từ Bộ Ngoại giao Mỹ, lệnh trừng phạt nhắm vào một số công ty Trung Quốc tham gia vận chuyển máy móc và thiết bị vi điện tử đến Nga. Bộ Tài chính Mỹ cho biết Washington cũng nhắm mục tiêu vào các mạng lưới xuyên quốc gia tham gia mua đạn dược và các vật tư khác cho Nga, giúp các nhà tài phiệt Nga và những người khác trốn các lệnh trừng phạt. Theo Reuters, Đại sứ quán Nga tại Washington chưa phản hồi khi được đề nghị bình luận về các lệnh trừng phạt mới. Theo báo , Đức đã cảnh báo công dân nước này rằng các cuộc không kích của Nga vào các thành phố của Ukraine có thể tăng lên trong ngày 24-8, tức Ngày Độc lập của Ukraine (24-8-1991 - 24-8-2024). Họ khuyến cáo công dân Đức không đến Ukraine, còn những người đã đến sẽ được "yêu cầu rời khỏi đất nước khẩn cấp". Bộ Ngoại giao Đức lưu ý rằng vào thời điểm Ngày Độc lập của Ukraine, "có nguy cơ gia tăng các cuộc tấn công bằng tên lửa và trên không nhằm vào các khu...

title: రాహుల్‌గాంధీకి పెండ్లయిందా? లేదా?
creator: bharath kumar
content: హైదరాబాద్‌, ఆగస్టు 23 (నమస్తే తెలంగాణ): కాంగ్రెస్‌ అగ్రనేత రాహుల్‌గాంధీకి పెండ్లయిందా? లేదా?.. పెళ్లయ్యిందంటూ బ్లిట్జ్‌ పత్రికలో ప్రచురితమైన కథనంపై వివరణ ఇవ్వాలని బీజేపీ ఎంపీ రఘునందన్‌రావు డిమాండ్‌ చేశారు. శుక్రవారం ఆయన ఢిల్లీలో రాహుల్‌గాంధీ కార్యాలయానికి వెళ్లి, అక్కడి సిబ్బందికి బ్లిట్జ్‌ పత్రిక ను అందజేశారు. ఆయన స్వయంగా పత్రికను చదివి, అందులో వచ్చిన కథనంపై ప్రజలకు సమాధానం చెప్పాలని డిమాండ్‌చేశారు. భారతదేశ వ్యవహారాలకు సంబంధించి విదేశీ మీడియా సంస్థ హిండెన్‌బర్గ్‌ ఇచ్చిన నివేదిక సరైనదేనని రాహుల్‌గాంధీ, కాంగ్రెస్‌ వాదిస్తున్నపుడు, బ్లిట్జ్‌ కథనం కూడా సరైనదేనా? అని ప్రశ్నించారు. హైదరాబాద్‌, ఆగస్టు 23 (నమస్తే తెలంగాణ): తల్లి స్వార్జిత ఆస్తిపై పిల్లలకు హకులు ఉండవని, స్వార్జిత ఆస్తిని తనకు ఇష్టం వచ్చిన వాళ్లకు ఇచ్చే అధికారం తల్లికి ఉంటుందని హైకోర్టు కీలక తీర్పు చెప్పింది. హైదరాబాద్‌ జూబ్లీహిల్స్‌లో సుశీల్‌ అగర్వాల్‌ అనే మహిళకు భర్త నుంచి సంక్రమించిన ఇంటిని ముగ్గురు కుమారులకు సమానంగా పంచకుండా పెద్దకుమారుడి పేరుతో గిఫ్ట్‌ సెటిల్మెంట్‌ డీడ్‌ చేయడాన్ని సివిల్‌ కోర్టు సమర్ధించింది. దీన్ని సవాల్‌ చేస్తూ భజరంగ్‌లాల్‌ అగర్వాల్‌ అనే వ్యక్తి హైకోర్టులో దాఖలు చేసిన అప్పీల్‌ పిటిషన్‌ను జస్టిస్‌ మౌసమీ భట్టాచార్య, జస్టిస్‌ ఎంజీ ప్రియదర్శిని ధర్మాసనం కొట్టివేసింది. ఆ ఆస్తిని ఉమ్మడి కుటుంబ ఆస్తిగా ప్రకటించాలన్న వాదన చట్ట వ్యతిరేకమని తేల్చింది. ఆ ఆస్తి యజమానిగా తల్లికే పూర్తి హకులు ఉంటాయని తీర్పు చెప్పింది.

title: Si el gobernador manda terna de aspirantes a la FGE el lunes, de inmediato tomamos medidas: Jucopo
creator: Melissa Martínez
content: Culiacán, Sinaloa. En cuanto se reciba la terna de los aspirantes a la titularidad de la Fiscalía General del Estado (FGE) el Congreso del Estado va a proceder inmediatamente a iniciar el procedimiento para elegir en el pleno a quien vaya a ocupar el cargo, que pudiera ser un hombre o mujer, aseguró el diputado presidente de la Junta de Coordinación Política (Jucopo) del Congreso del Estado, Feliciano Castro Meléndrez. Te puede interesar: ¡Quieren el mejor perfil! Así las reacciones por el proceso de selección para el nuevo fiscal de Sinaloa A pregunta expresa sobre si habría alguna línea o favoritismo en la elección de la nueva o nuevo fiscal, descartó tal situación, ya que argumentó que se van a conducir con apego a derecho, se va a atender la propuesta que formule el gobernador Rubén Rocha Moya y habrán de hacer la revisión correspondiente. “Si el gobernador nos manda la terna el lunes a primera hora, inmediatamente estaríamos tomando las medidas para cubrir la ruta”, dijo. Castro Meléndrez explicó que una vez que llegue la terna estaría sesionando ya sea la Diputación Permanente o el Pleno para recepcionar el documento, posteriormente se turnaría a la Comisión de Puntos Constitucionales y Gobernación, para que este programe la comparecencia de los tres nombres que lleguen.
