title: Historic Baralaba Hotel near Rockhampton goes up in flames as 13 people are treated by paramedics
content: Historic Baralaba Hotel near Rockhampton goes up in flames as 13 people are treated by paramedics Baralaba Hotel south-west of Rockhampton goes up in flames READ MORE: Aussie tourists lose everything after massive fire engulfs 16 villas By Michael Pickering For Daily Mail Australia Published: 00:32, 24 August 2024 | Updated: 00:44, 24 August 2024 e-mail 1 View comments An historic 100-year-old country pub has erupted in flames, forcing the emergency evacuation of patrons. The Baralaba Hotel about 150km south-west of Rockhampton in Queensland was consumed by fire in the early hours of Saturday morning. Paramedics assessing 13 patients at the scene, reported the Courier Mail . A Queensland Fire Department spokeswoman told the publication that 11 people were evacuated from the hotel and that all guests had been accounted for. 'They searched the rooms and they were all clear,' she said. Video of the blaze shows the front part of the pub and the roof well alight. It was reported the structure's rook subsequently collapsed. Fire crews took three hours to extinguish the blaze after they were called to the scene shortly after 2am. Businesses in the area have been affected by power outages and smoke as a result of the fire. Video of the blaze shows the front part of the pub and the roof well alight. It was reported the structure's roof subsequently collapsed The pub's Facebook page informs visitors the hotel was originally licensed on April 3, 1929 and was originally known as...

title: Алаудинов: Бойцы "Ахмата" взяли в плен 10 военных ВСУ в Курской области
content: По его словам, за минувшую пятницу противник лишился под Курском танка, пяти бронемашин, стольких же единиц автомобильной техники, РЭБ "Буковель", одной пушки. При этом было уничтожено много пехоты. "Морпехи сегодня опять отличились... Они взяли 10 пленных - молодцы, мужики, красавцы!", - добавил Алаудинов. Ранее он заявлял, что украинские военные в Курской области начали активно сдаваться в плен . А на днях сообщил , что российские военные не позволяют формированиям ВСУ подтягивать свежие резервы на это направление. По данным Минобороны РФ, с шестого августа - дня, когда ВСУ напали на Курскую область, - потери украинских подразделений уже превысили пять тысяч человек. title: Maharajganj News: आरक्षण टिकट नहीं मिलने से यात्रियों को होती परेशानी
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, महाराजगंज
content: बृजमनगंज। स्थानीय रेलवे स्टेशन पर यात्रियों को आरक्षण टिकट नहीं मिलती है, इससे 18 किलोमीटर दूर आनंदनगर यात्रियों को आना पड़ता है। इसके लिए यात्रियों ने कई बार मांग की, लेकिन समस्या का समाधान नहीं हुआ। बृजमनगंज रेलवे गोरखपुर-गोंडा रेलवे लाइन के 55वें किलोमीटर पर स्थित बृजमनगंज रेलवे स्टेशन बहुत पुराना है। दो जनपदों महाराजगंज व सिद्धार्थनगर को जोड़ने वाला रेलवे स्टेशन से दूर दराज से रोजाना 2000 की संख्या में लोग आते हैं। यहां से 18 किमी दूर फरेंदा और 21 किमी सिद्धार्थनगर यात्री जाकर आरक्षण टिकट लेने जाते हैं। क्षेत्र के महेश जायसवाल का कहना है कि क्षेत्र के लोगों को आमान परिवर्तन के बाद से ही यह उम्मीद थी कि इसका कायाकल्प कर यह अनेक सुविधाओं से सुसज्जित होगा, लेकिन यह देश के विभिन्न बड़े शहरों के स्टेशनों से भी जुड़ गया। क्षेत्र के समाज सेवी शशिकांत जायसवाल का कहना है कि लोटन ,उसका,धानी, लेहड़ा तक के यात्री बृजमनगंज स्टेशन से दिल्ली , मुंबई , बगलोर , लखनऊ ,सूरत , पंजाब की यात्रा ट्रेन से करते हैं। स्टेशन पर बैठने बुनियादी सुविधाओं के अभाव के अलावा यहां आज तक आरक्षण काउंटर भी नहीं खोला गया है। स्टेशन मास्टर केपी सिंह ने बताया की आरक्षण खोलने या बंद करना डिवीजन से होता है। संवाद

title: Lionel Messi Begins on-field Workouts, Could Rejoin Inter Miami before MLS Playoffs
creator: كاتب
content: Miami coach Tata Martino said Friday that Lionel Messi has begun individual on-field training this week and could be ready to join Inter Miami on the field before the end of the MLS regular season. Messi has been out with a right ankle injury since Argentina’s July 14 Copa America final win over Colombia. He will not play when Inter Miami hosts FC Cincinnati on Saturday, and was omitted from Argentina’s national team roster for its two September World Cup qualifiers. He has not played for Inter Miami since July 1, but Martino said he could join the team in full training soon.

title: Remodelarán infraestructura cultural en Hidalgo
content: La titular de la Secretaría de Cultura estatal, Neyda Naranjo Baltazar, informó que pretenden remodelar la infraestructura cultural en Hidalgo que durante años estuvo en el abandono, por lo cual se buscan también atender los centros culturales regionales. La funcionaria estatal detalló que se ha dado mantenimiento a los espacios culturales de la entidad que administra la dependencia como el Centro Cultural El Ferrocarril, aunado a que también atenderán el resto de la infraestructura estatal que mantiene la institución. Local Actividad cultural crece en Tulancingo con actual gobierno De acuerdo con la encargada de la cultura en la entidad, se pretenden impulsar una serie de acciones de conservación y atención de la infraestructura pública, por lo cual aseveró que se ha ampliado la oferta cultural en el territorio estatal para que la ciudadanía conozca sobre las distintas actividades que se desarrollan tanto en Pachuca como en el resto del estado. Agregó que en el caso de las bibliotecas se requiere de la intervención tanto federal como municipal, por lo que se ha reunido con los presidentes municipales electos para atender los espacios de lectura, donde han permanecido en el abandono durante años. Asimismo, indicó que deben fomentar el hábito de la lectura entre los menores de edad, por lo cual desarrollan salas de lectura en las bibliotecas para que realicen un diplomado por la Secretaría de Cultura federal y reciben un acervo de cien libros para...

title: Công thức để Chủ tịch Nguyễn Đức Tài 'nhân bản' chuỗi Bách Hóa Xanh: Đổi từ chợ hiện đại sang siêu thị mini; tăng rau, thịt cá có thương hiệu
content: Sau thời gian "càng làm càng lỗ", quý II/2022, Chủ tịch Thế giới di động Nguyễn Đức Tài tuyên bố: Nhờ đó, lũy kế 7 tháng đầu năm, chuỗi bách hóa đem về 23.000 tỷ đồng doanh thu, tăng 40% so với cùng kỳ. Riêng tháng 7, doanh thu đạt hơn 3.600 tỷ đồng, tăng gần 28% so với cùng kỳ năm trước, trong đó cả 2 ngành hàng tươi sống và FMCG đều duy trì mức tăng trưởng 2 chữ số so. Doanh thu bình quân trong tháng 7 đạt 2,1 tỷ đồng/cửa hàng. Hiện chuỗi có 1.704 cửa hàng, tăng 3 cửa hàng so với cuối tháng 6/2024. Sau 2 năm tập gym toàn hệ thống, Bách Hóa Xanh bắt đầu thu quả ngọt, ông Tài cũng tìm ra "công thức" để nhân rộng chuỗi bán lẻ bách hóa của mình. Báo cáo nhận định về "Công thức thành công của Bách Hóa Xanh", nhóm phân tích của Chứng khoán KB cho rằng, MWG đã "hái quả ngọt" khi thực hiện chính sách tái cấu trúc với việc tái định vị thương hiệu từ "chợ hiện đại" sang "siêu thị mini". Công thức này xuất phát từ chiến lược " " từng được ông Tài nhấn mạnh trong các Đại hội cổ đông gần đây. Sau thời gian "miệt mài" đóng cửa các điểm bán hoạt động không hiệu quả, quý II/2024, Bách Hóa Xanh bắt đầu mở lại các siêu thị mini. báo cáo của KBSV viết và dự đoán thêm, trong năm nay, Bách Hóa Xanh có thể...

title: Kongres III Partai NasDem Undang Jokowi, Prabowo Hingga Anies
creator: Teguh Firmansyah
content: REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA -- Partai NasDem akan menggelar Kongres III pada 25-27 Agustus 2024. Presiden RI Joko Widodo hingga Presiden terpilih 2024-2029 Prabowo Subianto dijadwalkan menghadiri kegiatan tersebut. "Kongres ini menjadi common ground -nya, jadi kemungkinan Pak Prabowo juga datang pembukaan dan penutupan tapi secara formal pembukaan oleh Presiden Jokowi penutupan oleh Pak Prabowo sebagai Presiden terpilih," ujar Ketua SC Kongres III NasDem Willy Aditya dalam konferensi pers di NasDem Tower, Jumat (23/8/24) Willy menjelaskan seluruh partai politik juga diundang dalam kongres ketiga Partai NasDem ini. Sebab, kongres NasDem ini menjadi momentum rekonsiliasi Partai NasDem. "Tidak ada yang tidak kita undang, jadi semua partai politik kita undang, karena inilah momentumnya untuk rekonsiliasi. Tidak hanya manis di bibir tapi pahit di kenyataan, tidak. Tetapi, kebersamaan itu kita bangun dari ruang ada common ground-nya," tutur Willy. Willy menambahkan nantinya akan ada tiga komisi dalam pelaksanaan Kongres ke III NasDem antara lain Komisi AD/ART, Komisi Rekomendasi dan Komisi Program Aksi. Nantinya kata Willy juga akan ada lima isu besar yang akan dibahas mendalam antara lain isu negara hukum, green economy, politik, isu internasional, dan krisis lingkungan. NasDem menilai ada banyak hal yang perlu diluruskan dalam penegakan hukum di Indonesia. “Jadi bagaimana aparat penegak hukum, KPK, polisi, jaksa, kita tetap memiliki komitmen. title: ಪ್ರೇಮಕಥೆಯತ್ತ ಹೊರಳಿದ ಮಂಸೋರೆ
creator: ​ಪ್ರಜಾವಾಣಿ ವಾರ್ತೆ
content: ‘19.20.21’ ಸಿನಿಮಾ ಬಳಿಕ ನಿರ್ದೇಶಕ ಮಂಸೋರೆ ಅವರು ಹೊಸ ಪ್ರಾಜೆಕ್ಟ್‌ ಕೈಗೆತ್ತಿಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ‘ದೂರ ತೀರ ಯಾನ’ ಎಂಬ ಪ್ರೇಮಕಥೆಯನ್ನು ಹಿಡಿದು ಪ್ರೇಕ್ಷಕರೆದುರಿಗೆ ಬರಲಿರುವ ಮಂಸೋರೆ, ಸೆ.3ರಿಂದ ಶೂಟಿಂಗ್‌ ಆರಂಭಿಸಲಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಡಿ.ಕ್ರಿಯೇಷನ್ಸ್‌ನ ದೇವರಾಜ್‌ ಆರ್‌. ನಿರ್ಮಾಣ ಮಾಡುತ್ತಿರುವ ಈ ಸಿನಿಮಾದ ಶೀರ್ಷಿಕೆ ಟೀಸರ್‌ ಇತ್ತೀಚೆಗೆ ಅನಾವರಣಗೊಂಡಿತು. ‘ನಾನು ಇಲ್ಲಿಯವರೆಗೆ ಮಾಡಿರುವ ಸಿನಿಮಾಗಳು ನನಗೆ ತೃಪ್ತಿಕೊಟ್ಟಿವೆ. ಕಥೆ ಹೇಳುವ ರೀತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹೊಸತನ ರೂಢಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಬೇಕು ಎಂದು ಒಂದು ವರ್ಷ ಅವಧಿ ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಂಡೆ. ನನ್ನದೊಂದು ಹೊಸ ಪಯಣ ಎನ್ನಬಹುದು. ಇದೊಂದು ಪ್ರೇಮಕಥೆ. ಹೆಚ್ಚಿನ ಸಂಖ್ಯೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರೇಕ್ಷಕರನ್ನು ತಲುಪೋಣ ಎಂದು ಈ ಕಥೆ ಆರಿಸಿಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದೇನೆ. ಇದೊಂದು ನ್ಯೂಜನರೇಷನ್‌ ಪ್ರೇಮಕಥೆ. ಕಳೆದ ಒಂದು ವರ್ಷದ ಅಧ್ಯಯನ ನನ್ನ ಬದಲಾವಣೆ ಹಿಂದಿದೆ. ಪ್ರೇಕ್ಷಕರು ಯಾವ ವಿಷಯಗಳನ್ನು ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಳ್ಳುತ್ತಾರೆ ಎನ್ನುವುದನ್ನು ಅರಿತಿದ್ದೇನೆ. ಸಿನಿಮಾದಲ್ಲಿ ಮಂಸೋರೆ ಸಿಗ್ನೇಚರ್‌ ಇದ್ದರೂ ಹೇಳುವ ರೀತಿ ಹೊಸತಾಗಿದೆ. ನಾಲ್ಕು ಸಿನಿಮಾಗಳನ್ನು ಬಿಟ್ಟು ಹೊಸ ರೀತಿ ಸಿನಿಮಾ ಇದು.’ ಎನ್ನುತ್ತಾರೆ ಮಂಸೋರೆ. ಕಥೆಯ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಸುಳಿವು ನೀಡಿದ ಮಂಸೋರೆ, ‘ಇದೊಂದು ಟ್ರಾವೆಲಿಂಗ್‌ ಸ್ಟೋರಿ. ಚಿತ್ರದ ಮೊದಲ ಹತ್ತು ನಿಮಿಷ ಮಾತ್ರ ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆಯುತ್ತದೆ. ಉಳಿದೆಲ್ಲಾ ಕಥೆ ದಾರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಸಾಗುತ್ತದೆ. ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನಿಂದ ಗೋವಾಕ್ಕೆ ಹೊರಟ ಹುಡುಗ - ಹುಡುಗಿ ತಮ್ಮ ಪ್ರೀತಿಯನ್ನು ಹೊಸ ರೀತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಕಂಡುಕೊಳ್ಳುವ ಕಥೆ ಇದಾಗಿದೆ. ಇದನ್ನು ಮ್ಯೂಸಿಕಲ್‌ ಜರ್ನಿ ಸಿನಿಮಾ ಎನ್ನಲೂಬಹುದು. ವೃತ್ತಿ–ಪ್ರವೃತ್ತಿ ನಡುವೆ ಪ್ರೀತಿಯ ಹುಡುಕಾಟವಿದು’ ಎಂದರು. ಚಿತ್ರದಲ್ಲಿ ವಿಜಯ್ ಕೃಷ್ಣ ನಾಯಕರಾಗಿ ಹಾಗೂ ಪ್ರಿಯಾಂಕ ಕುಮಾರ್ ನಾಯಕಿಯಾಗಿ ನಟಿಸುತ್ತಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಬಕೇಶ್ ಹಾಗೂ ಕಾರ್ತಿಕ್ ಸಂಗೀತ ಸಂಯೋಜಿಸುತ್ತಿರುವ ಆರು ಹಾಡುಗಳು ಸಿನಿಮಾದಲ್ಲಿರಲಿವೆ. ಶೇಖರ್‌ಚಂದ್ರ ಛಾಯಾಚಿತ್ರಗ್ರಹಣ, ನಾಗೇಂದ್ರ ಕೆ. ಉಜ್ಜನಿ ಸಂಕಲನ, ಚೇತನ ತೀರ್ಥಹಳ್ಳಿ ಸಂಭಾಷಣೆ ಚಿತ್ರಕ್ಕಿದೆ. ಪ್ರಜಾವಾಣಿ ಆ್ಯಪ್ ಇಲ್ಲಿದೆ:...

title: ಅಚಲ ವಿಶ್ವಾಸದ ಅನಿತಾ
creator: ಅಂಜಲಿ ರಾಮಣ್ಣ
content: ಮದುವೆಯಾದ ಕೂಡಲೇ ಜೀವನ ಸತ್ವವೇ ಅರ್ಧವಾಗಿ ಹೋಗುತ್ತದೆ ಎಂದು ನಂಬಿಕೊಂಡಿರುವ ಮತ್ತು ಹಾಗೆಯೇ ವರ್ತಿಸುವ ಸ್ನೇಹಿತೆಯರು ನಮ್ಮ ನಡುವೆಯೇ ಓಡಾಡುತ್ತಿರುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಒಂದು ಮಗುವಾಗಿ ಬಿಟ್ಟರಂತೂ ಮುಗಿದೇ ಹೋಯಿತು. ಸ್ವಬದುಕಿನೆಡೆಗೆ ಎಲ್ಲಾ ನಿಜಾರ್ಥದ ಆಸಕ್ತಿಯನ್ನು ಕಳೆದುಕೊಂಡು ಇಲ್ಲ ಸಲ್ಲದ ಕಾರಣ ಕೊಟ್ಟು ಮೈಯನ್ನು ಯದ್ವಾತದ್ವ ಬೆಳೆಸಿಕೊಂಡು ಮನಮುಟ್ಟದ appearance, approach ಮತ್ತು acceptance ಜೊತೆಗೆ ಹೊಂದಾಣಿಕೆ ಮಾಡಿಕೊಂಡಿರುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಇಂತಹ ಮಹಿಳೆಯರನ್ನು ಹೊಡೆದೆಬ್ಬಿಸಿ ಜೀವಜಲವನ್ನು ಸಿಂಪಡಿಸುವಂತೆ ಇದ್ದಾರೆ ಅನಿತಾ ರಾಠಿ. 42 ವರ್ಷ ವಯಸ್ಸಿನ ಅನಿತಾಗೆ ಮದುವೆಯಾಗಿ 22 ವರ್ಷಗಳು. ಮೂರು ಮಕ್ಕಳ ತಾಯಿ. ತೂಕ ಹೆಚ್ಚಾಗಿ ಆರೋಗ್ಯ ದೂರವಾಗಲು ಆರಂಭವಾದಾಗ ರಾಜಸ್ಥಾನದ ಬಾರ್ಮರ್ ಜಿಲ್ಲೆಯ ಅನಿತಾ ಜಿಮ್‍ಗೆ ಸೇರಿಕೊಳ್ಳುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಬೆಳಗಿನ ಜಾವ 4 ಗಂಟೆಗೆ ಎದ್ದು ಸಂಸಾರದ ಜವಾಬ್ದಾರಿ ನಿರ್ವಹಿಸಿ 3 ಗಂಟೆಗಳ ಕಾಲ ತಮ್ಮ ದೇಹದ ಮೆಲೆ ವ್ಯಯಿಸುವ ಅನಿತಾ ಭಾರ ಎತ್ತುವುದರಲ್ಲಿ ಗಟ್ಟಿಗಿತ್ತಿ ಎನ್ನುವುದನ್ನು ಮನಗೊಂಡ ಆಕೆಯ ಜಿಮ್ ತರಬೇತುದಾರರು ಹೆಚ್ಚಿನ ಗಮನಕೊಟ್ಟು ಆಕೆಯನ್ನು ಭಾರ ಎತ್ತುವ ಸ್ಪರ್ಧೆಗೆ ಸಿದ್ಧಳಾಗುವಂತೆ ತಯಾರು ಮಾಡುತ್ತಾರೆ. ತನಗೆ ತಾನೇ ಸಖ ಎನ್ನುವುದನ್ನು ಬಲವಾಗಿ ನಂಬಿಕೊಂಡ ಅನಿತಾ ರಾಜಸ್ಥಾನದ ಕೋಟಾದಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆದ ರಾಜ್ಯ ಮಟ್ಟದ ಭಾರ ಎತ್ತುವಿಕೆ ಸ್ಪರ್ಧೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಚಿನ್ನದ ಪದಕ ಗಳಿಸುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಔರಂಗಾಬಾದಿನಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆದ ಸ್ಪರ್ಧೆಯಲ್ಲೂ ವಿಜಯಿ ಈಕೆ. ನಂತರ ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆದ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರೀಯ ಭಾರ ಎತ್ತುವ ಸ್ಪರ್ಧೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರಮಟ್ಟದಲ್ಲಿ ಬೆಳ್ಳಿ ಪದಕ ಗಳಿಸುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಅನಿತಾ ಇದೇ ವರ್ಷದ ಮೇ ತಿಂಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಅಮೆರಿಕದಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆದ ಅಂತರರಾಷ್ಟ್ರೀಯ ಸ್ಪರ್ಧೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಭಾರತವನ್ನು ಪ್ರತಿನಿಧಿಸಿ ಬಂದಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಇಂತಹ ಸ್ಪೂರ್ತಿ ತುಂಬುವ ಕಥೆಗಳನ್ನು ಕೇಳಿದಾಗ ’ಅವಳಿಗೇನು ಕುಟುಂಬದ ಸಪೋರ್ಟ್ ಇರತ್ತೆ. ನಮಗೆ ಹಾಗಿಲ್ಲವಲ್ಲ’ ಗೊಣಗುವವರೇ ಹೆಚ್ಚು. ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಬಂಧನವೇ ನಿಜಾರ್ಥದ ಬಿಡುಗಡೆ ಎನ್ನುವುದನ್ನು ಅರ್ಥ ಮಾಡಿಕೊಂಡು ತನ್ನದೇ ಮನದ ಬಾವಿಯ ಹೂಳನ್ನು ತಾನೇ ಎತ್ತುವ ಮಹಿಳೆ ಎಂದೂ ನೆನಪಿನಲ್ಲಿ...

title: ತೂಕ ತಾಕತ್ತಿನ ತಾಕಲಾಟ
creator: ಸುಶೀಲಾ ಡೋಣೂರ
content: ಸ್ಪರ್ಧೆಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಹೆಣ್ಣುಮಕ್ಕಳ ತೂಕದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಇರುವ ಅತಾರ್ಕಿಕ, ಅವೈಜ್ಞಾನಿಕ ನಿಯಮಗಳು ಬದಲಾಗಬೇಕು. ತೂಕಕ್ಕೆ ಸಂಬಂಧಿಸಿದ ನಿಯಮಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಸಡಿಲಿಕೆಯನ್ನು ತರಬೇಕು. ಹೆಣ್ಮಕ್ಕಳೂ ಅಷ್ಟೇ, ತಮ್ಮ ತೂಕದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಸಣ್ಣ ತಿಳಿವಳಿಕೆ, ಒಂದಷ್ಟು ಮುತುವರ್ಜಿ ಇದ್ದರೆ ಸಾಕು. ತೀರಾ 50 ಗ್ರಾಂ, 100 ಗ್ರಾಂಗಳ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಚಿಂತಿಸಲು ಬದುಕೇನೂ ಓಲಂಪಿಕ್ಸ್‌ ಕ್ರೀಡಾಂಗಣವಲ್ಲ... ಇವತ್ತಿನಿಂದಲ್ಲ, ಯಾವತ್ತಿನಿಂದಲೂ ಅಷ್ಟೇ, ಹೆಣ್ಣಿಗೂ ಅವಳ ತೂಕಕ್ಕೂ ಒಂದು ಅತಾರ್ಕಿಕ, ಅವೈಜ್ಞಾನಿಕ ನಂಟು ಜೋಡಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಹೆಣ್ಣು ಹೇಗಿರಬೇಕು ಎನ್ನುವುದಕ್ಕೆ ‘ತೆಳ್ಳಗೆ, ಬೆಳ್ಳಗೆ’ ಎನ್ನುವ ಸಿದ್ಧಸೂತ್ರವೇ ಇದೆಯಲ್ಲವೆ? ಆದರೆ ಎಲ್ಲರೂ, ಎಲ್ಲಾ ಸಮಯದಲ್ಲೂ ಒಂದೇ ತೂಕ ಕಾಯ್ದುಕೊಳ್ಳಲು ಹೇಗೆ ಸಾಧ್ಯ? ಯಾವಾಗ ತೂಗಿದರೂ, ಎಷ್ಟು ಸಲ ತೂಗಿದರೂ ಒಂದೇ ರೀತಿಯಾಗಿರಲು ಅವಳೇನು ಕಟೆದಿಟ್ಟ ಕಲ್ಲಿನ ಮೂರ್ತಿಯಲ್ಲ, ಟೊಮೆಟೊ ಅಥವಾ ಸೇಬು ಕೂಡ ಅಲ್ಲ. ಸ್ಪರ್ಧೆಯ ನಿರ್ಣಾಯಕರಾಗಿರುವವರೆಗೂ ಇಷ್ಟು ಮಾತ್ರದ ತಿಳಿವಳಿಕೆ ಇದ್ದೇ ಇರುತ್ತದೆ. ಆದರೂ ಅದನ್ನು ಬದಿಗೊತ್ತಿ ನಿಯಮಗಳ ಪ್ರಕಾರ ಅವಳ ತೂಕವನ್ನು ಗ್ರಾಂಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಲೆಕ್ಕ ಹಾಕಿ ನಿರ್ಣಯ ಕೈಗೊಳ್ಳಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ. ಇತ್ತೀಚಿಗೆ ಒಲಂಪಿಕ್ಸ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ 100 ಗ್ರಾಂ ತೂಕದ ಕಾರಣ ವಿನೇಶ್‌ ಫೋಗಟ್‌ ಪದಕ ವಂಚಿತರಾದರು. ಈ ಚರ್ಚೆ ಹೆಣ್ಣುಮಕ್ಕಳ ತೂಕದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಮತ್ತೆ ಮಾತನಾಡುವಂತೆ ಮಾಡಿದೆ. ಈ 100 ಗ್ರಾಂ ತೂಕದ ಲೆಕ್ಕಾಚಾರ ಒಲಂಪಿಕ್ಸ್‌ನಂತಹ ನಿರ್ಣಾಯಕ ಘಟ್ಟಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಮಾತ್ರವಲ್ಲ, ಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ಸ್ಪರ್ಧೆಗಳಲ್ಲಿ, ಮಾಡಲಿಂಗ್, ಜಾಹೀರಾತು ನಟನೆಯಂಥ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಗುರುತಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವ ತಹತಹ ಇರುವ ಹೆಣ್ಣುಮಕ್ಕಳಿಗೂ ಮುಳುವಾಗುವುದಿದೆ. ಕುಸ್ತಿಪಟು ವಿನೇಶ್‌ ಫೋಗಟ್‌ ಕನಸು ಭಗ್ನವಾಗಲು ಕಾರಣವಾದ ತೂಕದ ಸಂಗತಿ ಎಲ್ಲೆಡೆ ಚರ್ಚೆ ಆಗುತ್ತಿದೆ. ಆದರೆ ಎಷ್ಟೋ ಸ್ಪರ್ಧೆಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ತೂಕದ ಕಾರಣಕ್ಕೆ ಚಿನ್ನದಂತಹ ಅವಕಾಶಗಳನ್ನು ಕಳೆದುಕೊಂಡ ನೂರಾರು, ಸಾವಿರಾರು ಉದಾರಣೆಗಳು ಎಲ್ಲೊ ಮುಚ್ಚಿ ಹೋಗಿರುತ್ತವೆ. ಋತುಚಕ್ರದ ಸಮಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಆಕೆಯ ತೂಕ ನೂರಾರು ಗ್ರಾಂ ಏರಿಳಿತವಾಗುವುದು ತೀರಾ ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯ. ಕೆಲವರಲ್ಲಿ 1ರಿಂದ 3ಕೆಜಿಯಷ್ಟು...

title: На фестивале мужчина с ножом напал на толпу: погибли люди
creator: Нина Ягодова
content: Три человека погибли в результате нападения мужчины на толпу отдыхающих на фестивале в честь 650-летия немецкого города Золинген. Еще девять человек получили ранения. Как сообщает Bild, врачи сейчас борются за жизни девяти пострадавших, три человека уже скончались от полученных ран. Причины нападения неизвестны. Сейчас преступник находится в бегах, место его нахождения устанавливается. Как ранее «Свободная Пресса», 22 августа на юго-востоке Москвы в квартире одного из жилых домов было обнаружено тело мужчины. По данным правоохранительных органов, погибшего зарезали.

title: Công nhân với nỗi lo mùa tựu trường
content: Những ngày này, cuộc sống của gia đình chị Lê Thị No (quê Trà Vinh) chật vật hơn bởi năm học mới đã bắt đầu trong khi chị đang thất nghiệp. Chị No là công nhân (CN) một công ty tư nhân tại quận Bình Tân, TP HCM. Mới đây, do khó khăn, công ty này phải ngừng hoạt động. Khi chị mất việc cũng là lúc con gái lớn thông báo đậu đại học, hai vợ chồng vừa mừng vừa lo. "Học phí đại học có phần quá sức đối với những gia đình CN. Thế nhưng, vất vả cỡ nào chúng tôi cũng phải lo, chỉ mong sau này các con có việc làm ổn định" - chị No bày tỏ. Chị đang tìm công việc mới để có tiền đóng học phí cho con. Mùa tựu trường cũng là lúc gia đình anh Cao Văn Đạt (quê Sóc Trăng) sống trong tâm trạng lo lắng vì các khoản phí đầu năm học mới cho các con. Vợ chồng anh đều là CN, tổng thu nhập khoảng 15 triệu đồng/tháng. Hai con đang tuổi ăn, tuổi học trong khi chi phí sinh hoạt tại TP HCM quá đắt đỏ nên anh chị đành gửi con gái lớn về quê nhờ ông bà chăm sóc. Kỳ lương cuối tháng 7 vừa qua, ngoài tiền sinh hoạt, vợ chồng anh Đạt gửi thêm cho ông bà 2 triệu đồng để mua tập, sách và quần áo cho con. Tháng 8, anh dự định dành dụm gửi thêm một khoản nữa để đóng học phí cho con. Còn cậu con trai nhỏ đang sống cùng anh chị ở...

title: «Все несут одинаковую ответственность». В ООН отреагировали на публикации замеченной в Курской области американской ЧВК
creator: Марина Совина
content: Все военные должны защищать гражданское население и инфраструктуру. Об этом заявил официальный представитель генерального секретаря Организации Объединенных Наций (ООН) Стефан Дюжаррик , комментируя публикации сражающейся за Киев американской частной военной компании (ЧВК) Forward Observation Group (FOG). Отвечая на вопрос РИА Новости, он подчеркнул, что ООН «часто выражала обеспокоенность по поводу использования частных военных подрядчиков по всему миру». «Все несут одинаковую ответственность в отношении прав человека», — указал Дюжаррик. При этом он отметил, что у ООН нет возможности подтвердить достоверность сообщений о присутствии на Украине западных ЧВК. Ранее председатель комиссии Общественной палаты РФ по вопросам суверенитета Владимир Рогов рассказал о числе воевавших за ВСУ иностранных ЧВК. По его словам, на стороне Киева воевало не менее шести-семи компаний. На FOG обратили внимание после из заявления об «их парнях в Курске» 23 августа ЧВК FOG продемонстрировала фотографию боевой позиции минометного расчета рядом с жилыми домами и детской площадкой — на человеке в форме, склонившемся над орудием, американские шевроны. Судя по дому, детской горке и пейзажу, действие происходит либо на территории России, либо Украины. Ствол миномета направлен прямо в сторону детской горки и дома. До этого наемники выложили фото, на котором они позируют на фоне бронемашины HMMWV в составе группы украинских бойцов. В качестве геолокации указана Курская область, подпись...

title: Сальдо заявил о планах наступления ВСУ на херсонском направлении с Черного моря
content: Губернатор Херсонской области Владимир Сальдо заявил, что силы специальных операций НАТО координируют планы украинской армии по наступлению на херсонском направлении. Утверждается, что удар будет наноситься с Черного моря с использованием безэкипажных катеров, штурмовых лодок и вертолетов. «Очевидно, враг снова попытается предпринять высадку со стороны Черного моря и Днепро-Бугского лимана на Тендровскую и Кинбурнскую косы с одной целью — поставить там флаги и показать Западу, что они якобы закрепились на территории Херсонской области»,— написал господин Сальдо в Telegram . По информации губернатора, наступление запланировано на День независимости Украины (24 августа). Россия взяла под контроль город Херсон на правом берегу Днепра в начала военной операции в 2022 году. В ноябре того же года войска были отведены . С тех пор российские военные контролируют в Херсонской области левый берег Днепра, украинские — правый. 22 августа. title: S.I. boxer now charged in Pennsylvania in daughter’s slaying; New details emerge
content: STATEN ISLAND, N.Y. — The case of a former professional boxer from Staten Island accused of killing his daughter has officially been reassigned to law enforcement in Pennsylvania. An affidavit filed in the Keystone state, meanwhile, offers new insight into the 2020 murder investigation. Kabary Salem, 56, of Deal Court in Rosebank, was initially charged in New York with second-degree murder. Then, days before jury selection for a trial on Staten Island, it was learned the case would instead be turned over to authorities in Pennsylvania. Police now believe the killing occurred in Lebanon County, Pennsylvania, based on the father’s cell phone records and lividity marks on the victim’s body, according to sources on Staten Island and a Pennlive.com report. The deceased, Ola Salem, 25, also of Rosebank, was strangled to death, officials allege. Her body was found in 2019 by a passerby in Bloomingdale Park. The case on Staten Island was dismissed in lieu of new charges filed across state lines. Kabary Salem is scheduled for arraignment Sept. 5. Ola Salem, 25, of Rosebank, was found covered in leaves and fully clothed in the popular park on Oct. 24 by a passerby, the Advance previously reported. (Facebook photo) Hours after Ola Salem’s body was found under leaves and branches, Kabary Salem spoke with investigators, according to an affidavit filed in Pennsylvania. He said that on Oct. 22, 2019, he picked up his daughter en route to Pennsylvania to paint a restaurant that he co-owned....

title: Ghaziabad News: किशोरी से छेड़छाड़ के दोषी को तीन साल कारावास
content: गाजियाबाद। किशोरी से छेड़छाड़ करने के दोषी ऋषि उर्फ मोनू को पॉक्सो कोर्ट ने तीन साल कारावास की सजा सुनाई है। विशेष न्यायाधीश लालबाबू यादव ने दोषी पर छह हजार रुपये का अर्थदंड भी लगाया है। विशेष लोक अभियोजक हरीश कुमार ने बताया कि विजयनगर थाना क्षेत्र रहने परिजन 24 मई 2015 की शाम को किशोरी के दादा को अस्पताल लेकर गए थे। इस कारण किशोरी घर में अकेली थी। उसी समय ऋषि वर्मा उर्फ मोनू जबरन उसके घर में घुस कर उससे छेड़छाड़ करने लगा। किशोरी ने शोर मचाया तो वह भाग गया। अगले दिन 25 मई को किशोरी के स्कूल जाते समय दोबारा छेड़छाड़ की। किशोरी ने इसकी जानकारी परिजनों की दी। उसके बाद किशोरी के पिता ने ऋषि वर्मा उर्फ मोनू के खिलाफ विजय नगर थाने में रिपोर्ट दर्ज कराई। शिकायत पर पुलिस ने उसे गिरफ्तार कर जेल भेज दिया था। इस मामले में पुलिस ने जांच के बाद छह अगस्त 2015 को आरोप पत्र पेश कर दिया था। पुलिस ने पांच गवाहों के बयान दर्ज कराए थे।

title: Nick Saban stands up for Ohio State football's Ryan Day against calls to be fired
content: Former Alabama head coach Nick Saban was on The Pat McAfee Show on ESPN talking about a bevy of topics relating to college football with one focused on Ohio State football head coach Ryan Day. There is a ton of expectations every year for the Buckeyes and especially Day where Saban was asked if he feels bad for the 45-year old head coach. Nick Saban relates to Ohio State football's Ryan Day on big expectations Saban would totally be on the side of Day where he even said that he relates to having high expectations for a college football program which is expected to win every game. He would go as far as to say that Day is a "really good coach" and that he will "do a really good job with his roster." "Look I've lived this life for 17 years, for 15 years we were expected to win every game," Saban said. "So it's hard for me to take the position to put that kind of pressure and that kind of expectation on any coach, Ryan Day included. Because you never know what's... Zachary Weinberger

title: Blue Jays' Ernie Clement's 'impossible' home run goes viral
content: On Thursday afternoon, Toronto Blue Jays third baseman Ernie Clement came up to the plate in the bottom of the second with no outs and a runner at first. In a 1-2 count against Los Angeles Angels pitcher Mike Baumann, not only did he hit a home run, but Clement now owns the record for the highest pitch hit in Blue Jays history. The 96.7 MPH fastball from Baumann was 4.60 feet off the ground when Clement made contact with it, making it the second-highest pitch hit for a home run in the pitch-tracking era (2008). The Toronto infielder's 10th of the season gives him three straight games with a home run. Clement's towering blast was no ordinary home run. The only pitch higher than the one Clement connected with was a 4.61-foot pitch hit by Kyle Higashioka in 2022, according to Statcast data, The difficulty of hitting such a pitch cannot be overstated. Clement even... Brayden Haena

title: Site visit emphasizes reforestation, fire recovery at Heil Valley Ranch
content: Nearly four years after the Calwood Fire burned more than 10,000 acres, Boulder County Parks and Open Space has its sights set on the area’s future forest. On Thursday, the Parks and Open Space Advisory Committee visited the Heil Valley Ranch open space with county forest experts. The public tour highlighted reforestation efforts underway in the Calwood Fire burn area. Stefan Reinold, resource management division manager with Parks and Open Space, was the county’s senior forester when the fire happened. “We had done a lot of work leading up to it, and then had to do a lot of work afterward,” Reinold said. The work started after the Overland Fire in 2003 completely burned the hillside near the Corral Trailhead parking lot. The Overland Fire started after winds broke a 20-foot tall tree, which blew into 13,200-volt power line, according to a Boulder County website. The Calwood Fire, which started October of 2020, burned 6,000 acres of Parks and Open Space property. Its name comes from the Cal-Wood Education Center in Jamestown. Investigators determined that the fire had started in an area near the school but did not determine the cause. The Calwood fire damaged or destroyed 26 structures and cost an estimated $6.6 million to fight. Between the Overland and Calwood fires, Parks and Open Space workers thinned 1,500 acres of forest at Heil Valley Ranch as a form of fire mitigation. Eventually, this morphed into a new goal – restoring the structure of the forest to one that can...

title: Ισλανδία: Επιβραδύνεται η ηφαιστειακή έκρηξη καθώς η λάβα ρέει από τη δεύτερη ρωγμή
creator: Πετρος Πετρόπουλος
content: Οι ισλανδικές αρχές ανακοίνωσαν την Παρασκευή ότι μια δεύτερη ρωγμή είχε σχηματιστεί στη νοτιοδυτική χερσόνησο Ρέικιανες, με την ηφαιστειακή δραστηριότητα να έχει μειωθεί. Μετά από εβδομάδες προειδοποιήσεων, η Μετεωρολογική Υπηρεσία της Ισλανδίας (ΙΜΟ) δήλωσε την Πέμπτη ότι μια νέα έκρηξη είχε ξεκινήσει στις 21:26 μ.μ. (2126 GMT) εκείνο το βράδυ, μετά από μια σειρά σεισμών. Εικόνες από βίντεο έδειξαν πορτοκαλί λάβα να ξεπηδά από μια μεγάλη ρωγμή, η οποία σύμφωνα με τον ΙΜΟ εκτιμάται ότι έχει μήκος 3,9 χιλιόμετρα. Νωρίς την Παρασκευή, ο ΙΜΟ ανακοίνωσε στα μέσα κοινωνικής δικτύωσης ότι μια δεύτερη ρωγμή είχε ανοίξει στα βόρεια της αρχικής. Σε νεότερη ενημέρωση, ο οργανισμός ανέφερε ότι «η ένταση της έκρηξης έχει μειωθεί σημαντικά από χθες». Πρόσθεσε ότι «η πιο ενεργή ρωγμή είναι αυτή που άνοιξε κατά τη διάρκεια της νύχτας». Αυτή είναι η έκτη έκρηξη που πλήττει την περιοχή από τον Δεκέμβριο, ενώ έρχεται μόλις δύο μήνες μετά το τέλος μιας προηγούμενης έκρηξης που διήρκεσε περισσότερες από τρεις εβδομάδες. Η τελευταία έκρηξη σημειώθηκε βόρεια των προηγούμενων εκρήξεων και δεδομένου ότι δεν έρεε λάβα προς τα νότια, αποτελούσε μικρότερο κίνδυνο για το κοντινό ψαροχώρι Γκρίνταβικ, το οποίο εκκενώθηκε το βράδυ της Πέμπτης. Ο επικεφαλής της αστυνομίας της περιοχής Sudurnes, Ulfar Ludviksson, δήλωσε στα ισλανδικά μέσα ενημέρωσης ότι τα 22 ή 23...

title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. drops presidential bid and endorses Trump for the White House
content: Kennedy Jr. is the son of the late Attorney General and Senator Robert Kennedy and the nephew of President John F. Kennedy, both heavyweights in Democratic party history. He acknowledged his decision to endorse Trump had caused tension within his family. Robert F. Kennedy Jr. has said he's suspending his independent presidential bid and is instead endorsing Donald Trump in November’s race for the White House. Kennedy Jr. said in a speech on Friday that he will seek to remove his name from the ballot in battleground states because he believes his presence in the race would help Democratic rival Kamala Harris. "Many months ago, I promised the American people that I would withdraw from the race if I became a spoiler. A spoiler is someone who will alter the outcome of the election but has no chance of winning. In my heart, I no longer believe that I have a realistic path to electoral victory in the face of this relentless systematic censorship and media control," he said. "Our polling consistently showed that by staying on the ballot in the battleground states, I would likely hand the election over to the Democrats, with whom I disagree on the most existential issues: censorship, war, and chronic disease." Kennedy Jr. said his supporters can continue to back him in the majority of states where they are unlikely to sway the outcome. Kennedy Jr. took steps to withdraw his candidacy in at least two states late this week, Arizona and Pennsylvania. He said the move followed...

title: An attack at a festival in a German city kills 3 people and wounds at least 5 seriously
content: SOLINGEN, Germany (AP) — An attacker with a knife killed three people and seriously wounded at least five late on Friday at a festival in the western German city of Solingen, authorities said. Witnesses alerted police shortly after 9.30 p.m. to an unknown perpetrator having wounded several people indiscriminately with a knife on a central square, the Fronhof. Police said the attacker was on the run, and that they so far had only very little information on the man. They said they believe the stabbings were carried out by a lone attacker. One of the festival organizers, Philipp Müller, appeared on stage and asked festivalgoers to “go calmly; please keep your eyes open, because unfortunately the perpetrator hasn't been caught.” He said many people had been wounded by “a knifeman.” At least one helicopter was seen in the air, while many police and emergency vehicles with flashing blue lights were on the road and several streets were closed off. Police put the number of seriously injured at five. The region's top security official, Herbert Reul, gave a figure of six as he visited the scene in the early hours of Saturday. “None of us knows why” the attack took place, said Reul, who is the interior minister of North Rhine-Westphalia state. “I can't say anything about the motive now” and it isn't clear who the assailant was, he also said and added that the attacker had left the scene “relatively quickly.” Mayor Tim Kurzbach said in a Facebook post that “this evening, we in Solingen...

title: Allemagne : Une attaque au couteau fait plusieurs morts lors d’un festival, le suspect en fuite
creator: Barry Souleymane
content: Une attaque au couteau a secoué la ville de Solingen, dans l’ouest de l’Allemagne , ce vendredi 23 août au soir, faisant plusieurs morts et blessés. L’incident s’est déroulé en marge du « Festival de la Diversité, » organisé à l’occasion du 650e anniversaire de la ville, qui compte 160 000 habitants. Selon les médias locaux, dont Solinger Tageblatt et Der Spiegel, l’auteur des faits est toujours en fuite. Au moins trois personnes auraient été tuées, et plusieurs autres grièvement blessées. Philipp Müller, l’un des co-organisateurs du festival, a déclaré sur scène que les services de secours luttaient pour sauver la vie de neuf personnes. → A LIRE AUSSI : Depuis le sol ivoirien, l’Allemagne annonce lâcher le Niger ! Le festival, qui devait attirer près de 80 000 visiteurs ce week-end, a été brutalement interrompu. La place du Fronhof, un lieu animé du centre-ville où se tenait une partie des festivités, a été bouclée par la police. Un hélicoptère survole la zone tandis que les autorités ont demandé aux habitants de rester chez eux pour leur sécurité. À l’heure actuelle, ni la police locale ni les secours n’ont encore fait de déclaration officielle concernant les événements. → A LIRE AUSSI : Euro 2024 – une légende de la Mannschaft fait une forte annonce : « Oui, il est très probable que ce soit mon dernier match avec l’Allemagne » → A LIRE AUSSI : Dortmund : Les images terrifiantes de l’orage lors du match Allemagne – Danemark (Vidéo)

title: Photos | Dancers from Mexico teach steps to Folklórico at Pajaro Valley Unified School District schools
content: Valeria Zacarias Montejano, center, and other students in Gisella Ferrer’s dance class at at Cesar Chavez Middle School in Watsonville on Friday learn some of the steps to Folklórico dance as El Ballet Folklórico del Puerto de Veracruz dancers Zuri Ortiz and José Luis Uribe visited the Watsonville school. Twenty-four dancers from the troupe and four musicians from Universidad Veracruzana, all from Veracruz, Mexico, have been in Santa Cruz County since Aug. 15 as part of a “Reinforcing Cultural Identity” conference at Cabrillo College hosted by local Folklorico dance company Esperanza del Valle. As part of the conference, which has included classes, conversations and performances, visiting artists this week have visited Pajaro Valley Unified School District campuses including Pajaro Valley and Watsonville high schools, Starlight, Calabasas and Freedom elementary schools, Hall District school and Cesar Chavez. The conference culminates with a performance of “Raíces del Pueblo,” a commemoration of the customs, celebrations and traditions of Veracruz at 8 p.m. Saturday and 3 p.m. Sunday at the Crocker Theater on the Cabrillo College campus. (Shmuel Thaler - Santa Cruz Sentinel) José Luis Uribe and Zuri Ortiz demonstrate their craft Friday morning to the delight of students at Cesar Chavez Middle School. (Shmuel Thaler - Santa Cruz Sentinel) Valeria Zacarias Montejano, center, and other students in Gisella Ferrer’s dance class at at Cesar Chavez Middle School in Watsonville...

title: అన్న క్యాంటీన్‌కు వృద్ధురాలి రూ.లక్ష విరాళం
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: పేదల ఆకలి తీర్చేందుకు రాష్ట్ర ప్రభుత్వం ఏర్పాటు చేసిన అన్న క్యాంటీన్‌కు అన్ని వర్గాల నుంచి విశేష ఆదరణ లభిస్తోంది. అదే సమయంలో అన్న క్యాంటీన్‌ నిర్వహణకు విరాళాలు ఇచ్చేందుకు పలువురు ముందుకు వస్తున్నారు. కాకినాడ జిల్లా పిఠాపురం పట్టణానికి చెందిన చక్కా నాగ సీతమణి తన పుట్టినరోజు సందర్భంగా రూ.లక్ష విరాళాన్ని పిఠాపురం మాజీ ఎమ్మెల్యే, టీడీపీ రాష్ట్ర అధికార ప్రతినిధి ఎస్వీఎ్‌సఎన్‌ వర్మ సమక్షంలో మునిసిపల్‌ అధికారులకు అందజేశారు. అన్న క్యాంటీన్‌లో శుక్రవారం భోజనాల ఖర్చు కూడా ఆమె ఇచ్చారు. ఈ సందర్భంగా వర్మ ఆమెను అభినందించారు. పేదవారికి కడుపునిండా అన్నం పెట్టేందుకు దాతలు ముందుకు రావడం అభినందనీయమన్నారు.

title: Patiala News: --बहुचर्चित नाभा जेल ब्रेक कांड--मुख्य साजिशकर्ता रोमी को अदालत ने न्यायिक हिरासत पर नाभा जेल भेजा
content: सरकारी अस्पताल में करवाया मेडिकल, पुलिस ने कहा-जांच में अहम खुलासे होने की उम्मीद अमर उजाला ब्यूरो पटियाला। बहुचर्चित नाभा जेल ब्रेक के मुख्य साजिशकर्ता रमनजीत सिंह रोमी को शुक्रवार तड़के कड़ी सुरक्षा के बीच पुलिस की ओर से ड्यूटी मजिस्ट्रेट के सामने पेश किया गया। सुनवाई के बाद ड्यूटी मजिस्ट्रेट ने रोमी को 14 दिनों की न्यायिक हिरासत पर नाभा की नई जिला जेल भेज दिया। इसके बाद नाभा के सरकारी सिविल अस्पताल में रोमी का मेडिकल भी कराया गया। एआईजी हरविंदर सिंह विर्क ने कहा कि रमनजीत सिंह रोमी नाभा जेल ब्रेक मामले का मास्टरमाइंड था। रोमी के प्रत्यर्पण के बाद अब जांच को आगे बढ़ाया जाएगा, ताकि और अहम खुलासे हो सके। गौरतलब है कि नाभा जेल ब्रेक करके खालिस्तान लिब्रेशन फोर्स का आतंकी हरमिंदर सिंह मिंटू, आतंकी कश्मीर सिंह व चार गैंगस्टर हरजिंदर सिंह भुल्लर उर्फ विक्की गौंडर, गुरप्रीत सिंह सेखों, कुलप्रीत सिंह उर्फ नीटा दियोल व अमनदीप सिंह उर्फ धोतियां फरार हुए थे। रोमी को तड़के करीब तीन बजकर छह मिनट पर भारी सुरक्षा के बीच नाभा लाया गया। रमनजीत सिंह रोमी के वकील हरीश मल्होत्रा ने कहा कि प्रत्यर्पण ट्रीटी के मुताबिक तय हुआ है कि पंजाब पुलिस रोमी का रिमांड हासिल नहीं करेगी। इसी के मुताबिक ड्यूटी मजिस्ट्रेट ने रोमी को 14 दिनों की न्यायिक हिरासत पर नाभा की नई जिला जेल भेजा है। कहा कि अब देखना होगा कि पंजाब पुलिस की ओर से रोमी के खिलाफ कौन से सबूत अदालत में पेश किए जाएंगे। 2018 में हांगकांग में डकैती केस में गिरफ्तार हुआ था रोमी रोमी ने नाभा जेल में बंद गैंगस्टर गुरप्रीत सिंह सेखों की मदद से जेल ब्रेक को अंजाम दिया था। रोमी ने जेल ब्रेक के लिए न केवल फंडिंग की थी, बल्कि जेल तक पहुंच बनाने के लिए...

title: Union funds are swelling: Bosses are amassing vast war chests to 'strong-arm' Labour into imposing hard-left agenda on Britain, Tories warn
content: Union funds are swelling: Bosses are amassing vast war chests to 'strong-arm' Labour into imposing hard-left agenda on Britain, Tories warn By David Churchil Chief Political Correspondent Published: 00:43, 24 August 2024 | Updated: 00:53, 24 August 2024 e-mail View comments Union barons are amassing huge war chests in a bid to 'strong-arm' Labour into imposing their hard-Left agenda on Britain, it was warned last night. Analysis of annual accounts shows a string of unions representing millions of workers have boosted their reserves for spending on party political activities in anticipation of a Labour Government. The dedicated funds, which union bosses use to support Labour activities and push their political agendas, have swelled by up to two-thirds in recent years. The Tories last night warned it would 'open the floodgates' to a raft of Left-wing policies, with the Government having already surrendered to rail union barons by agreeing to bumper pay hikes with no strings attached. The analysis found the GMB union, behind last year's crippling ambulance worker strikes, has boosted its 'Political Fund' by another £600,000 between 2021 and 2024, taking it to £1.6million. Ambulance workers on the picket line in the West Midlands. The GMB Union, who were behiing ambulance worker strikes, has boosted its 'Political Fund' by another £600,000 between 2021 and 2024, taking it to £1.6million Striking teachers from the National Education Union - which has boosted its fund from...

title: Estados republicanos demandan a Biden para bloquear plan de regularización de inmigrantes
creator: EFE
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, LOS ÁNGELES (EE.UU.). – Una coalición de 16 estados liderados por republicanos demandó este viernes al Gobierno del presidente Joe Biden para detener el nuevo plan de regularización que se prevé beneficiará a cerca de medio millón de indocumentados, cónyuges o hijastros de ciudadanos estadounidenses. El fiscal de Texas, el republicano Ken Paxton, dijo hoy en un comunicado que han solicitado a una corte federal que detenga la implementación de la norma argumentando que viola la Constitución, la Ley de Procedimiento Administrativo y las leyes de inmigración. El programa Keeping Families Together (Mantener unidas a las familias) que abrió sus inscripciones el lunes pasado, se apoya en el llamado ‘Parole in place’, que otorga un permiso temporal para permanecer en EE.UU., ofreciendo protección frente a la deportación. El plan de regularización también otorga a los indocumentados la posibilidad de obtener un permiso de trabajo. Pero lo más importante es que permite a los beneficiados realizar el proceso para obtener una residencia permanente en EE.UU. por estar casado o ser hijastro de un ciudadano estadounidense sin tener que salir del país. El programa exige que el solicitante debe haber vivido en el país un mínimo de 10 años y estar casado antes del 17 de junio pasado. La Administración Biden estimó que aproximadamente 500.000 cónyuges de ciudadanos estadounidenses y unos 50.000 hijastros serán elegibles para el programa. Desde que fue...

title: Jeanie Buss claims to know why Michael Jordan really sold the Charlotte franchise
creator: LW
content: here is no denying that the have been having trouble winning another championship. Yes, it is true they did it in pandemic season but for some reason, after Kobe Bryant left things are just not the same and maybe it's time to sell the team like did in Charlotte. They have struggled to get to the playoffs, things just don't feel right. What has become interesting is that some fans believe that could be getting closer to getting rid of the Lakers, even if there is no indication that in fact that is her intention. With that said, she has been in the eye of the hurricane and because of all this, she has been dealing with the topic and fielding questions about this subject. She was on a radio station talking about it and What she said about selling the team Jeanie Buss gave her comments about this as she was being interviewed during a radio show on AM 570 LA Sports. She was asked if, like other owners who sold the majority of the stakes of a franchise, to get something in return and let She specifically talked about what Michael Jordan did in Charlotte. "I think that they're just people always looking to challenge themselves, than something else," she said on the matter. "Wyc had his success winning championships and maybe he wants to do something different. And same with Mark you know. He's done a lot for lowering the cost of prescription drugs for people and I expect him to do more and more now." While criticism is still present, there is no question that the Lakers need to...

title: 自民岐阜県連、県知事選擁立一本化へ難局再び 選対委、推薦候補選定きょう開始(岐阜新聞Web)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 8/24(土) 8:43 配信 正式に出馬表明した江崎禎英氏=21日午後、岐阜市宇佐 出馬要請を受け会見した渡辺猛之氏=22日午後、岐阜市柳ケ瀬通 任期満了(来年2月5日)に伴う岐阜県知事選で、自民党県連は、選挙対策委員会の初会合を24日開き、推薦候補者の選定が始まる。2021年の前回知事選に続き再出馬を正式表明した元内閣府大臣官房審議官の江崎禎英(よしひで)氏(59)と出馬に意欲を示す県選出の自民党参議院議員渡辺猛之氏(56)の2人が推薦を求める見通しだが、現時点では県議らの間で支持が割れている。1966年以来55年ぶりの保守分裂選挙となった前回の反省を踏まえ、県連は「今回は自民(の支持)を割らない」(幹部)を大原則に据えており、県連内の駆け引きが続きそうだ。 「これじゃ前回と同じ構図じゃないか」。10日、渡辺氏が出馬する意向を固めたとする新聞記事を見て県連幹部の県議は声を荒らげた。「今回は県連としても県議会の会派としても支持も割らない、しこりも残さない、はずだったのにこれでは...」と言葉を失った。 渡辺氏は前回知事選で5選した現職の古田肇知事(76)の選挙を中心的に支えた一人で、早くから現職の後継として名前が挙がっていた。当の本人は態度を曖昧にしてきたが、今月8日に古田知事が定例記者会見で突如、不出馬を表明すると、即座に動き出す。近い県議に「腹は決まった」などと次期知事選への出馬意欲を伝達。21日には県農政連から、22日には市長21人と町村長19人から次期知事選への出馬要請を受けて、現職の正式な後継としての立場を印象づけた。 一方、江崎氏は昨年11月に出馬の意向を表明していたが、21日に正式な出馬表明会見を開いた。前回敗戦してから県内各地を小まめに回り、講演会や街頭活動を繰り返してきた。政局から一定の距離を置き、自身の政策提示や知名度向上のための活動を続ける。会見では、自民をはじめ野党の県連にも推薦を求める考えを明らかにし、仮に自民の推薦が得られなかった場合でも「120%出馬する」と不退転の構えを見せた。ベテラン県議の一人は「政策通な部分も含め、知事選まで半年となったタイミングで改めて存在を知らしめた」とこの時期での正式表明を評価する。 今後は、選対委員会による推薦候補の絞り込み方法が焦点となる。自民党の国会議員や県議ら関係者の間では、「公募」という形で立候補予定者の推薦願の提出を募る方針では一致している。24日の選対委の初会合では受付期間などについて具体化するとみられる。 渡辺氏は県議選初当選以降、30年にわたって自民党に所属。党への貢献度を考慮すると、推薦を得やすい立場だ。県内の大半の首長から出馬要請を受け、渡辺氏に近い県議は「普通に考えれば渡辺氏でまとまっていいはず」と話す。...

title: 松山英樹が腰痛で第2R棄権 プレーオフ第2戦
content: 【8月24日 AFP】男子ゴルフの松山英樹( Hideki Matsuyama )は23日、腰痛を理由に、出場していた米国ツアーのフェデックス・カップ( FedEx Cup 2024 )プレーオフ第2戦、BMW選手権( BMW Championship 2024 )を棄権した。 米コロラド州キャッスル・ロック( Castle Rock )のキャッスルパインズ・ゴルフクラブ( Castle Pines Golf Club )で臨んだ前日の第1ラウンドで、松山は首位のキーガン・ブラッドリー( Keegan Bradley 、米国)に1打差の単独2位につけていた。 声明では、「BMW選手権を棄権しなければならなくなり、がっかりしている。今朝のウオーミングアップ中に違和感を覚え、きょうのプレーは不可能となった」と説明した。 今プレーオフの優勝候補の一人である松山は、第1戦のフェデックス・セントジュード選手権( FedEx St.Jude Championship 2024 )を制し、フェデックス・カップランキングの3位につけている。 そのため、次週米ジョージア州アトランタ( Atlanta )のイーストレークGC( East Lake Golf Club )で行われる最終戦のツアー選手権( TOUR Championship 2024 )には進出できる見通しとなっている。 2021年のマスターズ・トーナメント( The Masters Tournament 2021 )覇者である32歳の松山は、先日の パリ五輪 で銅メダルに輝いた。(c)AFP

title: Round Lake Beach man sentenced to 10 years in prison for 2020 vehicle crash that killed two people
creator: Clifford Ward
content: A Round Lake Beach man who fled from police at high speed before crashing his SUV and killing two passengers was sentenced Friday to 10 years in prison. A Lake County jury found Jose S. Aguirre, 30, guilty in June for aggravated drunk driving for the 2020 crash that killed Juan Renteria-Becerra, 34, of Mundelein, and Edgar Herrera, 30, of Round Lake Beach. Authorities said Aguirre was seen driving at a high rate of speed around 3:30 a.m. on Sept. 27, 2020, and police tried to make a traffic stop. Aguirre, though, drove away at speeds that topped 100 miles per hour, authorities said. Police opted to not pursue the SUV for safety reasons. Several minutes later, police came to the vehicle that had rolled over after crashing in a wooded rear near Illinois Route 134 and West Main Street. The Chevrolet Traverse was going 110 mph in the moments before the crash, prosecutors said. The two passengers were pronounced dead at the scene. A third passenger suffered non-life-threatening injuries, according to authorities. At his trial, Aguirre testified that he was not driving the SUV. Jurors, however, found him guilty after deliberating for several hours. Judge Christopher Lombardo sentenced Aguirre Friday. Prosecutors asked for an 18-year prison sentence. “While we are disappointed the sentence was not higher, this prison term sends the correct message that dangerous drivers will be held accountable in Lake County,” State’s Atty. Eric Rinehart said in a media statement. “And we continue...

title: 트럼프 전 보좌관, "푸틴이 트럼프 이용해 먹었다"
creator: 강영진 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 강영진 기자 = 블라디미르 푸틴 러시아 대통령이 아부를 좋아하는 도널드 트럼프 전 미 대통령을 최대한 활용한 것으로 트럼프 정부 첫 국가안보보좌관이던 허버트 맥매스터 육군 예비역 중장이 밝혔다. 미 월스트리트저널(WSJ)은 23일(현지시각) 맥매스터의 회고록을 요약한 글에서 그같이 전했다. 다음은 WSJ 요약문의 일부. 트럼프는 러시아 독재자와 관계를 개선할 수 있다고 과신했다. 자칭 “협상 전문가”인 트럼프는 미국의 대부분 대외 정책 전문가들의 반대를 무릅쓰고 자신이 푸틴과 친밀한 계를 형성할 수 있을 것으로 생각했다. 푸틴은 트럼프의 과도한 자신감을 보이며 아부를 좋아하는 성격을 최대한 이용했다. 푸틴이 트럼프가 “탁월한 인물이며 분명 재능이 있다”고 하자 트럼프가 넘어갔다. 강력한 통치자를 좋아하는 트럼프가 자신만이 푸틴과 좋은 관계를 맺을 수 있다고 생각한 것이다. 트럼프는 푸틴의 아부에 “자기 나라에서 엄청난 존경을 받는 지도자로부터 멋진 평가를 받는 것은 큰 영광”이라고 화답했다. 윤리적 가치를 중시하지 않는 트럼프의 성향도 잔혹한 푸틴의 행동들을 방관하게 만들었다. 트럼프는 2017년 대통령 취임 초 살인자인 푸틴을 존경하는 이유가 무엇이냐를 묻는 질문에 “살인자는 많다. 우리나라는 크게 다른가?”라고 반문했다. 푸틴이 트럼프를 이용해먹는다는 나의 주장 때문에 트럼프와 나의 관계가 크게 악화했다. 나는 푸틴이 절대 트럼프의 친구가 될 수 없다고 판단해 이를...

title: Polizei: Kein Hinweis zu Aufenthaltsort des Solingen-Täters
creator: dpa
content: Die Messerattacke in Solingen war ein Anschlag. Der Täter ist weiter auf der Flucht. Die Polizei scheint zunächst kaum Informationen zu haben. Der Polizei fehlen nach der Messerattacke in der Stadt Solingen mit mehreren Todesopfern und Schwerverletzten wichtige Informationen. Zum Aussehen des flüchtigen Verdächtigen gebe es keine gesicherten Erkenntnisse, sagte ein Polizeisprecher. „Wir haben derzeit keinen Hinweis auf seinen Aufenthaltsort“, fügte er hinzu. Die Ermittler müssten nun alle „Puzzleteile zusammenstecken“. Es gebe nur wenig verlässliche Informationen. „Ich glaube, das ist unser Riesenproblem. Wir haben noch nicht so viele Angaben zum Täter“, sagte der Sprecher. Zeugen, die in unmittelbarer Nähe zum Geschehen waren, stünden unter Schock. „Die werden von uns im Augenblick professionell betreut und wir vernehmen diese natürlich, um da jetzt genauere Angaben zu bekommen.“ Am späten Freitagabend war es bei der 650-Jahr-Feier der Stadt Solingen zu einer Messerattacke mit drei Toten und fünf Schwerverletzten gekommen. Dem Täter sei es gelungen, im Tumult und in der sich anfangs ausbreitenden Panik nach der Tat zu entkommen, sagte ein Sprecher des NRW-Innenministeriums. Der Angreifer habe sehr gezielt auf den Hals seiner Opfer eingestochen, hieß es.

title: Anschlag: Polizei: Kein Hinweis zu Aufenthaltsort des Solingen-Täters
creator: dpa
content: Tausende feiern den 650. Geburtstag von Solingen. Plötzlich schlägt die ausgelassene Stimmung um. Ein Angreifer sticht auf Menschen ein, einige sterben. Die Polizei spricht von einem Anschlag. Solingen - Ein Angreifer hat am Freitagabend auf der 650-Jahr-Feier der Stadt Solingen drei Menschen mit einem Messer getötet. Nach bisherigen Erkenntnissen gibt es zudem fünf Schwerverletzte. Die Polizei stufte die Tat als Anschlag ein - wegen des zielgerichteten Vorgehens. Der Täter war nach Mitternacht weiter auf der Flucht. "Wir haben derzeit keinen Hinweis auf seinen Aufenthaltsort", sagte ein Polizeisprecher. Zum Aussehen des flüchtigen Verdächtigen gebe es keine gesicherten Informationen. "Ich glaube, das ist unser Riesenproblem. Wir haben noch nicht so viele Angaben zum Täter", erklärte Alexander Kresta, Sprecher der Polizei Wuppertal. Zeugen, die in unmittelbarer Nähe zum Geschehen waren, stünden unter Schock. "Die werden von uns im Augenblick professionell betreut und wir vernehmen diese natürlich, um da jetzt genauere Angaben zu bekommen." Allerdings könnten die Ermittler derzeit davon ausgehen, dass es sich um einen einzelnen Täter handelt, sagte Kresta weiter. Alle Zeugenaussagen, die die Polizei bislang aufnehmen konnte, wiesen darauf hin. "Von weiteren Personen ist uns nichts bekannt." Es sei ihm gelungen, im Tumult und in der sich anfangs ausbreitenden Panik nach der Tat zu entkommen, sagte ein Sprecher des NRW-Innenministeriums. Der Angreifer habe sehr...

title: Anschlag: Polizei: Kein Hinweis zu Aufenthaltsort des Solingen-Täters
Anschlag: Polizei: Kein Hinweis zu Aufenthaltsort des Solingen-Täters
content: Der Polizei fehlen nach der Messerattacke in der Stadt Solingen mit mehreren Todesopfern und Schwerverletzten wichtige Informationen. Zum Aussehen des flüchtigen Verdächtigen gebe es keine gesicherten Erkenntnisse, sagte ein Polizeisprecher. "Wir haben derzeit keinen Hinweis auf seinen Aufenthaltsort", fügte er hinzu. Die Ermittler müssten nun alle "Puzzleteile zusammenstecken". Es gebe nur wenig verlässliche Informationen. "Ich glaube, das ist unser Riesenproblem. Wir haben noch nicht so viele Angaben zum Täter", sagte der Sprecher. Zeugen, die in unmittelbarer Nähe zum Geschehen waren, stünden unter Schock. "Die werden von uns im Augenblick professionell betreut und wir vernehmen diese natürlich, um da jetzt genauere Angaben zu bekommen." Am späten Freitagabend war es bei der 650-Jahr-Feier der Stadt Solingen zu einer Messerattacke mit drei Toten und fünf Schwerverletzten gekommen. Dem Täter sei es gelungen, im Tumult und in der sich anfangs ausbreitenden Panik nach der Tat zu entkommen, sagte ein Sprecher des NRW-Innenministeriums. Der Angreifer habe sehr gezielt auf den Hals seiner Opfer eingestochen, hieß es.

En esa conversación, López le reveló a la conductora peruana de espectáculos una larga lista de personas de la farándula con las cuales su aún esposo le habría sido infiel. Uno de esos nombres fue el de Macarena Gastaldo , quien ha salido a desmentir aquello y no dudó en lanzarle un duro mensaje a la madre de los hijos de ‘Aladino’. title: फर्जी कॉल सेंटर का पर्दाफाश: विदेशी नंबरों से फोन कर लोगों से ऐंठते थे पैसे, नौ काबू
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, लुधियाना
content: चार लैपटॉप, 24 सीपीयू और विभिन्न कंपनियों के छह मोबाइल बरामद संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी लुधियाना। शहीद भगत सिंह नगर इलाके में स्कसेस सॉल्यूशन केयर नाम से फर्जी कॉल सेंटर का कमिश्नरेट पुलिस ने पर्दाफाश किया है। मोहल्ले में किराए पर मकान लेकर फर्जी कॉल सेंटर चला विदेशी नंबरों से फोन कर लोगों से पैसे ऐंठते थे। पुलिस ने फर्जी कॉल सेंटर पर छापामारी कर नौ आरोपियों को गिरफ्तार किया है। पुलिस ने आरोपियों के कब्जे से चार लैपटॉप, 24 सीपीयू और विभिन्न कंपनियों के छह मोबाइल फोन बरामद किए है। पुलिस ने माडल टाॅउन निवासी रतिंदर सिंह उर्फ रिक उर्फ टीनू, न्यू हरगोबिंद नगर निवासी सुखप्रीत सिंह, जनकपुरी निवासी सुमंत महाजन, बड़ी हैबोवाल स्थित दुर्गापुरी निवासी मयंक जोशी, प्रताप सिंह वाला स्थित बाला जी नगर निवासी आदित्य चौहान, डाबा लोहारा रोड स्थित महा सिंह नगर निवासी ईशांत सिंह राणा, न्यू जनता नगर निवासी दिलप्रीत सिंह, समराला चौक गुरु अर्जुन देव नगर निवासी संदीप कुमार और हंबड़ा रोड अपार्टमेट गोल्फ लिंक निवासी समीर बेरी के खिलाफ भारतीय न्याय संहिता की धाराओं के तहत मामला दर्ज किया है। पुलिस आरोपियों से पूछताछ करने में जुटी है। एसीपी साऊथ गुरइकबाल सिंह ने बताया कि थाना सदर पुलिस को सूचना मिली थी कि शहीद भगत सिंह नगर इलाके में स्कसेस सॉल्यूशन केयर नाम से एक फर्जी कॉल सेंटर चल रहा है। कॉल सेंटर के पास न तो केंद्र सरकार से कोई इजाजत है और न ही राज्य सरकार से किसी तरह की कोई परमिशन है। कॉल सेंटर पर काम करने वाले आरोपी अपनी पहचान छिपा कर इंटरनेट के जरिये खुद को अमेरिका निवासी साॅफ्टवेयर इंजीनियर बताते हैं और अमेरिका नंबर से फोन कर भोलेभाले लोगों को ग्राहक बना लेते हैं। आरोपी लोगों के कंप्यूटर या फिर लैपटॉप...

title: В Британии разработали план на случай смерти кота Ларри, сообщили СМИ
content: МОСКВА, 24 авг - РИА Новости. Британские власти разработали специальный план на случай смерти 17-летнего кота Ларри, служащего на Даунинг-стрит - резиденции британского премьер-министра, он получил название "Ларри Бриджес", в то же время сам кот сейчас чувствует себя хорошо, сообщает издание Times со ссылкой на источники в правительстве. Кот Ларри, взятый из приюта, служит в резиденции британского премьер-министра с 2011 года. Коты в резиденциях британских правителей живут с XV века. С 1929 года они имеют официальный статус и жалование в 100 фунтов в год. Самым знаменитым из них в XX веке стал кот Хамфри, который исполнял обязанности мышелова при Маргарет Тэтчер , Джоне Мэйджоре и Тони Блэре . Кот Хамфри скончался в 2008 году, ему было около 18 лет. "Высокопоставленные чиновники, работавшие на Даунинг-стрит в течение последнего года, разработали план объявления о смерти кота Ларри", - пишет издание. Сообщается, что план носит название "Ларри Бриджес", что является ироничной отсылкой к кодовым именам, которые давались для защиты деталей подготовки к смерти членов монаршей семьи. В частности, были специально отобраны фотографии Ларри на Даунинг-стрит для публикации после известия о его кончине, они хранятся в закрытых папках правительственных систем. Пресс-релиз и материалы для публикаций в соцсетях также считаются "готовыми к печальному дню его ухода". Тем не менее, один из источников сообщил, что, несмотря на свой почтенный возраст, Ларри "сейчас чувствует...

title: North Carolina's highest court won't fast-track appeals in governor's lawsuits
content: RALEIGH, N.C. (AP) — North Carolina’s highest court has decided it won’t fast-track appeals of results in two lawsuits initiated by Democratic Gov. Roy Cooper that challenged new laws that eroded his power to choose members of several boards and commissions. The state Supreme Court, in orders released Friday, denied the requests from Republican legislative leaders sued by Cooper to hear the cases without waiting for the intermediate-level Court of Appeals to consider and rule first on arguments. The one-sentence rulings don't say how individual justices came down on the petitions seeking to bypass the cases to the Supreme Court. Cooper’s lawyers had asked the court not to grant the requests. The decisions could lengthen the process that leads to final rulings on whether the board alterations enacted by the GOP-controlled General Assembly in late 2023 over Cooper's vetoes are permitted or prevented by the state constitution. The state Supreme Court may want to review the cases even after the Court of Appeals weighs in. No dates have been set for oral arguments at the Court of Appeals, and briefs are still being filed. People are also reading... One lawsuit challenges a law that transfers the governor's powers to choose state and local election board members to the General Assembly and its leaders. A three-judge panel of trial lawyers in March struck down election board changes, saying they interfere with a governor’s ability to ensure elections and voting laws are “faithfully...

title: Yankees activate Chisholm; LeMahieu scratched
content: NEW YORK -- The Yankees activated Jazz Chisholm Jr . from the 10-day injured list Friday after he was sidelined with a sprained left elbow, and he was in the New York lineup against Colorado. Chisholm, eligible to come off the IL on Friday, was slated to bat fifth and start at third base in the series opener against the Rockies at Yankee Stadium. Not in the lineup Friday was DJ LeMahieu . He was scratched after suffering what the team called "a facial contusion" when he was hit with a ball during batting practice before the game. Editor's Picks Every current MLB playoff contender's biggest strength 12h David Schoenfield Ruth's 'called shot' jersey poised to become the most expensive sports collectible 7h Dan Hajducky Chisholm was hurt Aug. 12, on a head-first dive into home plate while scoring in a loss to the Chicago White Sox. Initial X-rays came back clear, but the Yankees didn't rule out the possibility of surgery until an MRI detected no damage to his UCL. Chisholm is batting .316 with seven homers, 11 RBI and five stolen bases in 14 games since being acquired from the Miami Marlins on July 27. He is batting .257 with 20 homers, 61 RBI and 27 stolen bases overall. Chisholm had a fast start with the Yankees, hitting seven homers in his first 12 games, becoming the first player in franchise history to accomplish the feat. He made 13 of his first 14 starts at third base after never having played the position as a big leaguer. "No secret how well he's played for us since...

title: Vols reward Vitello with record $3 million deal
content: Tennessee's Tony Vitello, fresh off the Vols' first baseball national championship in school history, has received a new five-year deal that will pay him $3 million annually and make him the highest-paid coach in college baseball, the school announced Friday. Vitello, since arriving in Knoxville in 2018, has transformed Tennessee into a baseball powerhouse. The Vols became the first SEC team in history to win 60 games this season on their way to capturing the national title with a 6-5 victory over Texas A&M in the deciding game. Vitello has taken Tennessee to the Men's College World Series in three of the past four seasons and to the super regionals all four seasons. During that span, Tennessee ranks first nationally with 211 wins and a .773 winning percentage. Editor's Picks Ayes of Texas: Schlossnagle's $15.4M deal OK'd 1d "Tony and his staff have developed the country's top baseball program, and we are excited to announce this long-term extension to keep Tony on Rocky Top," Tennessee athletic director Danny White said in a release. "As an athletics department, we aim to lead the way in college sports, and Tony has created a baseball program that sets the standard across the entire sport." This new deal replaces one that Tennessee and Vitello agreed upon that went into effect on May 31, 2024, although that deal was never announced. Vitello was previously set to make $1.8 million annually. He received a $200,000 bonus for winning the MCWS, and part of the new deal includes...

title: Ideogram 倒逼 Midjourney“拔剑”,开放网页版后再向免费用户开放 AI 文生图提示词描述工具
content: IT之家 8 月 24 日消息,科技媒体 testingcatalog 昨日(8 月 23 日)发布博文,或许是 Midjourney 感受到来自 Ideogram 最新模型的压力,在昨日开放网页版,并附赠 25 张文生图试用额度之外, 还向免费用户推出了“Tools with the Lab”工具。 IT之家注:该功能此前已经向购买 Pro 专业版订阅的用户开放,现在向免费用户也开放体验,用户点击后会进入“Describe”页面。 用户可以上传任意照片,然后该工具就会提供 4 种不同的描述,之后用户可以将其作为提示词,通过 Midjourney 创建类似的图片。 Midjourney 是一款人工智能生成工具,允许用户根据自然语言提示创建高质量图像。它深受艺术家、设计师和业余爱好者的欢迎,他们用它来进行快速原型设计、创意探索和创意可视化。 广告声明:文内含有的对外跳转链接(包括不限于超链接、二维码、口令等形式),用于传递更多信息,节省甄选时间,结果仅供参考,IT之家所有文章均包含本声明。

title: Diamond to broadcast NBA, NHL games in '24-25
content: Diamond Sports Group, the bankrupt operator of Bally Sports channels, has reached new deals with the NBA and the NHL and has ensured that it will broadcast games for teams under its portfolio at least through their upcoming 2024-25 seasons. As part of its agreement, which includes modifications to linear and direct-to-consumer rights, Diamond has also dropped the NBA's Dallas Mavericks and New Orleans Pelicans , leaving the company with 13 NBA teams and nine NHL teams. Diamond's confirmation hearing, which will essentially determine whether the company will emerge from bankruptcy, was initially pushed back from June 18 to the end of July. But it has since asked for more time in the wake of a surprise agreement with Comcast, ending a three-month-long dispute that had taken MLB teams off the air. With the NBA and NHL deals now set, Diamond will focus on crafting a reorganization plan that will hope to address serious concerns about its economic viability moving forward. A new confirmation date has not been set, but the process is now expected to drag on long enough to cut into the upcoming NBA and NHL seasons and bleed into MLB's offseason. If Diamond does not emerge from bankruptcy, the new deals -- still pending a judge's approval -- will end at the conclusion of the 2024-25 seasons. title: Sources: UConn in early talks for joining Big 12
content: The Big 12 is in talks with UConn about joining the league in all sports, sources confirmed to ESPN. No vote has taken place for a potential Huskies membership, nor is one close to happening, as sources cautioned that there has been pushback among several members that would need to be overcome. The talks have advanced to the point where UConn athletic director David Benedict and board chair Daniel Toscano met with Big 12 athletic directors in person in Dallas last week to make their case, sources told ESPN. The conversations centered around football funding and how UConn could be competitive upon joining the league in 2031, sources said. A Big 12 board call is being planned for next week with the league's presidents that would lay out the specific deal points, according to sources. "I think the word is 'premature,'" a high-ranking Big 12 official said. "There's a far distance between conversations and anything that would happen. The presidents haven't seen the case yet." The addition would be for all-sports, and the delay to 2031 in football would in theory give UConn a chance to catch up to be more prepared to join the league at that time in terms of funding and a talent upgrade through NIL. The Athletic first reported that potential board call and the talks. title: Éxito en el servicio no es suerte, sino compromiso y trabajo continúo: Lía Limón
creator: Ángel Ortíz
content: La alcaldesa de Álvaro Obregón, Lía Limón , aseguró que el éxito en el servicio público al frente de una alcaldía no es cuestión de suerte sino fruto de compromiso y trabajo 24/7. “Estoy convencida, absolutamente convencida, que tener éxito en una gestión no es cosa de suerte, hay que tener inteligencia para identificar problemas y planear soluciones viables, requiere de capacidad de análisis, de capacidad de priorizar, porque cuando uno llega a gobernar las demandas son muchísimas”, expresó Limón al participar en la ceremonia de entrega del “Premio Nacional al Buen Gobierno Municipal 2024. La alcaldesa abundó que para lograr un buen gobierno es necesario priorizar y tener objetivos claros, así como una mano firme para romper inercias y abrir espacios a los cambios necesarios. Además, refirió que el estar al frente de un gobierno de primer contacto es un desafío muy grande, pues exige responder a la ciudadanía todos los días, por lo que es necesario contar con esquemas constantes de atención, principalmente para grupos prioritarios como lo son las mujeres y las niñas y niños. Limón subrayó que el gobierno de una alcaldía requiere de visión y compromiso, y de no perder de vista el objetivo último que es mejorar la vida de las personas. “Si no caminamos con causas te pierdas en el camino, tener las causas claras, para mí las mujeres y los niños son una causa de vida y por eso enfoqué parte importante de mi gobierno en ello”, indicó. Por otra...

title: Crises políticas prenunciam mutações constitucionais
content: O acordo apalavrado entre as cúpulas do Judiciário, do Legislativo e do Executivo em torno das emendas parlamentares foi saudado pelo presidente Lula como um sinal de que o "Brasil voltou à normalidade" . Difícil prever se a conciliação irá interromper a batalha entre Poderes em que ingressamos na última década. Se alguma normalidade advier dessa conciliação, será muita distinta daquela em que vivíamos até 2013. O arranjo constitucional brasileiro era marcado por uma relação de dominância do Executivo sobre o Legislativo, que ficou conhecido como "presidencialismo de coalizão" . O presidente eleito, dotado de uma série de prerrogativas legislativas e orçamentárias, montava uma coalizão partidária para governar, que competia na próxima eleição. Os sucessivos escândalos de corrupção política, associados a uma perda de capacidade de construir consensos sobre questões relevantes, sobrecarregaram o sistema de Justiça e levaram o Supremo assumir um papel de dominância em muitas circunstâncias. A reação à "supremocracia" veio primeiro dos partidos políticos depois do bolsonarismo. O alinhamento da Lava Jato com Bolsonaro e a capitulação da Procuradoria-Geral da República levaram o Supremo a recuar no combate a corrupção e a reestabelecer o diálogo com a classe política. Paralelamente, o Congresso se beneficiou da fragilidade dos governos Dilma, Temer e Bolsonaro, para extrair prerrogativas do Executivo. Foi se assenhorando de parcelas...

title: U23 Thái Lan sẽ có HLV Nhật Bản
creator: Thethao247
content: LĐBĐ Thái Lan (FAT) đang lên kế hoạch tìm HLV Nhật Bản cho đội U23 Thái Lan. Ở cuộc họp mới nhất, LĐBĐ Thái Lan đang lên kế hoạch bổ sung một HLV người Nhật Bản cho đội U23. Theo đó, đội U23 Thái Lan là đội gần nhất với ĐTQG nên FAT muốn có sự đầu tư kỹ lưỡng vào đội bóng này. Thành viên LĐBĐ Thái Lan, ông Piyapong Pue-on chia sẻ: “Theo chính sách của Chủ tịch LĐBĐ Thái Lan, bà Nualphan Lamsam, chúng tôi đang lên kế hoạch cho đội tuyển U23 Thái Lan. Trong thời quan qua, việc tìm kiếm HLV trưởng cho đội bóng đã được xúc tiến. U23 Thái Lan là đội bóng gần nhất với ĐTQG nên là bước đệm rất quan trọng cho cả đội bóng lẫn các cầu thủ. Sắp tới, chúng tôi sẽ tổ chức giải đấu trẻ cho các đội U23 thi đấu song song với Thai League. Ban đầu, FAT muốn có một HLV Thái Lan cho vị trí này. Tuy nhiên, khi xem xét rằng HLV Masatada Ishii cũng sẽ có tác động lên đội U23, bà Nualphan Lamsam và bộ phận chuyên môn đã đồng ý rằng FAT nên bổ nhiệm một huấn luyện viên trưởng người Nhật Bản. Điều này đảm bảo định hướng về phong cách và lối chơi của U23 Thái Lan giống với ĐTQG. Các HLV người Thái Lan sẽ làm công tác trợ lý”. Theo đó, HLV Masatada Ishii cũng sẽ hỗ trợ FAT tìm kiếm những ứng cử viên phù hợp. Theo thông tin từ...

title: Protestan estudiantes por negativa de UAEH a recomendación de CDHEH
creator: Janeth Zenil
content: Luego de que la Universidad Autónoma del Estado de Hidalgo respondió a la recomendación de la Comisión de Derechos Humanos estatal (CDHEH) con tres denuncias penales, estudiantes del Instituto de Artes protestó en la inauguración de la Feria de Libro. La movilización de alrededor 30 universitarios comenzó en la entrada de Ciudad de Conocimiento y se trasladó a las puertas del Poliforum Carlos Martínez Balmori, donde se impidió el acceso de los estudiantes, quienes exigían que las autoridades acepten la recomendación R-VG-00012-24, emitida por la violación a los derechos a la libertad de expresión, a no ser sometido a violencia institucional, por mencionar algunos. «Dar disculpas nunca mató a nadie» y «autonomía no significa impunidad» fueron algunos de los mensajes que colocaron en las cartulinas que pegaron en la entrada del Poliforum, donde, al interior, el rector Octavio Castillo inaugura la Feria del Libro con la compañía del embajador de Países Bajos en México, Wilfred Mohr. Solo un manifestante, Yoltic Hernández, logró entrar al recinto y gritó consignas contra las autoridades universitarias, pero fue sacado por personal minutos más tarde; ya afuera denunció agresiones físicas para ser expulsado del poliforum y adelantó que presentaría las denuncias correspondientes. Tras varios minutos, se aceptó llegar a un diálogo en un edificio del Instituto de Ciencias Básicas e Ingenierías, sin embargo, el rector nunca llegó; de acuerdo con la...

title: Countdown to Kickoff: A new era of college football
content: A new era of college football in is right around the corner. On Aug. 31, Alabama will take on Western Kentucky at Bryant-Denny Stadium to kick off its 2024 season. For the first time in 17 years, the Tide will go to war without its longtime leader, arguably the most successful college coach of all time, Nick Saban, as Washington's Kalen DeBoer takes the reigns. A Freeze warning however may put the kibosh on DeBoer's hopefully bright future as Hugh helms the Tigers in year two, reloading the team with new offensive weaponry But as both teams stand on the dawn of a new era, the winds of change are blowing through the SEC. A conference realignment and a 12-team playoff promise to bring excitement, uncertainty, pageantry and unpredictability to the college football landscape. Get the inside scoop on college football's new era below. Stay updated on the latest sports stories with the WVTM 13 app. You can download it here .

title: Блинкен: В новый пакет для Украины включены ракеты для HIMARS и артснаряды
content: Новый пакет помощи, выделенный США Украине, включает боеприпасы для реактивных систем залпового огня (РСЗО) HIMARS и артиллерийские снаряды. Как передает со ссылкой на ТАСС, об этом сообщил госсекретарь США Энтони Блинкен. Как говорится в его заявлении, Вашингтон направит Украине оборудование и боеприпасы для беспилотников, ракеты для РСЗО HIMARS, артиллерийские снаряды калибра 155 мм и 105 мм, противотанковые ракетные комплексы Javelin, AT4 и TOW, а также боеприпасы для стрелкового оружия, запчасти и вспомогательное оборудование. Блинкен не уточнил общую стоимость вооружений. Ранее координатор по стратегическим коммуникациям в Совете национальной безопасности Белого дома Джон Кирби сообщил, что США выделяют Киеву новый пакет вооружений. Как передавали западные СМИ, стоимость нового пакета американской помощи может оцениваться в $125 млн. Глава Пентагона обсудил с украинским коллегой новый пакет помощи США Киеву США обсуждают с Киевом дальнобойность ударов по России Один из кандидатов в президенты США приостановил свою кампанию США отрицают, что переговоры по Газе близки к провалу Украина будет производить норвежские артиллерийские снаряды Из Ливана выпустили 20 ракет по Израилю

title: 'Truyền nhân Thanh Thúy' cùng đội nhà giành chức vô địch, thiết lập thành tích bất bại đầy ấn tượng
content: Hôm qua (24/8), CLB Binh Chủng Thông Tin đã giành chức vô địch giải bóng chuyền trẻ Cúp các CLB sau khi thắng Hóa Chất Đức Giang Lào Cai 3-0. Cụ thể, CLB Binh Chủng Thông Tin đã vượt qua HCĐG Lào Cai với các tỉ số 25-19, 25-23 và 25-20. Hóa Chất Đức Giang Lào Cai đã gây ra nhiều khó khăn cho BCTT trong trận đấu này. Tuy nhiên, bản lĩnh của các cô gái BCTT đã được thể hiện ở những thời điểm quyết định để giành chiến thắng trong 3 set đấu. BCTT giành chức vô địch giải bóng chuyền trẻ Cúp các CLB 2024 Phạm Quỳnh Hương, người được coi là sẽ tiếp bước đàn chị Thanh Thúy trong tương lai, đã cùng BCTT duy trì thành tích bất bại ở giải khi chưa thua set nào. Đây được xem là thành tích vô cùng ấn tượng và đáng nhớ của BCTT ở giải đấu năm nay. Quỳnh Hương sinh năm 2008 nhưng sở hữu chiều cao lên tới 1m87 được kỳ vọng sẽ nối bước đàn chị Trần Thị Thanh Thúy trong tương lai. Theo đánh giá của giới chuyên môn, Quỳnh Hương có những tố chất rất nổi bật, đặc biệt là chiều cao vượt xa bạn bè đồng trang lứa. Quỳnh Hương cũng cho thấy sự tiến bộ rất nhanh của mình ở các giải đấu trẻ trong năm qua với thành tích ấn tượng khi em nhận danh hiệu "VĐV tấn công xuất sắc" của Cúp CLB trẻ 2023. Ngoài ra, Quỳnh Hương...

title: تقييم فريمبونغ في فوز باير ليفركوزن على مونشنغلادباخ
content: هاي كورة – خطف فريق باير ليفركوزن بقيادة مدربه تشابي ألونسو فوزًا حاسمًا على حساب بوروسيا مونشغلادباخ بنتيجة 3-2 في المباراة التي أقيمت ضمن افتتاحية الدوري الألماني للموسم الجديد. وحصل فريمبونغ لاعب باير ليفركوزن على تقييم 6.8/10 ، حيث قدم أداءً متوسطًا ولعب المباراة كاملة.

title: 국립저작권박물관 "만료 저작물로 나만의 작품 만든다"
creator: 정경규 기자
content: [진주=뉴시스] 정경규 기자 = 경남 진주 국립저작권박물관은 8월 문화가 있는 날을 맞아 오는 26일부터 31일까지 총 6일간 ‘톡톡, 잠자는 그림을 깨우다’ 문화행사를 박물관 일원에서 개최한다. 이번 문화행사는 박물관 관람객에게 저작권에 대해 쉽고 재미있게 배울 수 있는 기회를 제공하고자 기획했다. 특히 저작권 보호기간이 만료된 ‘만료저작물’을 주제로 하는 전시해설과 창작체험 프로그램으로 구성돼 있다. ‘전시해설과 함께하는 상설전시 관람’은 전문 도슨트와 함께 전시를 관람하며 저작권과 만료저작물에 대해 알아보는 프로그램이다. 또 ‘나만의 명화 스텐실 에코백 만들기’는 만료저작물 중 유명 화가의 작품을 활용해 에코백을 만드는 창작체험 프로그램이다. 지난 7월 문화행사에서는 약 300명의 어린이가 참여했으며, 이미 저작권이 만료된 피에트 몬드리안과 앙리 마티스의 작품을 만나보았다. 이번 8월 문화행사에는 추상미술로 유명한 바실리 칸딘스키의 작품과 앙리 마티스의 컷-아웃(cut-out) 기법을 활용한 작품을 주제로 창작체험 프로그램이 준비돼 있다. 이번 행사는 주중은 오후2시~오후5시, 토요일은 오전10시~오후5시까지 운영되며 사전예약과 현장접수를 모두 진행하며, 참가비는 무료다. 강석원 한국저작권위원회 위원장은 “박물관에 방문한 관람객들이 만료저작물을 활용한 이번 문화행사를 통해 잠자고 있는 그림을 나만의 작품으로 만들며 즐겁고 유익한 시간을 보내기를 바란다.”고 밝혔다....

title: ‘Are we not eating tonight?’ Myanmar’s military junta accused of using hunger as a ‘weapon’ by blocking vital food aid
creator: By Michael Mitsanas, Tanbirul Miraj Ripon, Helen Regan, Rebecca Wright and Avery Schmitz, CNN
content: (CNN) — Khin Mar Cho worries for her 4-year-old son as she struggles to scrape together enough food to feed him in a makeshift displacement camp at a crowded monastery in western Myanmar. Soldiers had stormed their village of Byine Phyu, Rakhine state, and forced her and other family members out of their homes. They detained all the men and shot her brother and other neighbors, she said. Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.

title: "No maneja ni su propia tropa": Milei carga contra Macri
creator: RT en Español
content: El presidente de Argentina, Javier Milei, cuestionó este viernes al exmandatario Mauricio Macri tras la aprobación en el Senado de la reforma jubilatoria , una medida que el jefe del Ejecutivo vetará. Milei apuntó contra Macri porque, siendo aliado de su gestión, no logró que el bloque de senadores del Pro, el partido que preside, votara el jueves en contra del proyecto de ley, que los libertarios rechazan en aras del "equilibrio fiscal" . La mañana de este viernes, Mauricio Macri utilizó su cuenta de la red social X (antes Twitter) para criticar a los legisladores de su espacio político que acompañaron la iniciativa, que establece un aumento de 8,1 % para jubilados y pensionados. "El partido ratifica que no avala un incremento del gasto previsional sin un financiamiento genuino" , dijo. A su vez, en diálogo con Radio Rivadavia, el presidente Milei hizo una interpretación que pone en duda la influencia de Macri dentro de su propio agrupamiento. "Si tomo su tuit, significa que no maneja la tropa . No es un problema mío, lo tiene que resolver puertas adentro Juntos por el Cambio", dijo en referencia a la alianza de centro derecha que integra el Pro. "O no maneja la tropa, o la tropa no entiende lo que hace, o no tiene magnitud del daño que está haciendo", sostuvo. Y añadió: "Lo que dice el tuit está en franca oposición a lo que hicieron sus legisladores , votaron todos este delirio". En su mensaje, el expresidente había sostenido que la mayoría de los...
