title: One of the last music performances at Kex Hostel is on Culture Night
content: One of the last music performances at Kex Hostel is on Culture Night Kex Hostel has been a popular destination for those who want to hear live music in Reykjavik. Photo/DJ Óli Dóri On Culture Night is one of the last live music performances before Kex Hostels closes the venue for live music. Halldór Ólafur Halldórsson, better known as DJ Óli Dóri, is the event manager at Kex Hostels and a host of Straumur radio show at X97. Tell me about the lineup at Kex tomorrow on Culture Night ? There will be live concerts from 2 p.m. until 9:30 pm, with a band playing every hour. KUSK will hopefully start at 2 p.m., and BSÍ will be the last band, playing at 9 p.m. There will be DJs playing between sets, and I will take the final DJ set after that. DJ Óli Dóri. Photo/Grímur Jón Sigurðsson Now that KEX is closing as a concert venue, how do you think that will affect the music scene in Reykjavík? I think this will have a bad effect on the scene. Venues for bands to perform, such as KEX, are becoming fewer, which is not good, and something needs to be done about that. Can you think of other venues like KEX for bands to play at now that it is closing? No, not right now. Some places are doing great things, but there is definitely a need for more mid-sized venues. Have you been DJing for a long time? I have been a DJ in Reykjavík for 20 years, and after finishing my set at KEX on Culture Night, I will play at Kaffibarinn back-to-back with Simon (fknhndsm). So, I urge everyone to...

title: Horóscopo diario, 25 de agosto de 2024
creator: EL CORREO
content: EL CORREO Sábado, 24 de agosto 2024, 01:30 Necesitas ser para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Opciones para compartir Copiar enlace WhatsApp Facebook X (antes Twitter) LinkedIn Telegram Threads Consulta la predicción del de hoy domingo 25 de agosto de 2024, para tu signo del zodiaco. Dedique hoy algo de tiempo a la familia. No se deje llevar por impulsos consumistas. Recompensa a sus esfuerzos profesionales. Debe hacer más ejercicio. Intente mantener la calma con su pareja. Compre eso que tanto le apetece desde hace tiempo. Deje de verlo todo negro en el trabajo. Debería caminar más. Día sembrado de escollos sentimentales. Verá satisfechas todas sus necesidades financieras. El apego a sus conocimientos le impide progresar en su trabajo. Antes de acostarse, dese un baño caliente, le relajará. Deje de huir de la palabra «matrimonio». Sin problemas económicos. Cuenta con oportunidades para mejorar en el trabajo. Tranquilidad absoluta, sobre todo mental. Querer quedar bien con todos quizá le dé problemas. Puede vivir con menos de lo que tiene. Su trabajo requiere un esfuerzo por su parte. Respecto a la salud, cuide sus pies. Disfrutará de manera especial del contacto con los demás. Cuidado con las nuevas inversiones que le proponen. Tomará decisiones inoportunas en su trabajo. Cuide su espalda, vigile su postura al sentarse. La sensualidad es hoy la protagonista, disfrútelo. Invitar está bien, pero con control. Demuestre lo necesario que es su puesto de trabajo....

title: Bir damlası bile stresi söküp alıyor! Bu yağın her bir zerresi çok faydalı
content: Aktarlarda satılan ve birçok kozmetik ürünü içerisinde kullanılan yağlar, erken tıp döneminden bu yana birçok fayda sağlaması sebebiyle pek çok kişinin tercihi olmaya devam ediyor. Özellikle de bazı yağların faydaları saymakla bitmeyecek kadar çok olduğu için asırlardır tıp alanında kullanılmasıyla dikkat çekiyor. Bu yağlardan biri olan yasemin yağı, sağlık açısından birçok faydayı aynı anda sağlıyor. Genel sağlığı desteklediği gibi vücudun birçok sistemine farklı farklı faydalar sunan yasemin yağına ilişkin yapılan araştırmalar da yasemin yağının faydalarını doğrulamış bulunuyor. Peki yasemin yağı faydaları nelerdir, neye iyi gelir? İşte yasemin yağının faydaları ve kullanım alanları... CİLT İÇİN OLDUKÇA İDEAL Antiseptik ve antibakteriyel özellikler gösterdiği araştırmalarca kanıtlanmış olan yasemin yağının cilde iyi geldiği bilinen araştırma sonuçları arasında yer alıyor. Özellikle de ciltte oluşan enfeksiyonlar ile güçlü bir şekilde mücadele edebilen yasemin yağı, bu enfeksiyonların daha hızlı bir şekilde iyileşmesini ve cildin eski haline dönmesini kolaylaştırıyor. Aynı zamanda cilt üzerindeki yaraların da daha hızlı geçmesine yardımcı olduğu bilinen yasemin yağı, birçok uzman tarafından ciltteki lekeleri gidermek için de öneriliyor. ARAŞTIRMALARA GÖRE AĞRILARA BİREBİR Araştırmaların yasemin yağı ile ilgili bir başka söylediği ise, bu yağın doğal bir ağrı kesici olduğu bilgisi oluyor....

title: Riverfront Festival comes back with a bang
creator: By ANNA ADAMS aadams@sixriversmedia.com
content: SURGOINSVILLE — Labor Day weekend will offer fun and festivities in Surgoinsville, as it has its Labor Day Festival at Riverfront Park on Friday and Saturday. The first celebration will be 4-10 p.m., Friday Aug. 30 at Surgoinsville Riverfront Park, near the banks of the Holston River. Live music will start at 5 p.m. and vendors will sell food and crafts. Surgoinsville Mayor Merrell Graham said almost 100 vendors are to attend. “I think, really, the most we’ve ever had is maybe 60,” he said. “It’s just growing.” Grand prizes will be drawn, giving people the opportunity to win bicycles, country hams and more. He estimates approximately 3,000 people will attend the festivities over the weekend. The next day, a community breakfast will be served from 8-10 a.m. at the First United Methodist Church Community Center. It is an $8 fee for entry and breakfast. “It’s a nice social event,” Graham said. “We always have a good crowd for it. And of course, we encourage people to come in and have a good time with us and have a nice breakfast.” The festivities continue at 12 p.m. at Riverfront Park. There will be worship, a car show, tractor show and awards for both. A flag retirement ceremony will be at 3 p.m. where Boy Scouts and Girl Scouts will participate in retiring old American flags that people have turned in by burning them, as is tradition. “It’s a very uplifting event, very patriotic,” Graham said. The Scouts will also honor veterans. “We ask all veterans, any veteran who would...

title: LIST: Brands that poked ‘friendly’ fun at Sara Duterte’s book
creator: Rappler.com
content: MANILA, Philippines – In the ever-entertaining world of social media, brands often jump on the latest trending topics, viral news, and memes — with the latest being Vice President Sara Duterte’s children’s book, Isang Kaibigan . This came after the intense exchange between Duterte and Senator Risa Hontiveros during the Senate budget deliberations on the proposed budget of the Office of the Vice President (OVP) for 2025 on Tuesday, August 20. After Hontiveros asked Duterte about the proposed allocated budget of P10 million for the children’s book, the Vice President accused the senator of politicking. Filipino netizens and brands poked fun at the book, which introduces Duterte as “one of your friends.” Through clever wordplay to cheeky ads, these brands have joined the conversation, in witty ways! Scholastic Philippines Scholastic Philippines promoted writer Andy Runton’s graphic novel series Owly , apparently alluding to recent allegations that Duterte gained “inspiration” from those books. Owly was originally published in 2009. Must Read Did ‘Owly: Just a Little Blue’ inspire Sara Duterte’s ‘Isang Kaibigan’ book? Japan Home Centre Japan Home Centre threw a cryptic message warning the public about fake pages pretending to be them. The post features a bird in the background, with a low opacity level. “We don’t appreciate this kind of attitude,” the home and lifestyle store wrote, imitating Hontiveros’s response to Duterte during the Senate hearing. Greenpeace Philippines...

title: 【2024米大統領選】現職の副大統領から民主党の大統領候補に! カマラ・ハリスの経歴とキャリア
creator: Talia Lakritz,Juliana Kaplan,Debanjali Bose,Joshua Nelken-Zitser
content: Montinique Monroe/Getty Images 11月に迫るアメリカ大統領選からバイデン大統領が撤退し、カマラ・ハリス副大統領が民主党の大統領候補に指名された。 ハリス氏は女性、黒人、ネイティブアメリカン系の初の副大統領として歴史にその名を刻んだ。 副大統領に就任する前は、上院議員やカリフォルニア州司法長官などを務めてきた。 大統領を目指して、カマラ・ハリス氏が戦っている。 カリフォルニア州選出の元上院議員で、現職の副大統領であるハリス氏は、バイデン大統領が 再選を断念 し、2024年の民主党候補としてハリス氏を支持すると表明した後に自身の選挙戦を開始した。 ハリス氏への支持を表明 した際、バイデン大統領は同氏を副大統領に選んだことは「わたしが下した最高の決断」だったと語った。その後、ハリス氏への支持と草の根の熱狂は急速に広がった。 ハリス陣営は選挙キャンペーンを始めてから 1日で8100万ドルを集め 、24時間で集めた献金の史上最高額を更新した。88万8000人の草の根の献金者のうち、60%が今回の大統領選で初めて献金した。 民主党の有力議員や支援者らの 支持を固めた ハリス氏は今週、イリノイ州シカゴで開催された民主党全国大会で候補指名を受諾した。 アメリカの革新的な副大統領の経歴とキャリアを紹介しよう。 生い立ち、家族、育った環境 カマラ・デビ・ハリス氏は1964年10月20日、カリフォルニア州オークランドで生まれた。 母親のシャマラ・ゴパラン(Shyamala Gopalan)氏はインドからアメリカに、父親のドナルド・ハリス(Donald Harris)氏はジャマイカからアメリカに移民した。ふたりはカリフォルニア大学バークレー校の大学院生として出会い、ハリス氏が子どもの頃に離婚した。 2人の移民の娘であるハリス氏の多民族的アイデンティティーは、歴史的な政治家としてのキャリアを築いた。黒人でもあり、南アジア系アメリカ人でもある同氏は、どちらの人種としても副大統領に選出された初めての人物だ。 ハリス氏には弁護士の妹 —— マヤ・ラクシュミ・ハリス(Maya Lakshmi Harris)氏 —— がいて、2016年の大統領選ではヒラリー・クリントン氏のシニア政策アドバイザーを、2020年の大統領選ではハリス陣営の責任者を務めた。 きょうだいは1人、妹のマヤ・ハリス氏だけ。 Melina Mara/The Washington Post via Getty Images ハリス氏は子ども時代の大部分をバークレーで過ごし、サウザンド・オークス小学校に通っていたと Berkeleyside は報じている。人種差別撤廃に向けた取り組みの一環として、同氏は子どもの頃、白人が多く住む地区まで「バス通学」をしていた。 2020年の民主党の予備選で最も印象的だったのは、討論会で1970年代の 強制バス通学に反対するバイデン氏 を批判する前に、ハリス氏が「カリフォルニア州に1人の少女がいた。彼女は公立学校を統合した2番目のクラスの1人で、毎日バスで通学していた。その少女がわたしだ」と語った場面だ。 ハリス氏は1986年にハワード大学を卒業した。 Marvin Joseph/The Washington Post via Getty Images...

title: 度が過ぎた推し活は「ホスト沼」と一緒?精神科医が教える「取扱注意」なホルモンの名前 - ニュースな本
creator: 伊藤 拓
content: 写真はイメージです Photo:PIXTA 近年すっかりブームとなった「推し活」。生活に張りを与え、仕事や勉強のモチベーションにもなる“推し”への応援は、幸せホルモンのドーパミンを脳内に分泌してくれる。しかし、楽しい推し活もいきすぎれば、ギャンブルやアルコール、ホストクラブへの過剰な貢ぎなどと同様の依存状態に陥ることも。精神科医の伊藤拓氏が危険をはらんだ推し活のやり方に「待った!」をかける。※本稿は、伊藤拓氏 『精神科医だけが知っているネガティブ感情の整理術』 (ハーパーコリンズ・ジャパン)の一部を抜粋・編集したものです。 幸せホルモン「セロトニン」と 「ドーパミン」はどう違うのか 睡眠は、体を休ませたり、脳内の情報を整理したりと、私たちが生きていく上でとても重要なものです。質の高い睡眠を得るために欠かせないのが、「メラトニン」というホルモンです。 googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('gpt-dol-article-middle'); }); メラトニンは脳内の松果体という部位から分泌され、睡眠と覚醒のリズムを整え、自然な眠気をもたらすために働きます。そのため、「睡眠ホルモン」とも呼ばれています。そのほかにも抗酸化作用があることから、老化を緩やかにし、免疫力を高める働きも期待できます。 実は、このメラトニンの原料となっているのが、セロトニンなのです。 セロトニンは、朝方から体内で作られ始め、陽が沈む頃からメラトニンに変化していきます。つまり、体内で作られるセロトニンが多いほど、夜に分泌されるメラトニンの量も増えるわけです。 睡眠不足になると、人はネガティブな感情を抱きやすくなります。セロトニンは寝ている間にも、メラトニンとなって貢献してくれているわけです。セロトニンがいかに大事か、おわかりいただけたかと思います。 セロトニン、ノルアドレナリンと並んで、感情にかかわりが深い神経伝達物質に「ドーパミン」があります。セロトニンは、ノルアドレナリンとドーパミンの分泌を制御し、脳内物質のバランスを保つ役割を担っていますが、ドーパミンを分けてご紹介しているのは、この脳内物質の特徴をきちんとお伝えしたかったからです。 ドーパミンは分泌されると幸福感が得られることから、セロトニンと同様に「幸せホルモン」として紹介されることがあるのですが、セロトニンが「穏やかな幸福感」であることに比べ、ドーパミンで得られるのは高揚感のある幸せ、より興奮度の高い幸せ――いわば「快楽」です。たとえば、大好きなアーティストのコンサートで感激する、スポーツの試合で盛り上がる、そんな時に脳内ではドーパミンが分泌されています。

title: “格好いい”パパの姿を今度こそ 宮里優作は昨年の雪辱に向けて週末へ
content: ◇国内男子◇Sansan KBCオーガスタ 2日目(23日)◇ (福岡)◇7274yd(パー72)◇曇り(観衆2421人) が に来て思い出すのは、やっぱり首位から出て3位に終わった昨年大会の最終日。ショットの乱調でピンを狙えず、6年ぶりの優勝はみるみると離れていった。「ちょっとだけ真っすぐに行ってくれていたら...」。その悔しさはいまも消えていない。 > 今年は開幕前に したことで、スロースタートを余儀なくされた。地道に練習を重ね、ようやく回復の見通しが立ったのは6月あたり。「ヘッドスピードが去年ぐらいに戻って」と、7月「セガサミーカップ」では今季ベストの5位で終えた。それでも「あとはアイアンショット。もうやりながら直すしかないけど、今週はピンに全然飛んで行かない」と話し、万全からは遠い状態が続く。 予選2日間のフェアウェイキープ率も46.4%(13/28)にとどまっているが、28.6%(4/14)だった昨年最終日の状態を思い返せば「今年はまだちょっと楽かな」と思える。ショットは修正段階ながら、31位から出て6バーディ、1ボギーの「67」。首位と4打差の7アンダー9位に浮上したのは、アプローチとパターでピンチをしのぎ、チャンスを確実に仕留め続けたからこそ。激しい雨が降った出だし3ホールもパーで通過する忍耐力が光った。 昨年は19位で迎えた3日目のムービングデーに「65」をマークして一気に首位浮上という展開だっただけに、雪辱を果たせるかは「3日目次第」とにらむ。昨年に続き、週末は長女の莱杏(らん)さんが“格好いい”パパの姿を見に新幹線に乗って駆けつけるそう。「スコアを見て、こっち(福岡)に来るはずで。去年の2日目が終わったときよりも、今回の順位の方がいいからまだマシかな」。今度こそ、家族で勝利の喜びを分かち合いたい。(福岡県糸島市/石井操)

title: Opinion: B.C. must evolve beyond economic nostalgia
creator: Katie Shaw
content: In times of economic uncertainty, it’s easy to romanticize the past. However, in the face of slow growth and increasing geopolitical challenges, British Columbia cannot afford to cling to outdated economic frameworks. Instead, we must adopt innovative economic strategies that address the unique challenges of today and lay the groundwork for a prosperous future. The current provincial government, operating within its available tools, has implemented several policy measures aimed at economic stabilization and growth. For instance, the elimination of Medical Services Plan (MSP) premiums has helped alleviate a financial burden for both individuals and businesses, making health care more accessible while increasing disposable income. The reduction in small business taxes has also provided necessary support to entrepreneurs and small enterprises. Additionally, the Manufacturing Jobs Fund has been focused not only on preserving existing jobs but also on creating new opportunities in sectors vital to our economic future. While these efforts are important, they highlight the inherent limits of government action alone and underscore the need for broader collaboration across sectors to achieve sustainable, long-term growth. Government alone cannot drive economic growth. The future of B.C.’s economy hinges on a new type of collaboration between the public sector and industry. Economic growth must be a shared endeavour, aligned around common priorities that benefit all British...

title: Americans Now Need $2.5 Million To Be Considered Wealthy: Charles Schwab Survey
creator: Tyler Durden
content: Authored by Naveen Athrappully via The Epoch Times, The amount of money required to be seen as rich has risen over the past years amid inflation, with younger people having a lower wealth benchmark, according to a recent survey by financial services company Charles Schwab. “Americans now think it takes an average of $2.5 million to be considered wealthy—which is up slightly from 2023 and 2022 ($2.2 million),” reads an Aug. 21 statement by the company. “By generation, Boomers have the highest threshold of what it takes to be considered wealthy, at $2.8 million, while the younger generations, Millennials and Gen Z, have lower thresholds of what is considered wealthy” at only $1.2 million, it adds. California had the highest wealth expectations, with respondents from San Francisco saying it takes $4.4 million to be considered rich. Southern California was at the second spot with $3.4 million. Dallas, Phoenix, and Houston had the lowest thresholds at $2.2 million to $2.3 million. The jump in the level of what is considered wealthy has happened amid a period of surging inflation, which has raised the overall cost of living. As living expenses rise, so does people’s estimate of how much money is required to live a wealthy life. The survey’s $2.5 million wealth threshold is nearly 14 percent higher than the 2022 level. During this period, the cost of living rose by more than 11 percent, according to data from the St. Louis Fed. Despite facing the challenge of high inflation, more...

title: Giáo sư Ca Văn Thỉnh - Mùa thu nhớ mãi
content: Chưa bao giờ tôi thấy mình sung sướng đến như vậy. Tôi hít thở đến muốn vỡ ngực từng luồng không khí độc lập, tự do khi hay tin cả nước đã giành được chính quyền, Thủ đô Hà Nội đã về tay nhân dân, chúng tôi được bay nhảy với đôi cánh của một công dân tự do, bay khắp bầu trời đất nước bao la này đã về tay nhân dân Việt Nam...". Đoạn hồi ức trên được Giáo sư Ca Văn Thỉnh nhắc lại trong bài viết mang tên Mùa thu nhớ mãi , đăng trên báo Nhân Dân năm 1982, những ngày kỷ niệm Cách mạng tháng Tám và Quốc khánh 2.9. Người con của quê hương Mỏ Cày (Bến Tre) ở tuổi ngoài 20 đã đi hàng nghìn cây số ra Hà Nội học Trường cao đẳng Sư phạm Đông Dương. Đồng môn của anh lúc này là những thanh niên yêu nước và trí tuệ: Cao Xuân Huy, Tôn Quang Phiệt, Đặng Thai Mai... Họ cũng nhanh chóng hòa mình vào các phong trào yêu nước sục sôi khi đó: đòi thả chí sĩ Phan Bội Châu (1925), để tang chí sĩ Phan Châu Trinh (1926), truy điệu chí sĩ Lương Văn Can (1927). Giữa năm 1928, tốt nghiệp trường cao đẳng sư phạm, Ca Văn Thỉnh trở về Bến Tre theo nghề dạy học cho đến năm 1945. Khu lưu niệm Giáo sư Ca Văn Thỉnh tại H.Mỏ Cày, tỉnh Bến Tre Ảnh: Tư liệu Gắn bó với nghề giáo, ông có điều kiện vừa tham gia phong trào...

title: Plusieurs morts et blessés par une attaque au couteau en Allemagne
creator: webmestre@ledevoir.com (Agence France-Presse)
content: Plusieurs personnes ont été tuées ou blessées vendredi dans une attaque au couteau lors d’une fête communale en plein air à Solingen, dans l’ouest de l’Allemagne, ont rapporté les médias allemands. Selon le quotidien Bild, au moins trois personnes ont été tuées et plusieurs blessées. Jointe par l’AFP, la police locale n’a pas souhaité faire de commentaire dans l’immédiat. Le site Internet du quotidien « Solinger Tageblatt », citant notamment les pompiers, faisait également état de trois personnes décédées ainsi que sept personnes blessées. Le journal cite des témoins oculaires faisant état d’un auteur présumé qui a pris la fuite. Selon les mêmes sources de presse, l’attaque est survenue lors des festivités célébrant le 650 e anniversaire de la ville de Solingen. Une importante intervention de police était en cours dans la nuit, des images de télévision sur place montrant de nombreux véhicules des forces de l’ordre ainsi qu’une zone bouclée et sécurisée par des agents et des écrans de protection. La zone concernée se situe dans le centre de cette ville de plus 150 000 habitants, située dans le bassin de la Ruhr, non loin de Düsseldorf et au nord de Cologne. Selon le « Solinger Tageblatt », les autorités ont demandé aux visiteurs de quitter les lieux de la fête et d’évacuer le centre-ville où résonnaient des sirènes. Le festival a débuté vendredi et devait se poursuivre jusqu’à dimanche. À voir en vidéo

title: Disdik DKI Jakarta Catat Ada 92 Siswa Ditahan Polisi karena Ikut Demo Tolak RUU Pilkada
content: Aksi mahasiswa se-Jabar di Gedung DPRD Jawa Barat soal kawal putusan MK yang coba dianulir DPR. Berikut isi 6 tuntutannya. Aksi yang masif dalam kawal Putusan MK itu berlanjut dalam beberapa demonnstrasi sporadis kemarin. Bagaimana selanjtunya? Mahasiswa UII itu juga digebuk oleh polisi menggunakan bambu berulang kali di bagian perut. Polres Metro Jakarta Barat melepas 105 demonstran yang ditangkap saat aksi tolak pembahasan RUU Pilkada di DPR. Puluhan personel Korps Brimob berhasil membubarkan massa aksi demonstrasi di Gedung KPU, Menteng, Jakarta Pusat, pada Jumat, 23 Agustus 2024. Aksi mahasiswa mengawal putusan MK masih terjadi di berbagai daerah hari ini. Di Surabaya dan Garut aksi sempat diwarnai kericuhan. "Jokowi mengklaim dirinya bahkan tidak memikirkan untuk menerbitkan Perpu yang bakal mengubah ketentuan MK soal syarat pencalonan kepala daerah. Sejumlah media Jepang menyoroti isu terkini menjelang Pemilihan Kepala Daerah (Pilkada) serentak di Indonesia Baleg DPR menganulir dua putusan MK. Peneliti Pusat Kajian LSJ UGM sebut upaya penguasa menaruh pion-pion pentingnya di daerah, termasuk Kaesang. Tim Kuasa Hukum Partai Buruh Said Salahuddin menilai bahwa Komisi Pemilihan Umum atau KPU tidak wajib untuk berkonsultasi dengan Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat (DPR) dalam membahas Peraturan KPU atau PKPU pascaputusan Mahkamah Konstitusi (MK) ihwal Pilkada. Sebab, katanya, waktu yang tersisa sebelum pendaftaran pasangan calon tidak banyak.

title: Local houses of worship attend safety meeting
creator: Vince Ybarra
content: FRESNO, Calif. (KFSN) -- Federal, state and local agencies gathered to offer security information and resources to faith-based organizations at People's Church in Northeast Fresno on Friday. "We know houses of worship are vulnerable, they're vulnerable to attack through terrorism and hate crimes," said one guest speaker. Maricella Gutierrez was one of dozens who attended the event. She works for Divine Mercy Catholic Church in Clovis. She said the meeting has changed her perspective on safety. "I feel like things are a little bit different now. We have to be a little more proactive about our safety and the safety of our communities," said Gutierrez. It's a topic that is timely for faith leaders in the Valley. In October of last year, an employee at Temple Beth Israel in Northwest Fresno found one of the glass doors shattered. Then in May of this year, police made arrests for alleged vandalism, trespassing, and making threats to staff at the temple. Across the country, other places of worship have faced violent attacks, including shootings. Jesse Rangel from the U.S. Department of Homeland Security says the symposium was about giving people tools to handle a crisis. "This is a personal conversation that you're having with you, you all day long," said Rangel. The meeting included information about everything from how to apply a tourniquet to how to report a crime. "I speak to people often, and they tell me they don't report, because of fearful of reprisal, I get a long list of...

title: Barabanki News: जहांगीराबाद से जिला अस्पताल तक घायल बच्चों की चीख पुकार
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, बाराबंकी
content: बाराबंकी/जहांगीराबाद। सुबह के अभी आठ ही बजे थे कि अवध एकेडमी स्कूल बच्चों की चीख पुकार से गूंज उठा। इलाके में रहने वाला हर कोई स्कूल की ओर भागा चला जा रहा था। बच्चों को चंद मिनट पहले स्कूल छोड़कर निकले परिजन वापस पहुंचे तो नजारा देखकर अवाक रह गए। छज्जे के मलबे में खून से लथपथ दबे मासूम मदद के लिए गुहार लगा रहे थे। वहां मौजूद हर कोई बच्चों को गोद में उठाकर अस्पताल की तरफ भागने लगा। सीएचसी जहांगीराबाद में बच्चों को दर्द निवारक इंजेक्शन देकर जिला अस्पताल के लिए रेफर किया जा रहा था। एक-एक कर कई एंबुलेंस सीएचसी जहांगीराबाद व स्कूल से बच्चों को लेकर जिला अस्पताल की तरफ दौड़ लगाने में जुट गई। एंबुलेंस के अलावा स्कूल और निजी वाहनों से भी परिजन बच्चों को लेकर आने लगे। स्ट्रेचर और व्हील चेयर नहीं मिली तो लोग गोद में ही बच्चों को गोद में उठाकर इमरजेंसी तक पहुंचे। जिला अस्पताल में घायल बच्चों को देखने पहुंचे परिजनों की भीड़ को नियंत्रित करने के लिए पूरे परिसर को छावनी में तब्दील कर दिया गया। घटना के दो घंटे बाद तक बच्चों के आने का सिलसिला जारी रहा। इस बीच आंखों में आंसू और माथे पर चिंता की लकीरें लेकर पहुंचे माता-पिता अपने बच्चों की एक झलक पाने के लिए अपने लाडलों की तलाश करते नजर आए। महिलाएं अनहोनी की आशंका में रो रही थीं तो पुरुष उन्हें ढांढस बंधाते हुए ट्रामा सेंटर की इमरजेंसी में एक कमरे से दूसरे कमरे तक दौड़ भाग करते दिखे। हादसे में ज्योति यादव का पैर टूटा था तो शिवानी के हाथ में चोट आई थी। आकाश के सिर पर चोट लगने से तेज रक्तस्राव हो रहा था। मौके पर पहुंचे सीएमओ भी हाथों में ग्लब्स पहनकर बच्चों का इलाज करने में जुटे दिखे। डीएम-एसपी ने भी अस्पताल पहुंचकर घायल बच्चों को दिए जा रहे...

title: Exsecretaria testificó en contra del expresidente de Argentina Alberto Fernández
creator: Ilse Quintana
content: La exsecretaria de Alberto Fernández, María Cantero, declaró ante la Fiscalía que mantuvo una relación cercana durante 35 años con el expresidente de Argentina. Afirma que tuvo conversaciones con la ex primera dama Fabiola Yáñez donde le habría contado sobre la violencia de género que recibió por parte de Fernández.

title: Житель приграничного региона РФ пострадал после удара украинского дрона
creator: Газета.Ru
content: Житель приграничного региона РФ пострадал после удара украинского дрона Вооруженные силы Украины (ВСУ) атаковали беспилотным летательным аппаратом поселок Малиновка Белгородского района, в результате чего местный житель получил ранение. Об этом сообщил в своем Telegram-канале губернатор Белгородской области Вячеслав Гладков . По его словам, мужчина получил осколочное ранение левого межреберья и слепое осколочное ранение бедра. Пострадавшего госпитализировали в областную клиническую больницу. «В поселке в результате сброса взрывного устройства с беспилотника в одном частном доме выбиты окна», — написал Гладков. 23 августа губернатор сообщил , что беспилотники украинских войск атаковали сразу пять сел в Белгородской области. В результате атаки никто не пострадал, однако были повреждены ряд домов и транспортных средств. Также в пятницу ВСУ атаковали село Ржевку в Шебекинском городском округе, в результате чего ранение получила местная жительница. По словам Гладкова, пострадавшая с осколочным ранением ноги была доставлена в больницу. Ранее Гладков предупредил о рисках потери отопления в Белгороде зимой.

title: Jogador do Flamengo inicia tratamento para novo visual
creator: Jogada10
content: Um dos destaques do Flamengo na temporada começou um procedimento para mudar seu visual. O volante Allan decidiu tornar cacheado o seu cabelo. Para alcançar o resultado, Allan contratou Ingrid Cacau, especialista em cabelos cacheados e crespos. Cacau, aliás, tem realizado todos os procedimentos na residência do atleta, no bairro da Barra da Tijuca, Zona Oeste do Rio de Janeiro. A especialista compartilhou o progresso do tratamento nas redes sociais: "Na última quinta-feira, recebi o contato do volante Allan Souza para iniciar um processo de cacheamento. No sábado, realizamos o primeiro procedimento. Agradeço pela confiança e carinho com meu trabalho. Estamos juntos." Recentemente, Allan enfrentou dificuldades. Além de não se destacar com a camisa do Rubro-Negro, passou por problemas pessoais com Jordana Holleben. Eles estão juntos desde 2018, mas, há algum tempo, Jordana havia arquivado as fotos com o atleta. A crise, no entanto, parece que foi resolvida. Siga nosso conteúdo nas redes sociais: Twitter , Instagram e Facebook .

title: غوارديولا : عودة غوندوغان لن تؤثر على مستقبل باقي اللاعبين
content: هاي كورة- أكد بيب غوارديولا أن عودة إلكاي غوندوغان إلى مانشستر سيتي لن تدفع النادي للاستغناء عن أي لاعب قبل غلق نافذة الانتقالات. وقال غوارديولا “التعاقد مع غوندوغان لن يؤثر على مستقبل باقي اللاعبين، الجميع سيبقون .. ليس لدينا العمق الكافي في الفريق، لدينا 19 أو 20 أو 21 لاعبا.. هناك الكثير من المباريات ويجب على الجميع القتال”.

title: బాబు ఎత్తుకు రేవంత్‌ చిత్తు!
creator: bharath kumar
content: హైదరాబాద్‌, ఆగస్టు 23 (నమస్తే తెలంగాణ): తెలంగాణపై ఏపీ సీఎం చంద్రబాబు మరోసారి తన బ్రాండ్‌ రాజకీయాలు ప్రయోగించారు. ఫలితంగా తెలంగాణ ఖజానాకు భారీ కన్నం పడింది. బాబు తనదైన శైలిలో ఢిల్లీలో చక్రం తిప్పడంతో తెలంగాణకు ఏకంగా రూ.2,500 కోట్ల నష్టం వాటిల్లింది. సమైక్య రాష్ట్రంలో విదేశీ బ్యాంకుల నుంచి తెచ్చిన అప్పుల్లో తెలంగాణ వాటా కూడా ఏపీ కట్టిందంటూ బాబు కేంద్రాన్ని నమ్మించారు. దీంతో రాష్ర్టానికి రావాల్సిన నిధుల నుంచి కేంద్ర ప్రభుత్వం ఏకపక్షంగా రూ.2,500 కోట్లను ఏపీకి మళ్లించడం గమనార్హం. దీనిపై సీఎం రేవంత్‌రెడ్డి సహా మంత్రివర్గం ఎవరూ స్పందించకపోగా.. ఈ పరిణామాలతో తెలంగాణ ఆర్థిక శాఖ అధికారులు విస్తుపోతున్నారు. ఏపీ పునర్విభజన చట్టం 2014లోని సెక్షన్‌ 54 [1] స్ఫూర్తికి విరుద్ధంగా కేంద్రం నిర్ణయం తీసుకున్నదని మండిపడుతున్నారు. రాష్ట్ర విభజన సమయంలో తెలంగాణ, ఏపీ మధ్య జనాభా దామాషాలో ఆస్తులు, అప్పుల విభజన జరగాలని ఏపీ పునర్విభజన చట్టం 2014లోని సెక్షన్‌ 54 [1] స్పష్టం చేస్తున్నదని నిపుణులు చెప్తున్నారు. వివిధ ప్రాజెక్టుల కోసం దేశీయంగా కేంద్ర ప్రభుత్వం, ఇతర సంస్థల నుంచి తెచ్చిన రుణాలతోపాటు జపాన్‌కు చెందిన జైకా, వరల్డ్‌ బ్యాంకు వంటి విదేశీ సంస్థల నుంచి తెచ్చిన అప్పులు కూడా పంపకాల్లో భాగంగా ఉన్నాయి. విదేశీ బ్యాంకుల నుంచి తెచ్చిన నిధులు రూ.30వేల కోట్ల వరకు ఉంటాయని అంచనా. ప్రాజెక్టు చేపట్టిన ప్రాంతం, నిధుల వినియోగాలతో సంబంధం లేకుండా రెండు రాష్ర్టాల మధ్య అప్పుల పంపకం జరగాల్సి ఉంటుంది. 2014లో చంద్రబాబు అధికారంలోకి వచ్చిన తర్వాత దాదాపు 15 ప్రాజెక్టులకు చెందిన అప్పులపై కొర్రీలు పెట్టారు. తొమ్మిది ప్రాజెక్టుల అప్పును వినియోగం ఆధారంగా, మరో నాలుగు ప్రాజెక్టుల రుణాలను అవి ఉన్న ప్రాంతం ఆధారంగా, మరో రెండు...

title: El país de Sudamérica con el crecimiento económico más rápido del mundo: superará en 10 años el PIB de China e India
content: Dina Boluarte . Patricia Benavides . Christian Cueva . Paolo Guerrero . Perú vs. Turquía . Senamhi . Dólar en Perú . Código Procesal Penal . Pamela López . Fonavi . Horóscopo . Dolar BCV . DolarToday . ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS CINE Y SERIES DÓLAR SUSCRÍBETE Últimas Noticias Un país de Sudamérica ha sorprendido al mundo con su impresionante crecimiento económico, superando a potencias como China e India. Su éxito se debe a un recurso clave que ha transformado su desarrollo en pocos años. En la última década, el escenario global es dominado por las potencias asiáticas, con China e India a la cabeza de las economías de mayor crecimiento. Sin embargo, un pequeño país de Sudamérica ha irrumpido en la escena mundial con un aumento que desafía todas las expectativas. Esta nación, que hasta hace poco era uno de los más pobres de la región, ha logrado un salto sin precedentes, posicionándose como la economía de más rápido crecimiento en el planeta. El Fondo Monetario Internacional (FMI) ha destacado que este país de Sudamérica ha mantenido un desarrollo sostenido a tasas de dos dígitos en los últimos cinco años, y se espera que continúe con dicho ritmo durante la próxima década. title: MPVL paints to give govt bldgs a new look soon
content: Mysuru: State-owned Mysuru Paints and Varnish Limited (MPVL), established by the Maharaja of Mysuru, Nalwadi Krishnaraja Wadiyar, will supply paints and emulsions for govt buildings in the city. The new directive aims to raise MPVL’s annual turnover to Rs 500 crore in the 2024-25 financial year, from the existing Rs 352 crore. The PSU, supplier of the indelible ink used in elections in more than 30 countries, has sought to be promoted as an industry to compete with private players. For the last six decades, MPVL has been supplying indelible ink for all state elections across the country. Apart from indelible ink, the company also manufactures marker pens. In its recent order, the state govt notified usage of MPVL paints and emulsions for all its schools, hospitals, and other govt buildings. All these years, the various govt departments had been issuing tenders and awarding contracts to private individuals and agencies to paint their properties. However, now, the govt has made it mandatory for all govt departments to use only MPVL paints and emulsions. A directive to this effect was issued by MB Patil, the state industries minister. Speaking to TOI, Mohammed Irfan, the MPVL managing director, said the govt directive will not only help the company improve its annual turnover, but also be a shot in the arm for the public sector.

title: Fontaines D.C. nos cuenta sobre ‘Romance’, la influencia de ‘Akira’ y una curiosa relación entre Irlanda y México
creator: Jesús González
content: Lo que necesitas saber: Aprovechando el estreno de 'Romance', el nuevo disco de Fontaines D.C., platicamos con Conor Deegan sobre este álbum y mucho más. Amar en estos tiempos parece un verdadero acto de valentía, pues cada vez es más complicado declarar lo que sentimos por miedo al rechazo o a salir heridos . Y no solo nos referimos a una pareja, también lo decimos a la hora de demostrar amor por lo que nos gusta, pensamos o creemos. Sin embargo, hay quienes no tienen nos recuerdan que no debemos sentir temor ni defender lo que amamos, como el caso de Fontaines D.C. Desde hace un buen rato, esta agrupación originaria de Dublín, Irlanda se convirtió en uno de los actos más interesantes en la escena rockera británica actual . Y cómo no, si además de tener una propuesta musical que te sacude por completo, te pegan de lleno e la cara con letras honestas y directas sobre muchas situaciones a las que nos enfrentamos como humanos en la vida y en el día a día. Platicamos con Fontaines D.C. por el estreno de ‘Romance’ Este 2024 y luego de mucha espera, Fontaines D.C. está de vuelta por la puerta grande con su cuarto álbum de estudio, Romance , un disco en el que definitivamente, nos muestran una etapa mucho más madura experimentado con otros ritmos y géneros, pero también, de manera profesional y personal, la agrupación nos deja claro que se encuentran en uno de los mejores momentos de toda su carrera. Aprovechando el lanzamiento de este nuevo material...

title: Vijayendra on Muda row: CM Siddaramaiah will resign soon
content: Hubballi: BJP state president BY Vijayendra said chief minister Siddaramaiah will soon step down in connection with the Muda scam . Speaking to reporters here on Friday, Vijayendra said a lot of discussion is going on at the Delhi level about the Congress govt in Karnataka. As a result, the CM is taking all Congress MLAs into confidence. He said the Congress party high command is also thinking of changing the CM, and discussions on this issue are still underway. CM is desperately trying to take all MLAs into confidence, showing that the high command might be in favour of changing the CM. Besides, DyCM DK Shivakumar’s open statement that he will be with the CM like a solid rock has led to suspicion that the CM will be forced to quit his post, he said. He alleged that the CM has been involved in both Muda irregularities and the Valmiki Corporation scam, so his days are now numbered, and he will soon resign from the post of CM. He alleged that the CM has done nothing for the development of the North Karnataka region even after 18 months of assuming office. “It is an inactive and dead govt for the people of the state,” he added. He also hit back at minister Dinesh Gundu Rao for alleging that the Yediyurappa family is also involved in corruption cases and said that if the minister has any documents, he should produce them to prove his allegations. “I am ready to face any inquiry, and also I don’t want to reply to those who speak lightly and make baseless allegations,” he said. title: 兵庫知事巡り 地元市長からも苦言
content: 兵庫県の斎藤元彦知事のパワハラ疑惑などを調べる県議会の調査特別委員会(百条委員会)で23日、職員らの証人尋問が行われ、本格的な調査が始まった。職員からは「知事から強い叱責があった」との証言が出たほか、この日公開されたアンケートでは約4割が斎藤氏のパワハラを見聞きしたと回答。県内の市長会からも県政の混乱を指摘する要望書が出されるなど、斎藤氏を取り巻く環境は厳しさを増している。

title: Van por entrega de 100 mil títulos de propiedad en #Edoméx
content: Toluca/Estado de México El Instituto Mexiquense de la Vivienda Social (IMEVIS) informó que durante la presente administración estatal se han entregado alrededor de 4,100 títulos de propiedad , y se ha establecido la meta de otorgar 100,000 títulos a viviendas irregulares para 2029. De acuerdo con cifras del Instituto Nacional de Estadística y Geografía (INEGI), en el Estado de México existen aproximadamente 540,000 predios en situación irregular. La meta del IMEVIS cubriría cerca del 18.5% de estos inmuebles al finalizar el sexenio. Para 2024, el objetivo es alcanzar la entrega de 15,000 títulos , de los cuales 12,000 se gestionarán a través de Juicios Sumarios de Usucapión, un incremento significativo en comparación con los 7,000 títulos entregados en 2023. Alejandro Tenorio Esquivel, director del IMEVIS, explicó que los Juicios Sumarios de Usucapión, utilizados en el 80% de los casos, tienen una duración aproximada de 2 horas y 40 minutos. "Antes de llegar a este punto, el instituto revisa y valida la documentación necesaria a través de sus delegaciones, para luego remitirla a los jueces especializados en Lerma y Ecatepec, quienes se encargan de estos procesos", señaló Tenorio. Este método contrasta con los juicios tradicionales, que pueden tardar hasta un año y cuatro meses en completarse, además de generar costos entre 26,000 y 50,000 pesos si se contrata un abogado , mientras que el costo del Juicio Sumario es de 983 pesos. Además de facilitar...

title: Treino do Santos: Carille deve promover mudanças no time titular
creator: Esporte News Mundo
content: Nesta sexta-feira (23), o Santos finalizou a preparação para o jogo diante o Amazonas, neste sábado, às 16:00 (de Brasília), no estádio da Vila Belmiro. Confronto válido pela 23°rodada do Campeonato Brasileiro da Série B. O Peixe necessita da vitória, já que vem de duas partidas sem vencer (um empate e uma derrota), e caiu para a terceira posição na classificação com 38 pontos. Para a partida, o técnico Fábio Carille vai realizar mudanças e fez na última atividade um treino tático e priorizou as bolas paradas. Nestas alterações no time titular, o treinador deve promover as entradas de Sandry, Giuliano recuperado de lesão e do atacante Wendel Silva recém-contratado. Os laterais JP Chermont e Hayner estão suspensos e não jogam. O volante Diego Pituca e o centroavante Julio Furch devem iniciar no banco de reservas. O atacante Willian Bigode apresentou dores no joelho direito após o jogo contra o Guarani e, por conta disso, não ficará à disposição diante do Amazonas. Trabalhos de hoje e entrevista com Escobar. pic.twitter.com/692xtPUHeP Uma provável escalação do Peixe será: Gabriel Brazão, Rodrigo Ferreira, Gil, Jair e Gonzalo Escobar; João Schmidt, Sandry e Giuliano; Otero, Guilherme e Wendel Silva.

title: Brian Sarmiento y la vez que el presidente de Cusco FC le dio el auto de Toretto
creator: Enzo Mori
content: Sarmiento, quien también ha jugado en clubes de España, Argentina, Brasil y Bolivia, recordó la vez en que el actual DT de Alianza Lima lo llamó para que juegue en el Perú y también confesó cómo obtuvo el vehículo mencionado. “ ”, fueron sus primeras palabras. ”, agregó el exjugador. Finalmente, señaló que en las pretensiones colocó el auto en específico, pero no imaginó que el presidente del club iba a aceptar. “ ”, sentenció. Cabe recordar que, durante su paso por Cusco FC en 2015, Sarmiento anotó siete goles en un total de 29 partidos. Coincidió con Mariano Soso, quien estaba ejerciendo el trabajo de entrenador por primera vez en su carrera. Para la siguiente temporada, Brian siguió su carrera en Banfield de Argentina. Luego pasó por otros clubes como Newell’s Old Boys, Volos (Grecia) y Aurora. El próximo partido de Cusco FC será ante Unión Comercio en el estadio Municipal Carlos Vidaurre García, ubicado en Tarapoto. El encuentro, válido por la fecha 9 del Torneo Clausura 2024, está programado para jugarse el lunes 26 de agosto desde la 1:00 p.m. (hora peruana) y será transmitido por L1 MAX (antes Liga 1 MAX), disponible en la parrilla de canales de DIRECTV, Claro TV y Best Cable. En estos momentos, el conjunto dirigido por Miguel Rondelli se ubica en la tercera casilla del Torneo Clausura 2024. Tiene 14 puntos y solo está detrás de Universitario de Deportes (15 puntos) y Alianza Lima (17 puntos). El combinado dorado ha iniciado muy bien el...

title: Kangra News: आशीष बुटेल ने बंड विहार में नुकसान का लिया जायजा
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, कांगड़ा
content: पालमपुर (कांगड़ा)। मुख्य संसदीय सचिव शहरी विकास एवं शिक्षा आशीष बुटेल ने शुक्रवार को पंचायत बंड़ बिहार में भारी वर्षा से हुए नुकसान का जायजा लिया और प्रभावित लोगों से मिले। आशीष ने कहा कि भारी वर्षा के कारण कृषि विश्वविद्यालय पालमपुर का तालाब टूटने से अचानक आए पानी से लोगों की जमीन और घरों को नुकसान हुआ है। सीपीएस ने कहा कि प्रशासन को प्रभावित लोगों को जल्द राहत उपलब्ध करवाने के लिए दिशा-निर्देश जारी किए गए हैं। उन्होंने कहा कि आपदा की इस घड़ी में सरकार और वह स्वयं प्रभावित लोगों के साथ हैं और लोगों को हरसंभव सहायता उपलब्ध करवाने का प्रयास किया जा रहा है। उन्होंने कहा कि अधिकारियों को बरसात में हुए नुकसान का आंकलन तैयार कर सरकार को रिपोर्ट भेजने के निर्देश दिए गए हैं। अधिक वर्षा के कारण पालमपुर विधानसभा क्षेत्र में सड़कों, पेयजल योजनाओं और बिजली के ट्रांसफार्मर और तारों को भी नुकसान हुआ है। इन्हें भी जल्द बहाल करने के दिशा-निर्देश अधिकारियों को दिए गए हैं, ताकि लोगों को असुविधा सामना नहीं करना पड़े।

title: Atlético-MG encaminha transferência de jovem promessa
creator: Esporte News Mundo
content: O Atlético-MG está prestes a finalizar a transferência do jovem meio-campista Caio Ribas, de 20 anos, para o Santa Clara, de Portugal. O jogador, que integrou o clube mineiro por oito anos, se despediu por meio das redes sociais, expressando sua gratidão ao Galo por sua formação e trajetória. O contrato de Ribas com o Atlético estava vigente até o fim de 2026, mas o clube optou por negociar o atleta agora, mantendo uma fatia dos seus direitos econômicos. Formado nas divisões de base do Atlético-MG, Caio Ribas iniciou sua trajetória com a camisa do Galo no sub-14, onde participou de competições como o Brasileiro, Mineiro e a Copa São Paulo de Futebol Júnior. Ao longo desse período, o jovem jogador também foi convocado para as seleções de base, demonstrando seu talento e potencial. Apesar de não ter feito sua estreia oficial pelo time principal do Atlético, Caio Ribas chegou a treinar com o elenco profissional. Na ocasião, o técnico Jorge Sampaoli já havia notado o potencial do atleta, o que levou à sua inclusão nos treinos da equipe principal. A negociação com o Santa Clara reflete a estratégia do Atlético-MG de valorizar e negociar suas promessas da base, assegurando retornos financeiros e mantendo participação futura em possíveis transferências. A saída de Caio Ribas também evidencia a confiança do clube em sua capacidade de formar e desenvolver novos talentos. Nas redes sociais, o jovem meio-campista expressou seu agradecimento ao...

title: Thailand comes calling to draw more tourists from city
creator: Barinderjit Saluja
content: Chandigarh: To promote Thailand as a perfect holiday destination for Indians , the tourism authority of Thailand organized ‘Amazing Thailand Roadshow to India’ in Chandigarh on Friday. The networking event started with a B-B session where Indian travel agents got an opportunity to meet and network with 30 sellers from Thailand, including representatives of hotels, attractions, DMC’S and airlines. Phimpha Ratanapruk, deputy executive director, ASEAN, South Asia and South Pacific department, tourism authority of Thailand, welcomed travel trade from Chandigarh, Ludhiana and Jalandhar. This was followed by a presentation on new destinations, products and experiences in Thailand along with a focus on country’s wellness tourism offerings. At the roadshow, Siriges-a-nong Trirattanasongpol, director of tourism authority of Thailand, New Delhi office, highlighted the importance of Indian visitors to Thailand and appreciated the continuous support of the Indian travel trade in making Thailand the preferred holiday destination for Indians. Currently, India is ranked No. 3 for inbound tourists to Thailand. Siriges said, "We are also having talks with local airlines to explore Thailand connectivity with Chandigarh.” “We look forward to welcoming many more travellers from Punjab to amazing Thailand,” she said. title: Firmino marca de peito e Al-Ahli vence na abertura da Liga Saudita
creator: Esporte News Mundo
content: Roberto Firmino é um atacante que gosta de estreias, em seu primeiro jogo em sua passagem de oito anos pelo Liverpool ele anotou um hat-trick. No entanto, nesta sexta-feira, o centroavante foi mais contido, e dessa vez deixou sua marca na estreia do Al-Ahli na temporada 2024/2025 da Liga Saudita, vitória da equipe por 2 a 0 sobre o Al-Orobah. Há dez dias atrás, Firmino alcançou a impressionante marca de 200 gols em sua carreira, ao marcar no empate em 1 a 1 com o Al-Hilal pelas semifinais da Supercopa da Arábia Saudita. A decisão contra a equipe do técnico Jorge Jesus foi para os pênaltis e o Al-Ahli acabou derrotado por 4 a 1, mas foi justamente o atacante brasileiro o único a converter a cobrança de sua equipe. Já nesta sexta, em casa, o Al-Ahli saiu na frente aos 32 minutos do primeiro tempo, com um gol de Abdalkareem Darsi. Firmino chegou a ampliar aos 3 minutos da etapa final, mas foi apontado impedimento no início do lance. No entanto, aos 35, não teve jeito:Kessie fez jogada pelo lado direito e cruzou preciso, e Firmino estufou o peito para dar números finais ao jogo. O ex-atacante do Liverpool falou sobre o início de temporada de sua atual equipe no campeonato saudita. -Acabamos iniciando a temporada com essa eliminação na Supercopa, mas fizemos uma grande apresentação e a partida acabou decidida nos pênaltis. Acontece! Mas viramos a chave e estreamos hoje com essa bela vitória na Liga Saudita. Fico feliz, claro, de sempre marcar gols e ajudar...

title: Guest worker booked for making away with gold
content: Coimbatore: A guest worker who was working as a goldsmith in the city, was booked on Thursday for making away with 114 gold earrings weighing 264gram from a gold smithery unit at Sundaram Street in the city on August 20. RS Puram investigation wing police identified the accused as A Mitta, from West Bengal, who was working in a goldsmithery unit at Krishnappa Line on Sundaram Street Police said K Lenin Das, 37, who has been running a gold smithery unit on Sundaram Street for the last five years, had given the earrings to Mitta, a week ago for polishing work. He had been engaging Mitta in polishing work for the last three years. However, when he went to collect the earrings on August 20, Mitta was not found at the goldsmithery. Eventually, when he enquired with other goldsmiths it came to light that Mitta had left for his hometown and taken the gold earrings with him. After attempts to reach him went in vain, Lenin lodged a police complaint on Thursday night. Based on his complaint, police registered a case against Mitta under sections 316 (2) and 318 (4) of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS) Act. An officer added that a police team will soon be sent to West Bengal to nab the accused. Further investigation is on. title: ‘Another blow to the North End’
creator: Gabrielle Piché
content: Come December, another company will exit the North End Business Improvement Zone. Read this article for free: Already have an account? To continue reading, please subscribe: * Come December, another company will exit the North End Business Improvement Zone. Read unlimited articles for free today: Already have an account? Come December, another company will exit the North End Business Improvement Zone. Keith Horn can subtract one from an ever-decreasing count: the BIZ chairman clocked 109 businesses within the Winnipeg group’s borders a decade ago; now, there’s 57. Access Credit Union plans to close its branch at the corner of Main Street and Flora Avenue on Dec. 11. To Horn, it’s “another blow to the North End.” “This is another bigger one that’s leaving and nothing’s going to replace it,” he predicted Friday. “We don’t usually see too many new businesses coming ... down here anymore.” Carpathia Credit Union has occupied 950 Main St. for more than four decades. Carpathia merged with Access last year. The branch had noted lower foot traffic before the merger, according to Adam Monteith, Access Credit Union chief marketing officer. “We have to evaluate every location to make sure it still makes sense.” On Main Street, it didn’t. Customers in the area can travel to nearby Access branches, including locations on Leila Avenue and further down Main Street, Monteith said. title: Dương Tử bị chê thua xa Địch Lệ Nhiệt Ba, Triệu Lệ Dĩnh
content: Địch Lệ Nhiệt Ba và Dương Tử là hai nữ diễn viên nổi bật trong lứa tiểu hoa sau 90. Cả hai thường xuyên bị đem ra so sánh về khả năng diễn xuất, thành tích phim ảnh cũng như giá trị thương mại. Thời gian gần đây, hai mỹ nhân Hoa ngữ cùng xuất hiện trên trang bìa của hai tạp chí lớn. Đáng chú ý, Địch Lệ Nhiệt Ba được lên số Kim Cửu - số quan trọng nhất năm của Harper's Bazaar, tạp chí nữ nổi tiếng toàn cầu. Trong khi đó, Dương Tử chỉ được lên số bình thường của Madame Figaro, tạp chí thời trang xếp hạng hai tại đất nước tỉ dân. Doanh thu bán tạp chí của hai nữ diễn viên có sự chênh lệch đáng kinh ngạc. Tạp chí của Dương Tử chỉ bán được khoảng 13.000 bản trong 1 giờ đầu tiên, trong khi Địch Lệ Nhiệt Ba bán được 200.000 bản trong 20 phút đầu. Sau 24 giờ phát hành, số tạp chí của Địch Lệ Nhiệt Ba được ghi nhận vượt 290.000 bản bán ra, đạt doanh thu 11,6 triệu NDT (khoảng 40,6 tỉ đồng). Thành tích này giúp mĩ nhân Tân Cương lập kỷ lục sao nữ Trung Quốc có doanh thu một tạp chí cao nhất lịch sử. Tính từ đầu năm 2024 đến hiện tại, Địch Lệ Nhiệt Ba chưa có bộ phim mới nào lên sóng. Trong khi đó, Dương Tử có đến 3 bộ phim cả hiện đại lẫn cổ trang lần lượt chiếu trên các nền tảng online lẫn...

title: Berhane Abrehe: Ex-minister dies in Eritrean jail after six years without charge
creator: BBC News
content: The 79-year-old was Eritrea’s longest serving minister of finance, but he was removed from his role in 2012 following clashes with President Isaias Afwerki. Six years later, he was jailed after releasing a book where he described the president as a “dictator” who needed to resign. His family told the BBC that the authorities, who rarely confirm the deaths of senior officials in custody, had notified them of Mr Berhane’s death. The government also rarely shares where the bodies are buried but Mr Berhane’s family have heard there is a plan to bury him in Asmara Patriots Cemetery. Only veterans of the Eritrean independence war, like Mr Berhane, or members of the national service can be buried there. His body has not yet been released, his family said, and it is not clear when and exactly how Mr Berhane died. He was never brought before a court of law. President Isaias has ruled the East African country, without holding national elections, since winning the independence war against Ethiopia in 1991. Political parties, civic organisation and independent media are all banned. The UN and human rights groups have long accused the Eritrean government of gross human rights violations, including torture, forced disappearance and the imprisonment of tens of thousands of people in inhumane conditions. Mr Berhane’s fall-out with President Isaias began during the former’s 12-year tenure as finance minister, in which he urged Mr Isaias for transparency on the country’s budget. The budget is...

title: Three dead after stabbing attack at festival in western Germany
content: SOLINGEN, Germany - Three people were killed and three others seriously wounded in a stabbing attack at a festival on Friday night in the western German city of Solingen, police said. They said that at around 10 p.m. (1800 GMT) a single, unidentified man attacked multiple people. Bild newspaper quoted witnesses as saying the perpetrator was still at large. "It tears my heart apart that there was an attack on our city. I have tears in my eyes when I think of those we have lost. I pray for all those who are still fighting for their lives," Mayor Tim-Oliver Kurzbach said in a statement. The police said the attack occurred at a festival to honour the town's 650th anniversary. "There are multiple dead and injured due to a knife attack," the police said in a post on X. Local police said they could not comment over the phone. The attack occurred at the Fronhof, the mayor's statement said, a market square where live bands were playing. Solingen is in North Rhine-Westphalia state, Germany's most populous and bordering the Netherlands. Fatal stabbings and shootings in Germany are relatively uncommon. In June, a 29-year-old policeman died after being stabbed in the German city of Mannheim during an attack on a right-wing demonstration. There was a stabbing attack on a train in 2021, injuring several. The German government has been aiming to toughen rules on knives that can be carried in public by reducing the length allowed. — Reuters

title: Nabila Sudiro Segera Menikah, Tora Sudiro Sudah Tak Sabar Punya Cucu: Semoga Tidak Bertato
content: Putri aktor , Sudiro tidak lama lagi akan melangsungkan pernikahan. Nabila Sudiro sebelumnya telah menggelar acara pengajian menjelang pernikahan. Nabila sendiri merupakan anak dari pernikahan pertamanya bersama . Kini sudah dewasa dan sudah siap untuk dinikahi pujaan hatinya, Ivan Lubis. Sebagai seorang ayah, pun mengungkapkan kebahagiaannya. "Mereka pacaran sudah lama dan gue sempat tanya kapan anak gue mau dikawinin," kata , di sela pengajian pernikahan Sudiro di Cilandak, Jakarta Selatan, Rabu (21/8/2024), dilansir dari Wartakotalive. Ia mengaku sudah tak sabar untuk menimang cucu. "Tahun depan gue akan punya cucu," seloroh pria berusia 51 tahun itu sambil tertawa. Tak sampai di situ, Tora juga mengungkapkan harapannya soal sang cucu. Ia ingin cucunya kelak tidak bertato. "Semoga cucu gue nanti tidak bertato," ujar . Tak hanya Tora, ibu sambung , ikut merasakan kebahagiaannya. Mieke turut sibuk membantu persiapan nikah Nabila. "Saya bantu-bantu urus persiapan ," kata .

title: La misteriosa desaparición de una pareja brasileña en Chile
creator: moira
content: Una pareja de brasileños que viajaba en auto a Copiapó, Chile, desapareció desde el pasado domingo. Las autoridades chilenas iniciaron una búsqueda tras la denuncia de sus familiares. El miércoles 14 de agosto, partieron desde Resende, en el sur de Río de Janeiro, Brasil, con la intención de realizar un viaje en auto que los llevaría a Copiapó, en la Región de Atacama, Chile. Esta travesía, parte de unas esperadas vacaciones, se desarrollaría pasando por Argentina. Durante cuatro días, la pareja compartió con sus familiares los detalles del viaje a través de fotos y mensajes desde su vehículo Nissan Versa rojo. Entre sus actualizaciones incluían sus ubicaciones diarias, descripciones de sus paradas y planes para los próximos días en diversas localidades. El domingo 18 desapareció la comunicación entre Aurora y Eraldo y su familia en Brasil. Ese día, su hijo Raphael y su nuera Cintia enviaron un mensaje matutino, pero no recibieron respuesta. La última información conocida indicaba que la pareja había cruzado hacia Chile por el paso fronterizo Jama y tenía programado dejar su hotel en Copiapó ese día para dirigirse hacia la ruta 31 y el Paso San Francisco de Argentina, desde donde regresarían a Brasil. La familia, en diálogo con el periódico OGlobo, mencionó que en un primer momento la falta de respuesta no les preocupó, debido a la limitada cobertura en algunas zonas de su ruta. Sin embargo, la incomunicación prolongada los alertó y...

title: The Gunns Say Their Goal Is To Become The Greatest Tag Team Ever
creator: Jeremy Thomas
content: The Gunns have high aspirations on their bucket list, with the goal of becoming the greatest tag team of all time. Austin and Colten Gunn spoke with Robbie Fox on My Mom’s Basement and during the conversation they were asked what their goals are. You can see highlights below, per Fightful : Colton on their goals: “I know when I started, my main goal was just to win the tag titles with my brother. That was number one. We did that really fast, and now we’ve held the Ring of Honor Six-Man Titles, we’ve held the AEW World Trios Titles, we’re the first Unified Trios Champions, so it’s like, ‘Oh, man.’ So I’ve had to recalibrate that. I think it’s just get more reps with Austin and just become the greatest tag team ever. Why not set that as a goal? Yeah, it might be high and it might be hefty, but if you don’t have that goal, then why are we wrestling? Why are we trying to be a tag team? So I think that’s the new goal for me.” Austin on their goals: “I think that’s the same similar goal that I have. That’s cool to have the same goal as your tag partner, so we’re not going on different paths. I’ve enjoyed the ride, and we were having fun and trying to find our groove, but now that we’ve found it, now that we’ve won tag team gold and trios unified gold, I think it’s just about now how can we be the best? Now that we have our groove and we have our faction and stuff, it’s like we’re gonna be the best, so now put some respect on our name for being able to do what we’ve done in such a...

title: CGU iniciará auditoria dos recursos utilizados no Rio Grande do Sul
content: Economia 0 A Controladoria-Geral da União (CGU) informou aos deputados da Comissão de Fiscalização Financeira e Controle da Câmara que iniciará o processo de auditoria dos recursos federais gastos pelos gestores municipais e estadual para enfrentar as consequências das enchentes no Rio Grande do Sul. Apenas as medidas provisórias de créditos já somam mais de R$ 47 bilhões. O relatório do comitê criado para tratar da crise foi apresentado pela secretária-executiva da CGU, Eveline Brito. Segundo ela, é preciso agora verificar as despesas feitas. “A partir dos próximos meses, atuaremos em auditorias nas ações de resposta a desastres, nos recursos para reconstrução em municípios e de rodovias federais, além de outros. Aonde chegou dinheiro federal, a CGU pode atuar”, explicou. Eveline apontou algumas das principais medidas tomadas: a prorrogação de 2.500 convênios entre municípios afetados e a União, o acompanhamento de quem recebeu o auxílio-reconstrução e a elaboração de um guia para contratação em situações de calamidade. Para o deputado Tadeu Veneri (PT-PR), relator da subcomissão criada para acompanhar a situação, as ações da CGU devem ser tomadas como referência para eventuais casos semelhantes no futuro. Ele disse que a subcomissão agora terá uma outra tarefa. “A nossa comissão agora está fazendo uma análise de como nós vamos tratar das cidades que não poderão voltar a compor, no cenário geográfico, as mesmas regiões...

title: Exhiben fuga de agua en el área de urgencias del Hospital General 450; ya fue reparada
content: A través de redes sociales, pacientes denunciaron las malas condiciones en las que se encuentra el área de urgencias del Hospital General 450 (HG450) de la ciudad de Durango, lo que muestra un importante problema de goteras que empapan los pasillos de este nosocomio. En el clip, con una duración de 14 segundos, se muestra dicha área con múltiples goteras en el techo, mientras que alrededor se encuentra personal médico, en tanto, en medio del pasillo se encuentra un paciente en camilla mientras dos sus familiares intentan cubrirlo del agua. 🚨 Exhiben las malas condiciones en que se encuentra el área de urgencias del Hospital General 450 de #Durango 📹 cortesía / pic.twitter.com/41INaJCM1B — El Sol de Durango (@ElSoldeDurango) August 23, 2024 Tras la publicación del video en redes sociales, la Secretaría de Salud del Estado de Durango (SSD) informó que dicha fuga se registró ante el colapsado de una tubería, la cual fue reparada de manera inmediata y ya se encuentra totalmente controlada. ➡️ Entérate de todo lo que está pasando en Durango directo en tu celular. Suscríbete al canal de WhatsApp La Secretaría agregó que constantemente se brinda mantenimiento a todas las áreas del HG450, para brindar un servicio de calidad a los pacientes y sus acompañantes.

title: Confirman secuestro de Iván Siucho Neira, colaborador eficaz del caso ‘Los Waykis en la Sombra’
content: La fiscal Marita Barreto confirmó la tarde de hoy, viernes 23 de agosto, el secuestro del colaborador eficaz del caso ‘Los Waykis’ en la sombra’, Iván Siucho Neira, quien señaló haber recibido presiones de Mateo Castañeda, exabogado de la presidenta Dina Boluarte. Ha sido un secuestro. La policía hará las investigaciones preliminares. Realmente esta es una gran preocupación para el Ministerio Público, esto es una situación inminente para un testigo protegido de la Eficcop y aparentemente lo que buscaban eran los celulares”, dijo Barreto ante la prensa. La coordinadora del Equipo Especial de Fiscales Contra la Corrupción del Poder (Eficcop), señaló que los sujetos ingresaron con engaños a la casa de Siucho, se lo llevaron en un auto y estuvo retenido por más de una hora y media. Al parecer, para luego amenazarlo y tirarlo en una calle, quitándole los celulares. “Aparentemente lo que buscaban eran los celulares, se lo han llevado al testigo y luego lo han arrojado en una calle”, manifestó la representante del Ministerio Público. Noticia en desarrollo...

title: Пять станций метро временно закрыли в Москве
creator: Марина Совина
content: В Москве временно закрыли пять станций Сокольнической линии метро для движения поездов до 28 августа. Об этом сообщила пресс-служба столичного Дептранса. Уточняется, что на участке «Саларьево-Новомосковская» будут проводиться работы по подготовке к открытию новой станции «Потапово». Для комфорта пассажиров вдоль закрытого участка метро будут курсировать бесплатные компенсационные автобусы. Движение поездов возобновится 29 августа в 5:30. В начале августа в Москве временно закрыли для входа и выхода пассажиров станцию метро «Волгоградский проспект» Таганско-Краснопресненской линии. Решение было принято по требованию полиции. Ограничение действовало около 20 минут. Причина приостановки работы станции не уточнялась.

title: Cepea: Etanol hidratado cai 2,07% e anidro cede 0,44% nesta semana nas usinas paulistas
Juiz do ES e mais 19 são denunciados por fraudes para pegar herança de mortos
Lo hieren a balazos en Santa Catarina
content: El intento de ejecución fue reportado a las 14:10 horas del viernes en la Colonia Nueva Fortaleza Un integrante de un grupo de la delincuencia organizada fue atacado a balazos por sicarios quienes después de agredirlo lograron escapar en Santa Catarina . El intento de ejecución fue reportado a las 14:10 horas del viernes sobre la calle Fortaleza y Sierra Madre , en la Colonia Nueva Fortaleza . Al lugar arribaron elementos de Protección Civil municipal ya que por medio del 911 fueron advertidos de una persona con lesiones por arma de fuego. El hombre que no se identificó en el lugar presentaba heridas por arma de fuego, quien fue llevado en la ambulancia al Hospital Universitario . El masculino quien vestía pantalón de mezclilla azul, playera y tenis en color blanco, dijo a las autoridades que el motivo de la agresión a balazos en su contra, fue por que pertenece a un grupo de la delincuencia organizada. Los oficiales municipales realizaron las investigaciones correspondientes.

title: Juiz do ES e mais 19 são denunciados por fraudes para pegar herança de mortos
creator: admin3
content: O Ministério Público do Espírito Santo (MP-ES) denunciou o juiz Bruno Fritoli Almeida, do Tribunal de Justiça do Estado, e outras 19 pessoas na Operação Follow The Money. Eles são acusados de corrupção, lavagem de dinheiro, organização criminosa e uso de documento falso. Além da condenação, o MP pede R$ 34 milhões em dano moral coletivo. A denúncia é assinada pelo procurador-geral de Justiça do Estado Francisco Martinez Berdeal. Cabe agora ao Tribunal de Justiça do Espírito Santo avaliar se há elementos para abrir uma ação penal. O caso está em sigilo. Segundo a investigação, o juiz estaria envolvido em um esquema de fraudes para sacar heranças irregularmente. Quando as suspeitas vieram a público, a defesa negou irregularidades e alegou que ele trabalha “há quase uma década com lisura e responsabilidade”. “Confiantes da índole de Bruno durante sua carreira no judiciário, seguirão acompanhando o desenrolar do caso e atuando, com os instrumentos da lei, pela sua inocência”, diz o comunicado divulgado pelos advogados Rafael Lima, Larah Brahim e Mariah Sartório. Juiz tinha esquema para pegar herança de mortos, diz Ministério Público O Ministério Público afirma que o grupo identificava mortos sem herdeiros e com quantias altas no banco ou em imóveis. O passo seguinte era a falsificação de contratos, notas promissórias e documentos de confissão de dívida em nome do falecido. Com os documentos falsos em mãos, o grupo dava entrada em...

title: Yêu lại tình đầu nhờ video tỏ tình gây 'bão mạng'
content: Năm 2011, Hà Diệu Ly, 17 tuổi, ở Hải Dương, quen với Trần Xuân Cảnh, 19 tuổi, ở Nha Trang khi hai người là bạn chơi game online. Thấy nói chuyện hợp, họ kết bạn trên Facebook để nhắn tin với nhau thường xuyên hơn. Ly nhận lời làm người yêu của Cảnh đúng dịp 14/2 năm đó. Đúng một tháng yêu nhau, nhân dịp Valentine trắng (ngày người được nhận quà 14/2 đáp lễ người tặng quà), cô gái nhờ một người bạn quay video bày tỏ tình cảm với Cảnh rồi đăng lên trang cá nhân. Yêu lại tình đầu nhờ video tỏ tình gây 'bão mạng' Video Hà Diệu Ly bày tỏ tình cảm với người yêu quen qua mạng ngày 14/3/2011. Mới quen nhau trên mạng nhưng đã được gửi video đầy những lời tình tứ, chàng trai ''vừa ngại lại vừa thích''. Nhưng video đăng lên được vài ngày Diệu Ly đã xóa vì bị nhiều bạn bè chê ''nói năng như con khùng''. Cô bé học sinh cũng sợ bị mắng nếu lỡ bố mẹ xem được video. Mối tình con nít của hai người nhạt dần khi Diệu Ly lao vào kỳ thi tốt nghiệp và đại học sau đó sang Nga du học còn Cảnh cũng bận với việc học. Hai người cách nhau hơn nửa vòng trái đất, trái múi giờ nên không còn tương tác. ''Yêu trên mạng kiểu trẻ con nên chẳng có chia tay. Cả hai cũng quên mất có người kia tồn tại'', Diệu Ly kể. Nhưng...

title: Cepea: Etanol hidratado cai 2,07% e anidro cede 0,44% nesta semana nas usinas paulistas
creator: admin3
content: O preço do etanol hidratado nas usinas paulistas caiu 2,07% nesta semana, de R$ 2,5977 o litro para 2,5438/litro, em média, de acordo com o Centro de Estudos Avançados em Economia Aplicada (Cepea/Esalq). Já o valor do anidro recuou 0,44% no período, de R$ 2,9473 o litro para R$ 2,9342/litro, em média.

title: [오늘의 뉴욕증시 무버] 카바그룹, 2분기 호실적에 20% 가까이 급등...엔비디아 4.55%↑
creator: 변효선
변효선 (hsbyun@etoday.co.kr)
content: 23일(현지시간) 뉴욕증시에서 카바그룹, 엔비디아, 테슬라 등의 주가 등락이 두드러졌다. 패스트푸드 체인점 카바그룹은 2분기 실적이 예상치를 웃돌면서 주가가 20% 가까이 급등했다. 카바그룹 주가는 전장보다 19.63% 상승한 122.00달러에 장을 마감했다. 카바그룹은 예상을 뛰어넘는 2분기 실적을 발표하고 연간 전망치 또한 상향 조정했다. 카바그룹은 2분기 2억3300만 달러의 매출과 17센트의 주당 순이익을 기록했다고 발표했다. 이는 2억2000만 달러의 매출과 13센트의 주당 순이익을 점쳤던 시장 전망치를 웃돈 것이다. 또 이 회사는 2024 회계연도의 동일 매장 매출 증가율 예상치를 기존 4.5%~6.5%에서 8.5%~9.5%로 끌어올렸다. 존 타워 씨티그룹 애널리스트는 “카바는 국내에서 대체하기 어려운 거의 유일한 카테고리에 속했다는 점에서 계속 이익을 얻고 있다”고 분석했다. 인공지능(AI) 반도체 기업 엔비디아 주가는 미국 연방준비제도(Fed·연준)의 9월 금리 인하 기대감에 힘입어 상승했다. 엔비디아 주가는 전장보다 4.55% 오른 129.37달러에 거래를 끝냈다. 또한 3조1820억 달러로 불어났다. 엔비디아와 함께 반도체주도 일제히 강세를 보였다. 반도체 관련 종목으로 구성된 필라델피아 반도체 지수는 전 거래일 대비 2.79% 뛰었다. 대만 TSMC(2.91%), 퀄컴(2.66%), 브로드컴(2.48%), AMD(2.16%) 등도 일제히 2%대 상승세를 기록했다. 전기차 제조업체인 테슬라 주가도 금리 인하 전망에 힘입어 상승했다. 테슬라 주가는 전장보다 4.59% 오른 220.32달러에...

2nd urgent primary care centre announced for Vernon
creator: Brendan Shykora
content: Vernon will soon be getting a second urgent and primary care centre, helping to fill the healthcare gap that emerged in the city when two private walk-in clinics closed last year. B.C. Premier David Eby made the announcement at a roundtable with Interior Health leadership in Vernon Friday Aug. 23. Eby remarked that making the announcement at the Vernon Health Unit felt "a little bit like telling you what you're already working on," as "half the people in the room are involved in planning" the forthcoming centre, which is expected to open in late 2025. The new centre will be open to provide urgent primary care seven days a week, including statutory holidays. Like the existing centre on 28th Avenue, it will provide same-day care within 12 to 24 hours for people with health concerns that do not require an emergency department visit. Conditions such as sprains, cuts, high fevers and minor infections will be treated at the centre, which is designed to take stress off of the emergency department at Vernon Jubilee Hospital while still providing timely urgent care. Interior Health leadership said Friday that the new centre will be able to handle about 150 patient visits per day. Interior Health president and CEO Susan Brown said the new centre is a "significant step towards delivering comprehensive, timely care that supports the overall health and well-being of the people of Vernon." Eby said Interior Health has advised that the existing centre in Vernon has seen 28,000 patient...

title: Florida high school evacuated after multiple 'lightheaded' students fall ill in cafeteria
content: BREAKING NEWS Florida high school evacuated after multiple 'lightheaded' students fall ill in cafeteria READ MORE: Update on Perth couple found unconscious by their teens in suspected carbon monoxide poisoning By Mitchell Goodbar For Dailymail.Com Published: 00:13, 24 August 2024 | Updated: 00:28, 24 August 2024 e-mail 2 View comments Students were rushed out of a high school in Weston, Florida , after several employees were hospitalized with a mysterious illness following a carbon monoxide leak in the cafeteria. On Friday morning, Cypress Bay High School was evacuated after four workers and a firefighter started inexplicably experiencing headaches and nausea. According to a post on the City of Weston's X.com page, three people experienced 'lightheadedness in the cafeteria.' The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention states that the most frequent symptoms of carbon monoxide poisoning are dizziness, headaches, weakness, upset stomach, vomiting, chest pain, and confusion. title: Signboards to be installed across city
content: Prayagraj : With the objective to ensure that devotees do not meander aimlessly to reach the Sangam area and Maha Kumbh, they will be guided by sign boards in languages that these devotees can easily comprehend. For this, PWD has submitted a proposal worth Rs 8 crore to the govt for installing signages across the city and highways. The department is tasked with installing the maximum number of signages for the fair. The plan is to install signages in the five most widely spoken languages in the country, which include Hindi, English, Tamil, Kannada, and Bengali. These are languages that any devotee hailing from any part of the country will be able to understand. The remarkable feature is that the signages will be visible even in the dark. The department is devising a plan to commence installing signage first at Bamrauli Airport and its surrounding areas. Additionally, it will be installed at major intersections. If the departmental officials are to be believed, the influx of devotees will begin here from mid-December. Consequently, the work of installing signage in the fair area will be completed prior to their arrival. A proposal of Rs 8 crore has been drafted and forwarded to the govt for installing signage in five languages. The work will commence once the proposal receives approval from the headquarters, said Chief Engineer PWD, AK Dwivedi.

title: Boy threatened to shoot self with dad’s gun, rescued after 12-hr op
content: Lucknow: The class XII student who locked himself in a room at an apartment complex in Jankipuram while threatening to shoot himself in a high-voltage drama which also kept police round the toes on Thursday was rescued early Friday. A team of policemen, firemen and a psychiatrist were deployed on the spot who kept trying to communicate with the boy who was in an aggressive state all through the night. It started when the minor locked himself around 3 pm in his 10X10 flat at Jankipuram’s Sulabh Awas apartment and fired a few shots in the air. Panicked by the firing, the family immediately informed the local police, who reached at the site to rescue the child. “When our team reached there, we saw the locked gate and the child in an aggressive state, not ready to communicate at all,” said Nitish Kumar Srivastava, SHO, Gudamba. “We waited for hours, but the boy refused to back down. Hence, we decided to go slow and use our mind, so that we can rescue him without any injury or casualty,” he added. “A team of firemen was also called to the spot, and with them, a plan was made to pull the pistol when the boy sleeps. However, we didn't get any chance as he never slept after that,” said the SHO. “While a team under SI Vishwanath Kumar kept in touch with the child, another team started cordoning off the area while the senior officers under the supervision of DCP, North, Abhijith R Shankar remained in touch with the team,” said ACP, Ghazipur, Anindya Vikram Singh. “It was around 3 am...

title: Renuncia directora de la UNISA ante protestas de estudiantes
content: Ante la presión que ejercieron con la toma de instalaciones y paro de labores desde el pasado 5 de agosto, además de una serie de bloqueos de avenidas que llevaron a cabo en diferentes días, Por lo tanto, el Comité Estudiantil de Paro se comprometió a entregar el próximo domingo 25 de agosto, a las 18:00 horas, las así como a participar a partir del miércoles 28 en las mesas de trabajo con autoridades capitalinas, tal es el caso de funcionarios de la para que se atiendan sus demandas que se centran en ampliar la plantilla de docentes.
